1a1(rgyud): rgyud ta pa bzhugs so//
1b1(rgyud): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra pA Ni a b+hi She ka ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad
1b2(rgyud): du| 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po/ bam po dang po/ sangs
1b3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
1b4(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang
2a1(rgyud): @##/ /bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las
2a2(rgyud): mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rin po
2a3(rgyud): c he'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par spras pa'i khang bzang chen po rin po che'i rgyal po
2a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen
2a5(rgyud): p o| nor bu chen po dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par spras pa la bzhugs nas
2b1(rgyud): lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam mthong ba'i nam mkha' la lham me
2b2(rgyud): lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la lham me lhan ne
2b3(rgyud): lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang thams
2b4(rgyud): cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis brlabs/
2b5(rgyud): g.yo ba dang / rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing /
2b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas
3a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya
3a2(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
3a3(rgyud): thos nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/
3a4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin de thob pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
3a5(rgyud): s angs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi
3a6(rgyud): rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ 'di lta ste/
3b1(rgyud): lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po gang la la dag / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub tu
3b3(rgyud): sems bskyed pa dang / spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa bsgrub pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
3b4(rgyud): ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis so/ /mdor na/ sems
3b5(rgyud): c an gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
3b6(rgyud): na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste/ de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang / dmigs
3b7(rgyud): pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de thams
4a1(rgyud): cad mthong zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems te/ dge ba ji tsam mngon par 'du byed pa yang rgyu de nyid dang / dmigs pa de nyid kyis
4a2(rgyud): so| |de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing ya mtshan gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab
4a3(rgyud): bo snyam ste/ cang mi smra bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po de dag ya mtshan gyis snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer
4a5(rgyud): stong phrag du ma mgur nas phyung ngo / /de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te/ nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams
4a6(rgyud): dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs
4a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas/ /bcom ldan rims nad bral ba de/ /dbang sgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni/ /skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na/ /snying 'thad chen po seng ge'i khri/ /dpag tshad sum
4b1(rgyud): brgya yod pa la/ /pad+ma'i snying po der bzhugs nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor/ /gnas der thub pa chen po yis/ /bkod pa chen por gang sprul pa/ /
4b2(rgyud): de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang / /dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa/ /de ni bskal pa grangs med du/ /bstan par nus pa ma yin no/ /de ru de la dpa' bo che/ /rdzogs pa'i
4b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog / yid gnyis som nyi spangs pa po/ /dwogs pa gcod pa blta bar gyis/ /zhes bskul to/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems
4b4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b5(rgyud): y ang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang
4b6(rgyud): ldan pa phyung ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ 'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la/ /blta ba dang ni mchod
4b7(rgyud): pa bgyi ba dang / /sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir/ /khyed cag thams cad ma shol de ring gshegs/ /zhes yang dag par ston to/ /de nas 'od zer de
5a1(rgyud): dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od
5a2(rgyud): zer des bskul ma thag tu rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das dag /bcom ldan
5a3(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal po dbang sgyur
5a4(rgyud): gyi khang pa chen por mchi na/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig na mchis/ gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de
5a5(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus so/ /de skad ces
5a6(rgyud): gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal
5a7(rgyud): pa| rigs kyi bu dag / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges
5b1(rgyud): par ston pa dag yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams re re nges par ston pa re re la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod
5b2(rgyud): pa rab 'byams du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag
5b3(rgyud): brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dag gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs
5b4(rgyud): pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa
5b5(rgyud): de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par gcig go / me tog gi gzhi'i
5b6(rgyud): s nying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod
5b7(rgyud): pa rab 'byams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs
6a1(rgyud): pa me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bar ma gcig go / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams bar ma bkod
6a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste/ de nas
6a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyangs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin
6a4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig po de nyid/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
6a5(rgyud): gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis
6a6(rgyud): brlabs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de
6a7(rgyud): 'dra ste/ de'i yon tan nam/ spyod pa'am/ smon lam mam/ ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu dag/
6b1(rgyud): nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa
6b2(rgyud): gzo ba/ byas pa shes pa sha stag go /rigs kyi bu dag /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyad pa dang / smon
6b3(rgyud): lam dag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur
6b4(rgyud): ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen
6b5(rgyud): po las brtsams te/ ngag sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byams go bar mdzad par bzhed nas 'od zer gyi dra
6b6(rgyud): ba chen po 'di phyung ngo / /de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis byang chub sems dpa'
6b7(rgyud): rin chen blo gros la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di byin no/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba tha a dza ni/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i
7a1(rgyud): snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te 'jig
7a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
7a3(rgyud): la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rin po che rdo rje chen po la snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon
7a4(rgyud): par sprul nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ thams cad
7a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang / rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkab bo/ /de bzhin du
7a6(rgyud): bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / rdo
7a7(rgyud): rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
7b1(rgyud): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che dang / rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs
7b2(rgyud): pa chen po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang / pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying pos
7b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che yi ge'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go /lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
7b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas/
7b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang / blta ba
7b6(rgyud): dang | mchod pa'i phyir song shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i
7b7(rgyud): dbang pos rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mahA badzrA gra ba raM hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje
8a1(rgyud): mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing / bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su
8a2(rgyud): bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams
8a3(rgyud): me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ 'jig rten gyi
8a4(rgyud): khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so/ /rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang /
8a5(rgyud): bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang /
8a6(rgyud): rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po snang bar byas so/ /mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas
8a7(rgyud): so| |go bar byas nas kyang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho phyogs su gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po mchog
8b1(rgyud): las byung ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug go / nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
8b2(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil
8b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi mchog rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i mchog gi snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/ rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma mtshog gi dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te
8b5(rgyud): b+h+yaH sarba thA ka ru Na ba la badzra pad+mA gra sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs
8b6(rgyud): nas| byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan
8b7(rgyud): bkod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir
9a1(rgyud): song zhig ces btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems
9a2(rgyud): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
9a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la
9a4(rgyud): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma chen po rdo rje'i
9a5(rgyud): rgyal por 'dug ste/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po 'di thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad du thugs rje
9a6(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyis rang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu bkang nas snang bar byas so/ /byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de
9a7(rgyud): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon
9b1(rgyud): pa| rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol ba/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
9b2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH
9b3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA par dman ra a gri gri / 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i
9b4(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces
9b5(rgyud): btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas
9b6(rgyud): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan
9b7(rgyud): bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar
10a1(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs
10a2(rgyud): te| byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
10a3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan la dkon mchog gsum
10a4(rgyud): gyi rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
10a5(rgyud): rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ dkon mchog gsum po'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba
10a6(rgyud): thA oM oM dzaM saM/ 'di byin nas/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der
10a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i cod pan/ bcom
10b1(rgyud): ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing
10b2(rgyud): mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /
10b3(rgyud): rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nyid du
10b4(rgyud): gnas nas/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rjes brgyan pa'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams
10b5(rgyud): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi
10b6(rgyud): dpal zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la/ sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
10b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba
11a1(rgyud): mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA ma hA badzra me g+ha bi kr-I Di te bi shwa saM b+ha ba ha/ 'di byin nas/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi
11a2(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig
11a3(rgyud): ces btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
11a4(rgyud): du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom
11a5(rgyud): ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi
11a6(rgyud): r nam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
11a7(rgyud): rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje
11b1(rgyud): chen po'i tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dpa' bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
11b2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i tog gis rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA
11b3(rgyud): badzrod b+ha be swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
11b4(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi
11b5(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la bder song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
11b6(rgyud): la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rgyan rnams
11b7(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / rdo rje'i gzugs kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na bcom
12a1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i
12a2(rgyud): rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
12a3(rgyud): rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra rak+Sha ni r+g+ho Sha bikrAn+ta swAhA/ 'di byin nas
12a4(rgyud): btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar
12a5(rgyud): gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan
12a6(rgyud): cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par
12a7(rgyud): snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
12b1(rgyud): 'di thams cad go bar byed cing rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go / 'og gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
12b2(rgyud): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo
12b3(rgyud): rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA haM he swAhA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag la
12b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing
12b5(rgyud): mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal
12b6(rgyud): po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba
12b7(rgyud): der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa
13a1(rgyud): brtsegs pa sna tshogs pa dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing / pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rdul dang bral ba'i
13a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go / steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung
13a3(rgyud): gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal
13a4(rgyud): ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA bo d+h+yaM ka ra d+harma swAhA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo //
13a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub
13a6(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu
13a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
13b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji
13b2(rgyud): l tar 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha' yas pa go bar byed pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas
13b3(rgyud): par 'gengs shing / chos nyid las byung ba'i pad+ma chen po la 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing 'khod pa de dag
13b4(rgyud): gis| bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
13b5(rgyud): shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing nam mkha' ltar gzod ma nas zhi ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
13b6(rgyud): che'i rgyal po chen po ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sgra skad gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
13b7(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o/ /gdod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa/ /mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di/ /ji ltar sa la snang zhig gu /sku yis 'phrin las mi mdzad la/ /gsung dang
14a1(rgyud): thugs kyis mi mdzad cing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra/ /sku yis sems can thams cad la/ /sangs
14a2(rgyud): rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad kyang / /sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ /thub pa de ni 'gyur mi mnga'/ /gsung ni brag cha 'dra ba ste/ /bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang / /lha
14a3(rgyud): yi rnga chen ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad/ /thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste/ /de la yul ni mnga' ma lags/ /yul rnams dang ni de bral yang / /sems
14a4(rgyud): can rnams kyi yul du gyur/ /gsung ni de bzhin sems can te/ /de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs/ /mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing / /smra ba'i nang na mchog tu
14a5(rgyud): snang | |skye ba med las grol ba yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yod min pas/ /gang dag skye ba med shes pa/ /de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes/ /mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag
14a6(rgyud): cing | |lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang / /rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du/ /thub pa rgyun du rab tu snang / /byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid/ /shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag /
14a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba/ /'di 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed/ /de la mig ni mi snang zhing / /rna ba dang ni sna yang min/ /lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni/ /do phyir de yi
14b1(rgyud): yul ma yin/ /gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te/ /dri dang ro dang reg ma yin/ /dbang po ma yin rnam shes min/ /thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi/ /yul can dang ni yul de
14b2(rgyud): dag |rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin/ /yul can yod pa ma yin pas/ /yul rnams srid pa ma yin no/ /byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin/ /de ltar gang tshe yod
14b3(rgyud): min pa/ /de tshe mgon po yod 'gyur te/ /rnam par ma brtags tshul du'o/ /de ni kun tu thams cad la/ /bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa/ /stong pa yid bzhin nor bu
14b4(rgyud): ltar| |kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin/ /gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i tshul gyis su/ /ting 'dzin dbang bsgyur rnams la ni/ /lta smra 'bel gtam thams cad kyis/ /kun
14b5(rgyud): tu longs spyod 'os su 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas/ /de tshe kun gyi ting 'dzin dang / /gzungs dang rig pa rnam par thar/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thams
14b6(rgyud): cad thob/ /gzugs la dbang ni thob gyur cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa/ /bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang / /phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin/ /yang dag
14b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs/ /de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dag par/ /de ni bdag cag thob par shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
15a1(rgyud): de dag gis tshigs su gcad pa de dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi mthar dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang / de bzhin du ngag dang /
15a2(rgyud): yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sa gang yin pa la 'jug go /de ci'i
15a3(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas dag dang / yid kyi
15a4(rgyud): sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas
15a5(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig
15a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge
15a7(rgyud): 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
15b1(rgyud): cad du skad cig / thang cig /yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
15b2(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de
15b3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
15b4(rgyud): mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / stong thams cad
15b5(rgyud): dang | stong gnyis pa thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig
15b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams gtan la phab pa thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna
15b7(rgyud): tshogs dang / re ba sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljong
16a1(rgyud): sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dag la sgra dang / tshig brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa
16a2(rgyud): sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston cing /
16a3(rgyud): rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis byang chub
16a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa dang / bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang /
16a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye
16a6(rgyud): shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od 'phro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa dang /gsang
16a7(rgyud): sngags rnam par dag pa'i sogs rdo rje'i khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo / /de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam
16b1(rgyud): par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o/ /rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam dar mi rtog pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid dang bral
16b2(rgyud): ba'i phyir stong pa'o/ /gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/ /skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o/ /bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam
16b3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o/ /tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can
16b4(rgyud): t hams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
16b5(rgyud): par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug pa/ nor bu rin
16b6(rgyud): po che chen po rin thang med pa gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu ni 'di su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to/ /gang
16b7(rgyud): dag blo gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang / the tshom dang bral ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang / spyod
17a1(rgyud): pa'i tshul la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang po/ rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
17a2(rgyud): mdzad kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/ de dag ni
17a3(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang / bslab pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang / dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal ba yod do/ /de nas
17a4(rgyud): ' jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad
17a5(rgyud): nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste mthar gyis spyod pa spyod cing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen
17a6(rgyud): po'i mtha'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de yang bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
17a7(rgyud): bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i
17b1(rgyud): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad spong ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
17b2(rgyud): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas/ lag na rdo rje dbang chen po
17b3(rgyud): bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do/ / //lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ sngon gyi
17b4(rgyud): spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po/ bam
17b5(rgyud): po gnyis pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas na/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
17b6(rgyud): m tshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu mthun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags tshal chen po
17b7(rgyud): mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems
18a1(rgyud): kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang /
18a2(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa nyin gung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga'
18a3(rgyud): bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi la chen
18a4(rgyud): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshems can dang / tshe dang ldan pa
18a5(rgyud): gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len b+ha ra dwa dza
18a6(rgyud): dang | tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung spyod dbang po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang / tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan
18a7(rgyud): pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig go /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po sha tshag la/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal
18b1(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang /
18b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa chos la gnas pa dang / byang
18b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rab tu
18b4(rgyud): brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas phan byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
18b5(rgyud): dang | byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa'
18b6(rgyud): sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang /
18b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dri ma med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub
19a1(rgyud): sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
19a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra
19a3(rgyud): rab kyi rdul snyed dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang thabs gcig ste/ de dag thams cad kyang sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzungs dang
19a4(rgyud): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / dbang thob pa dang / sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa dang / bsam pa
19a5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sngon gyi smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /
19a6(rgyud): rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / dag pa rgyun mi 'chad par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
19a7(rgyud): de lta bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
19b1(rgyud): zil gyis mnan nas shin tu lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang
19b2(rgyud): tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
19b3(rgyud): bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang / thags bzangs ris dang / zhing mchog dang / ba Ti dang / rnga chen dang /
19b4(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo can dang / dri ma med pa dang / tog dang / zla gdong dang / rnam par 'joms dang / zab mo dang / stobs can dang / sgra gcan dang / tog dregs dang / rnam
19b5(rgyud): par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sna tshogs phreng ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan stong dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams
19b6(rgyud): cad rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye
19b7(rgyud): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
20a1(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20a2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ci ltar sprul pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
20a3(rgyud): dang | rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor to/ /gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la
20a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa dang / klu'i rgyal po klog lce dang /klu'i rgyal
20a5(rgyud): po rin po che'i cod pan can dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal
20a6(rgyud): po rna rdum dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma can dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dus can dang / klu'i rgyal po rigs can dang / klu'i rgyal
20a7(rgyud): po mgo gcig pa dang / klu'i rgyal po brdzun pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang rang gi gnas
20b1(rgyud): nas byung ste/ klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan+dan gor shi sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
20b2(rgyud): tshal stug pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas ci ltar sprul pa'i spos chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod
20b3(rgyud): pa'i nags tshal stug por char du mngon par phab bo/ /phab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams
20b4(rgyud): thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phags skyes po dang /
20b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang ba bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po dang / gnod sbyin
20b6(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po rmongs byed 'dzin pa chu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag pa brgyad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / de
20b7(rgyud): dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
21a1(rgyud): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnams thogs nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
21a2(rgyud): tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ lhags nas ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
21a3(rgyud): dang | phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal
21a4(rgyud): te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor mi 'am ci du ma dang ldan pa yang mi 'am ci'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug
21a5(rgyud): pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa du ma thogs pa brgya stong du ma rang rang gi
21a6(rgyud): gnas nas byung ste/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ ci ltar
21a7(rgyud): thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang /
21b1(rgyud): pheg rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
21b2(rgyud): rnam par 'dud byed kyi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jigs 'gro dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'dab brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug phud
21b3(rgyud): can 'khor nam mkha' lding brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
21b4(rgyud): do| |srin po'i bdag po khros bzhin dang / srin po'i bdag po mche ba bzang dang / srin po'i bdag po drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / skrag
21b5(rgyud): byed dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / gdong bcu dang / gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i dril bu dang / rnam par 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / zla ba'i sde 'khor srin po du ma dang
21b6(rgyud): ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
21b7(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /drang srong chen po me 'khor drang srong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
22a1(rgyud): tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs
22a2(rgyud): gcig tu 'khod do/ /rlung sprin gyi phreng ba can dang / rlung 'jigs byed dang / rlung 'chags byed dang / rlung kun tu 'jog byed dang / rlung rnam par 'thor dang / rlung dus ldan
22a3(rgyud): dang | rlung rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rlung rlung dmar dang / rlung 'jig rten 'dzin dag kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
22a4(rgyud): phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la chen po sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
22a5(rgyud): nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
22a6(rgyud): go |nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / skems byed dang / du ba 'byin dang / rab 'bar dang / nyi ma sreg byed 'khor lha'i bu gzi brjid 'phags pa
22a7(rgyud): brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
22b1(rgyud): nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /klu'i rgyal po chu lha 'khor klu'i rgyal po du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs
22b2(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/
22b3(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga
22b4(rgyud): la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /drag po yi dwags kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yang bcom ldan
22b5(rgyud): 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang
22b6(rgyud): ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
22b7(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / gza'i rgyal po chen po smin drug gi bu 'khor gza' brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi
23a1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
23a2(rgyud): mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / sprin lha'i bu skya bo zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu glog phreng zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu sprin gyi dra ba stug po 'jig
23a3(rgyud): byed ces bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
23a4(rgyud): tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /glog
23a5(rgyud): dpag tu med ces bya ba dang / glog gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang / glog stug 'od ces bya ba dang / glog 'od ces bya ba dang / glog mdzes phreng can zhes bya ba 'khor
23a6(rgyud): glog brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
23a7(rgyud): nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs
23b1(rgyud): ri dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed can dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang / ri'i
23b2(rgyud): rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po rig sngags 'chang dang / ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga
23b3(rgyud): la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /gshin rje dang / mtshan
23b4(rgyud): mo nag mo dang / be con nag mo can dang / skyes bu nag po dang / 'chi bdag dang / dpal byin ma dang / rna nag ma yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
23b5(rgyud): tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dka'
23b6(rgyud): thub zlog ma dang / tsa muN+Da dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / gzhon nu'i chung ma dang / lus ngan gyi chung ma dang / phag gi chung
23b7(rgyud): ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/
24a1(rgyud): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /chu klung chen po gang gA dang / chu klung
24a2(rgyud): chen po si tA dang / chu klung chen po dbyangs can dang / chu klung chen po bi da sta dang / chu klung chen po zla ba'i cha can dang / chu klung chen po ya mu na dang / chu klung chen po kun
24a3(rgyud): gyi bshes gnyen dang / chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho sten dang / chu klung chen po ba lang sbyin mchog ldan dang / chu klung chen po brtse ba sbyin yang
24a4(rgyud): shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
24a5(rgyud): bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dri za'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng bcan dang / dri za'i rgyal po 'phrog po dang / dri za'i rgyal po shugs chen dang / dri za'i rgyal
24a6(rgyud): po rnam par gnon pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / dri za'i rgyal po ut+pa la lta bu'i mig dang / dri za'i rgyal po tsan+dan brtsegs kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
24a7(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
24b1(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nye ba'i tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rab tu gtum pa dang /
24b2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po bsnyems ldan dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang / rig sngags 'chang gi
24b3(rgyud): rgyal po de dag dang / gzhan yang 'khor rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po
24b4(rgyud): ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /srin mo so can zhes
24b5(rgyud): bya ba dang / srin mo g.yengs byed ces bya ba dang / srin mo mtshan mo rgyu zhes bya ba dang / srin mo so 'cha' ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rmongs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rgod
24b6(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i lto zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bum lto ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zangs 'dab can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo glog lce ma zhes bya ba dang /
24b7(rgyud): srin mo bun tsa le zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'jigs su rung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zhi 'am lta bu'i sen mo can zhes bya ba dang / srin
25a1(rgyud): mo chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang 'khor srin mo du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug
25a2(rgyud): po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'byung po'i
25a3(rgyud): rgyal po mdung can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gtun shing can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol 'dzin dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po
25a4(rgyud): 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po yang dag 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gnya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs
25a5(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
25a6(rgyud): btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /sha za thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad dang / gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / yi dwags
25a7(rgyud): thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang / de dag thams cad shing sA la sna tshogs
25b1(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
25b2(rgyud): btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /srin mo bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas lhags te gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
25b3(rgyud): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal
25b4(rgyud): stug po shin tu yangs shing / thag gru che la/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur cing sa gzhi rdo rje dang / bai DUR+ya dang / spug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par phye ba/ ngos
25b5(rgyud): gnyis ka'i sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gis brgyan te mdzes par byas pa/ steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi do
25b6(rgyud): shal mang po dpyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
25b7(rgyud): dkar po dang / dri mchog gis sa phyogs de bkram par gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
26a1(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad rdo rje chen po'i khor yug gi ris bskor ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khams su gyur pa/ chu zheng
26a2(rgyud): dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs cha yongs su gang ba/ byang
26a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i las kyis byung ba ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i las kyi byung ba/ lham me lhang nge gnas pa de bzhin du shing
26a4(rgyud): sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lhan ner rnam par mdzes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
26a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan
26a6(rgyud): 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung ste rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs
26a7(rgyud): so| |dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/ /rdo rje 'byung gnas stobs po che/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yi/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni/ /rdo rje stobs chen srung bar gyis//
26b1(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaHswA hA/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
26b2(rgyud): rab 'byams thams cad du rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags par gyur te/ rdo rje 'byung gnas dbang po che/ /sems can kun la
26b3(rgyud): phan mdzad pa/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni/ /thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs/ /rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang / /snying po 'di ni 'dzin gyur cig /des na
26b4(rgyud): 'dir ni de dag kun/ /tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog /ces bsgrags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas
26b5(rgyud): kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
26b6(rgyud): mdzad sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
26b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil
27a1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba/ byang chub
27a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i gsang chen byang chub sems dpas legs par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu mas rnam par rol pa/ de
27a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na sems can gzhan dag gis shes par
27a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba dang /
27a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po
27a6(rgyud): bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig
27a7(rgyud): tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni dus lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'di ni tshod lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par
27b1(rgyud): ston pa bsgrub pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo/ rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas/ gsang sngags kyi
27b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA khaM/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo
27b3(rgyud): mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gi mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes skyid pa che/ /bsam gtan bde ba mchog thob pa/ /kun kyang de yi dbang du gyur/ /de nas bcom
27b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i
27b5(rgyud): 'od zer phyung ngo / /de byung nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal gyi be'u nyid du zhugs so/ /de'i tshe byang chub
27b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
27b7(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa ston par smon lam btab nas gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ dbus kyi 'dzam bu'i gling mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can du gnod
28a1(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyi gnas na gnas pa de 'od zer gyis snang ba des snang bar gyur nas mig dang / bzhin rgyas par gyur nas
28a2(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
28a3(rgyud): kyi de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i brda' mdzad de/ tshigs su bcad pa yang 'di gsungs so/ /sems can dag pa zla bzhin tshur shog
28a4(rgyud): cig |de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs byang chub gzhol/ /bsam yas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chud khyod/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gzo tshur shog cig /
28a5(rgyud): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig /sems can don mdzad bsam
28a6(rgyud): yas gzugs mnga' ba/ /de dag ma lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyod/ /gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog /gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur/ /
28a7(rgyud): gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog cig /brten te byung las skyes ba po/ /dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig /dam pa thob pa tshur shog cig /dam pa sbyin
28b1(rgyud): byed tshur shog cig / dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog /sems can bzang po stobs po che/ /rdo rje lta bu tshur shog cig /
28b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa/ /stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog /rtag tu srid ba gsum de yi/ /snying dga' byed pa tshur shog cig /yang dag lam ni ston byed
28b3(rgyud): pa| |stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig / sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /kun tu bzang po tshur shog cig /kun tu mdzes pa tshur shog cig /srid gsum dbang phyug
28b4(rgyud): tshur shog cig / khyod ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan/ /glang po rna ba khyod tshur shog /sna tshogs gzugs can 'khrul med khyod/ /mthong na dga' ba tshur shog cig /'gro lding
28b5(rgyud): ba yi gzugs can tshur/ /tshur shog na da ku be ra/ /rtag tu sna tshogs gos phreng 'chang / /cod pan mgul pa tshur shog cig /mi 'jigs thob pa tshur shog cig /'jigs pa
28b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa tshur shog cig / sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyi shol ma byed tshur shog cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas/
28b7(rgyud): 'ong ba la 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA a bisma ye bai sha ra d+ya mu khe b+ha ga ba ti badzra a ma li
29a1(rgyud): ni mA bi laM ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par
29a2(rgyud): gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la
29a3(rgyud): smras pa/ grogs po dag /tshur shog bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni
29a4(rgyud): bskor/ nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
29a5(rgyud): dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba stong phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po
29a6(rgyud): ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas
29a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhon du rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po/ bka' stsal pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
29b1(rgyud): shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi
29b2(rgyud): ba'i slad du shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs
29b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par
29b4(rgyud): z hugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs shing
29b5(rgyud): rgya che ba nor bu chen po'i ka ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bu du mas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las shing sA la
29b6(rgyud): gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par spras pa/ mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu'i phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig sna gnyis kyi dra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu
29b7(rgyud): g.yer ka'i dra bas steng gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba/ lha'i ras bcos ma dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob
30a1(rgyud): pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rol mo byed cing snyan par smra la gdu bu dang / rna
30a2(rgyud): cha gdub 'khor gyis brgyan cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba/ rin po che chen po'i bra re kun tu bres pa/ phyogs bai DUR+ya chen pos legs par spras pa/
30a3(rgyud): ka tsa li di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i thim skas kyi phreng gis rnam par spras pa/
30a4(rgyud): ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / bya'i tshogs du ma sgra 'byin ba dang / lha'i me tog
30a5(rgyud): up+ta la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad+ma dang / ka la ra ka dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing byang chub sems dpa'
30a6(rgyud): yongs su spyad par bya ba/ lha'i tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog ma can dag gis kun nas mdzes par byas pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i
30a7(rgyud): me tog man dA ra ba dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sa brtol dang / sa brtol chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa/ a ga ru nag po'i bdug
30b1(rgyud): pa'i sprin mang pos khebs pas rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi so so'i gnas bsam pa ji
30b2(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du las kyis bskyed pa de dag mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re la yang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu
30b3(rgyud): drug rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su spyad par bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor
30b4(rgyud): pu rin po che chen po dag bkod do/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad la rgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan sgreng bas mdzes
30b5(rgyud): par byas so/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu yang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri rnams sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang be DUR+ya chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin can
30b6(rgyud): te| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shin tu phyis pa'i me long ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing
30b7(rgyud): gsal ba ste/ bai DUR+ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang ngo / /dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
31a1(rgyud): seng+ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che chen po'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to/ /sems can thams cad nye bar 'chi
31a2(rgyud): ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu babs par mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam
31a3(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
31a4(rgyud): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos
31a5(rgyud): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos khang pa brtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas
31a6(rgyud): blangs te/ steng gi bar snang las babs te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
31a7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ngo / /khang ba brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
31b1(rgyud): nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur nas gang dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi'am
31b2(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang / steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum
31b3(rgyud): phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba'i nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis phan
31b4(rgyud): tshun rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thob pa dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs thob
31b5(rgyud): pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong ltar lha ma mer rnam par mdzes pa mthong nas de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis
31b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum phrag
31b7(rgyud): drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi steng gi bar snang la lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gda' zhing / bcom ldan 'das/ rtogs par dka' la brjod par dka' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad
32a1(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang
32a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i 'khor chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
32a3(rgyud): po zhes bya ba de nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam
32a4(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi
32a5(rgyud): spyod pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ 'di ni chos gang gi yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug pa'o/ /
32a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu
32a7(rgyud): 'dri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gi lan 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam
32b1(rgyud): gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng
32b2(rgyud): ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul te/ char du phab nas steng gi
32b3(rgyud): nam mkha' las babs te khang pa brtsegs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /sku dang gsung dang
32b4(rgyud): thugs mkhyen pas/ /rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang po pa/ /rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa/ /phyag 'tshal sems can dag khyod la/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang / /sna
32b5(rgyud): dang de bzhin lce dang ni/ /lus dang de bzhin yid kyang ni/ /smra ba'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya yul can btsal ba yi/ /
32b6(rgyud): dngos po kun las rnam grol ba/ /rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa/ /sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur
32b7(rgyud): 'jig rten du/ /mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu dga'/ /khyod ni sems can srog ma lags/ /gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags/ /dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung / /ji
33a1(rgyud): ltar ma lags ci ma lags/ /khyod ni brten nas byung ba tsam/ /sgyu ma lta bur dngos po spangs/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni/ /thugs su khyod
33a2(rgyud): chud rkang gnyis mchog / khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /stong pa nyid kyang mchis ma lags/ /stong dang mi stong rnam par grol/ /nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
33a3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas g.yog 'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das
33a4(rgyud): la brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de
33a5(rgyud): nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang / bkod pa de dag dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa de dag las theg pa chen po'i thog ma'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur
33a6(rgyud): zhes grag go / gzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ /chos nyid gcig tu dag pa ste/ /khyed cag the tshom dwogs spongs la/ /kye ma'o 'di la brtson par gyis/ /theg
33a7(rgyud): pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni/ /sngon gyi spyod pa bla na med/ /spyod pa'i rgyal po bskyed che ba/ /kun gyis shin tu thob par gyis/ /sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams/ /yongs su
33b1(rgyud): dag pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /rtag tu 'di na mdzes la ltos/ /ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la/ /gang du'ang spyod par mi gnas kyang / /gang dag
33b2(rgyud): spyod pa rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun la gnas par gyur/ /'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni/ /rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni/ /lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang / /yid du snang ba ma
33b3(rgyud): lags so/ /dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni/ /gang gi tshe na sbyangs gyur pa/ /de tshe bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /ring ba ma lags nye ma
33b4(rgyud): lags/ /nang dang phyi ni ma lags te/ /rtag tu nam mkha' 'drar gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor pa ni chen po snang / /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
33b5(rgyud): bzang pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag brjod ma thag tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
33b6(rgyud): 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan
33b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de
34a1(rgyud): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
34a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci dang / ci 'dod pa dris shig /ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang
34a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la
34a4(rgyud): 'jug pa/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ji lta bu zhig lags/ spyod
34a5(rgyud): pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes
34a6(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sems can chen po/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri ba yang legs so/ /de'i phyir legs
34a7(rgyud): par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la theg pa chen po zhes
34b1(rgyud): bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub po/ /rigs kyi bu/ gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhi'o/ /de yang snying rje chen po sngon
