34b2(rgyud): du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang / dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang theg
34b3(rgyud): pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o/ /de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o/ /'dus ma byas kyis
34b4(rgyud): rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid ni theg pa chen po'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rigs
34b5(rgyud): kyi bu/ 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mngon du
34b6(rgyud): byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang / dus kyi dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ bya
34b7(rgyud): ba dang / las kyis kun tu bslang ba'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen
35a1(rgyud): po nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni
35a2(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi chig bla dwags so/ /bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni mtha'
35a3(rgyud): gnyis la mi ltos pa ste/ de la gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang yang med do/ /gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo
35a4(rgyud): med pa de la spyod pa med do/ /gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /gang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /gang dngos po thams
35a5(rgyud): cad dang bral ba de mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /gang mi 'khrugs pa de chos so/ /chos gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /gang de bzhin
35a6(rgyud): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ bden pa gang yin pa de yod pa'o/ /yod pa gang yin pa de brdzun ma yin pa'o/ /gang
35a7(rgyud): brdzun ma yin pa de yang dag ba'o/ /yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye
35b1(rgyud): shes so/ /ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni btags pa'o/ /btags pa gang yin pa
35b2(rgyud): de ni rtog pa'o/ /rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te/ kun rdzob yod pas spyod pa btags so/ /btags pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
35b3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi pham par byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya
35b4(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa 'jig rten du
35b5(rgyud): kun tu ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la sogs pa dus dang / yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can
35b6(rgyud): rnams la chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de ni yang dag pa'i phul yin te/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba/ yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o/ /de ci'i
35b7(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi
36a1(rgyud): dmigs te ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ni spyod pa yang med/ mi spyod pa yang med/ bslab pa yang med/ bslab pa ma yin pa yang
36a2(rgyud): med| 'dul ba yang med/ 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do/ /de la ni lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi 'jug pa'am/ ldog ba mi dmigs so/ /de de bzhin gshegs
36a3(rgyud): pa'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge
36a4(rgyud): 'dun zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ klu zhes bya ba ba'am/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba 'am/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
36a5(rgyud): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba 'am/ med ces bya ba 'am/ bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mya ngan
36a6(rgyud): las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/ thar pa zhes bya ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ni dus zhes bya ba 'am/ tshod ces bya ba 'am/ skad cig ces bya
36a7(rgyud): ba 'am/ yud tsam zhes bya ba 'am/ thang cig ces bya ba med do/ /de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am/ skar ma zhes bya ba 'am/ nyi ma zhes bya ba 'am/ me zhes bya ba 'am/ rlung zhes
36b1(rgyud): bya ba 'am/ chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyin mo zhes bya ba 'am/ dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am/ lo khyud 'khor zhes bya ba 'am/ zla ba zhes
36b2(rgyud): bya ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na rtog pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar ltung ba ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtags pa'i sgo ji snyed pa de
36b3(rgyud): dag thams cad na de la mi 'gyur zhing med de mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ de la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo / /
36b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni gnyis su med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med
36b5(rgyud): pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyad pa spyod pa'i
36b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/ /bslab pa ma yin pa ni byang chub
36b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i bslab pa'o/ /thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o/ /rtsom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsom pa'o/ /'dul ba ma yin pa de
37a1(rgyud): ni 'dul ba'o/ /gdags su med pa ni 'dogs pa'o/ /mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/ /bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen
37a2(rgyud): bkur byed pa'o/ /mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o/ /khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o/ /'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o/ /gnas pa med pa ni gnas so/ /stong pa nyid ma
37a3(rgyud): yin pa ni stong pa nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes pa med pa/ thob pa med pa/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa/ mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/
37a4(rgyud): rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa spyad pa'o/ /gang du yang mi chags pa'o/ /gang du yang rjes su chags
37a5(rgyud): pa med do/ /gang du yang khong khro ba med do/ /gang du yang zhe sdang ba med do/ /de mi snang / ma rmongs/ phyin ci ma log pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog
37a6(rgyud): pa| zhi ba/ legs par gnas pa/ zla med pa/ mi g.yo ba/ rab tu mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi
37a7(rgyud): skyo ba/ dus gsum yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/ du ba 'am/ sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par
37b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di lta
37b2(rgyud): bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i
37b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i rtog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung
37b4(rgyud): bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
37b5(rgyud): bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa /ngo mtshar to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang dag gi rna lam
37b6(rgyud): du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na gang dag nyan pa dang / 'chad ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa dag lta
37b7(rgyud): smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni theg
38a1(rgyud): p a chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul
38a2(rgyud): la skal ba mchis pa lags so/ /bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du
38a3(rgyud): gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
38a4(rgyud): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
38a5(rgyud): pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/ gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brjod
38a6(rgyud): cing shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdo rje chen po
38a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun
38b1(rgyud): gsol te/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'tsho 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
38b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad slod nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis
38b3(rgyud): rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA oM badzra ka ra khaM swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo
38b4(rgyud): rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
38b5(rgyud): zhugs so/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing 'khod do/ /'jam
38b6(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
38b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhus pa/ gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/ /rnam par
39a1(rgyud): 'dren rnams mi gsung las/ /bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis/ /dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'/ /gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che/ /
39a2(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / /don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thob/ /gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/ /theg pa chen po thams
39a3(rgyud): cad mkhyen/ /sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ /nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad/ /sA la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che/ /spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i
39a4(rgyud): gnas/ /sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pa/ /gsang sngags shes las byung bar bshad/ /gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /
39a5(rgyud): mgon po gang dag da lta byung / /rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shing / /gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/ /theg pa chen
39a6(rgyud): po dbang bskur 'di/ /bde gshegs sras la rab tu stsol/ /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa/ /kun gyi dbang ni bdag lags so/ /'jig rten phan par 'tshal bas na/ /
39a7(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'tshal/ /bstan pa kun la bsrung ba dang / /dam chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du/ /bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
39b1(rgyud): kyi dbang bskur stsol/ /gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/ /theg chen rtogs par khong du chud/ /sngon gyi smon lam nges byung ba/ /sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags/ /
39b2(rgyud): thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig te/ /bde gshegs sras po chags med pa/ /byang chub mthar thug dbang thob lags/ /gsang sngags mgon
39b3(rgyud): pos rnam kun tu/ /'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/ /ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs/ /thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin
39b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas/ /dpa' bo che rnams the tshom dang / /de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol/ /da ni dus la bab lags na/ /phyi bshol ma mdzad
39b5(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
39b6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa/ /'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas/ /chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mchog /rtag tu mnyam
39b7(rgyud): gzhag rnams kyis ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te de rtogs bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
40a1(rgyud): tshal stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/ sgo
40a2(rgyud): khang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bus brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu bres par byin gyis
40a3(rgyud): brlabs te dbus su rdo rje pad+ma'i khri dang / phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang / rdo rje'i phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i phreng
40a4(rgyud): ba dang / rdo rje'i srad bus bres pa dang / rdo rje bcing bas bcings pa dang / rdo rje'i phur bu dag gdab pa dang / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas
40a5(rgyud): steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo / /'od zer de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
40a6(rgyud): 'khor la snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs
40a7(rgyud): ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a pra ti ha ta ba la/
40b1(rgyud): mahA badzra A dz+nyA ka ra Na/ na mo stu te swAhA/ de nas thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag
40b2(rgyud): tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid
40b3(rgyud): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / des ma la sogs pa pha rol
40b4(rgyud): tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
40b5(rgyud): gis kun tu bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
40b6(rgyud): du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
40b7(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ma ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ kye ma/ byang
41a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o/ /lag na rdo rje'o/ /zhes brjod do// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang
41a2(rgyud): bskur ba/ bam po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/
41a3(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA gu h+ya badzra d+ha ra swAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
41a4(rgyud): cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ gsang ba'i bdag po'o/ gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags
41a5(rgyud): nas| 'di lta ste/ snying po 'di'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin
41a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugs so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun tu
41a7(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA
41b1(rgyud): badzra d+ha ra bi ra bi ra bi ki ra bi ki ra swAhA/ rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi
41b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / de
41b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang
41b4(rgyud): bo bskyed pa rnams dang / las dang po pa rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang / mdun dang / ma nyal ba'am/ gnyid kyis log pa'am/ chos ston pa'am/
41b5(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ sems can gyi don byed pa'am/ sprul pa rab tu byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par
41b6(rgyud): ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan du kun tu snang ngo / /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa zhes bya ba rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs
41b7(rgyud): pa| na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA dig badzra Ta Ta Ta Ta TaM swAhA/ phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sems can
42a1(rgyud): ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings par snang ngo / /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya
42a2(rgyud): ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA Tha Tha Tha Tha ThaM swA hA/ sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ kye ma/ byang chub
42a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa
42a4(rgyud): 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ya Ta ya TaM swAhA/ sa 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma
42a5(rgyud): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
42a6(rgyud): 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod
42a7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu be b+h+yaH sarba thA ts+tshin+da sarba bI r+yAn+tu ra ga de ma pra barma lab+d+ha bi dza ye swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang gi
42b1(rgyud): 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang
42b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin
42b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra yak+Sha ni gr-i ha da ta swA hA/ gnod
42b4(rgyud): sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
42b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i
42b6(rgyud): tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ha ra ha ra nA ga badzra swA hA/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma
42b7(rgyud): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra
43a1(rgyud): gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
43a2(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ma tha ma tha badzra gan+d+harba hr-i da ya swAhA/ rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
43a3(rgyud): thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu
43a4(rgyud): 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
43a5(rgyud): sarba thA badzra pi ta ta d+ha ra ka ra haM ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
43a6(rgyud): dang | nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje'o
43a7(rgyud): zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
43b1(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra kin+na ra dan+da bi je ya shap+ta swA hA/ de nas mi'am ci'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mi
43b2(rgyud): 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /
43b3(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ma ho ra ga badzra dz+wA lA ya swAhA/ de nas rdo rje
43b4(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa'
43b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin
43b6(rgyud): po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra rak+Sha sa krU ra da ha pa tsa TuM TuM TuM TuM swAhA/ de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma
43b7(rgyud): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin
44a1(rgyud): po'i rdo rje'i zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i
44a2(rgyud): snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra hr-i da he ta swAhA/ de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig
44a3(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mkha'
44a4(rgyud): 'gro ma'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'byung bo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta
44a5(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ha le hu le badzra ma hA b+hu te shwa ra swAhA/ rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
44a6(rgyud): thams cad dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'byung po'i rdo rje chen po'o zhes sgra gcig
44a7(rgyud): nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
44b1(rgyud): thA mahA badzra pi shA tsi shwa ra bi shwa hr-i da ya gaM mi tsi mi tsi ma Ta ma Ta badzra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
44b2(rgyud): cad dang / sha za'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes
44b3(rgyud): grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra du ti pi shA tsi ki ri
44b4(rgyud): mi ri mi le swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sha za mo'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang
44b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za mo'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje
44b6(rgyud): srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ka rA li rAk+Sha si hA ri mi ri swAhA/ rdo rje srin mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig
44b7(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin mo'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin mo'i rdo rje'o
45a1(rgyud): zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maH
45a2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ostA ra ka badzra hi si swAhA/ gnon po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnon
45a3(rgyud): po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnon po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags
45a4(rgyud): so| |yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ki li ki
45a5(rgyud): li badzra bi d+ha hi ni swAhA/ grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas thams
45a6(rgyud): cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin
45a7(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis brjod byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA graM graM s+pha ra Na badzra swAhA/ brjed byed kyi
45b1(rgyud): gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / brjod byed kyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa'
45b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni brjed byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang gdon thams cad
45b3(rgyud): bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi ra badzra sarba gra ha ni kr-in+ta na dzA Ti ba laM po da ra raT raT swA hA/ gdon thams cad bzlog
45b4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gdon thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
45b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs
45b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA badzraM badzraM saM saM swAhA/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
45b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni
46a1(rgyud): lha la sogs pa'i snying po rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdan thams
46a2(rgyud): cad tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+hai Sha dz+nya badzra a mr-i ta b+ha ba swA hA/ rtsi sman chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di
46a3(rgyud): dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rtsi sman chen po'i gnas rnams su/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
46a4(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rtsi sman gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi nad gdon bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs
46a5(rgyud): pa| na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tra Ta tra Ta badzra swAhA/ nad bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
46a6(rgyud): thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes
46a7(rgyud): grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a mr-i tod
46b1(rgyud): b+ha ba badzra la la la la swA hA/ rga ba 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46b2(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo
46b3(rgyud): rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ka di badzra dza ya ha ha swA hA/ 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
46b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas
46b5(rgyud): gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
46b6(rgyud): sarba thA ra ba ma badzra sarba shri yaM a b+hu da ya na da da ma hA kA ru Ni ka d+ha ka d+ha ka swA hA/ rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
46b7(rgyud): 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes
47a1(rgyud): grags so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/
47a2(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA oM badzra tsakra brti hUM swA hA/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
47a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad dang / lha
47a4(rgyud): dang | klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs
47a5(rgyud): pa'i gnas thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de
47a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA dzrI shrI hUM swA hA/ de nas
47a7(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i snying po rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
47b1(rgyud): rdo rje la byin no/ /byin nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin stug po'i dra ba chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / shing sA la sna
47b2(rgyud): tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
47b3(rgyud): s tobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang
47b4(rgyud): bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
47b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rjes dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to/ /ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las
47b6(rgyud): byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no/ /'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so/ /rdo rje'i snying po thams cad khyod la bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs
47b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis khyod la bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang / bsrung bar gnang ngo / /khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ da rang gi
48a1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig / rigs kyi bu/ lag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig /de skad ces bka'
48a2(rgyud): stsal pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos kyi rjes ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'chal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
48a3(rgyud): mchog tu ngo mtshar thob pa dang / bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
48a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i
48a5(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la
48a6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /stong gsum gyi
48a7(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /
48b1(rgyud): 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'o/ /nub phyogs mtho na shar
48b2(rgyud): phyogs dma'o/ /lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'o/ /byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'o/ /dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o/ /mtha' mthon dbus dma'o/ /snang ba chen
48b3(rgyud): po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/ /gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar byas nas sems can gang
48b4(rgyud): dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun blta zhing gcig gis gcig mthong nas sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir skyes pa blta/ sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir
48b5(rgyud): skyes pa blta'o snyam mo/ /de dag gis bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to/ /de
48b6(rgyud): d ag gis chos de thos nas dad pa rnyed de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der lag na rdo
48b7(rgyud): rje dbang bskur ba chen pos dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dong ngo / /
49a1(rgyud): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam de dang / thang cig de la chad par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dud
49a2(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnas kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to/ /yi dwags kyi gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ra bas kun tu bskor ba dang / lha'i zas dang / skom
49a3(rgyud): dang | yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lha'i lus dang ldan par gyur to/ /shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags stug po 'di thams cad kyang
49a4(rgyud): snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu nyi ma dang / zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyang lha ma me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin te/ de
49a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por gyur to/ /byang chub sems
49a6(rgyud): d pa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo'i rgyal po dag byung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ni
49a7(rgyud): bsgrags/ lag na rdo rje ni thogs/ gdong gi dpral ba'i khro gnyer ni bsnyer/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni dbyangs gcig gis go bar byed cing /
49b1(rgyud): kye| ma rungs pa yi srin po dang / /pha yi mtshun dang sha za dang / /ma mo'i gdon dang 'byung po dang / /brjed byed grub pa sprul 'dzin bcas/ /gnon po bgegs dang log
49b2(rgyud): 'dren sogs/ /gdon gyi tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ /ser sna yongs su btang byos la/ /dul ba'i sems kyis mnyam gzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
49b3(rgyud): la| |mkhas pa dag ni skyabs su deng / /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan de/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa/ /nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar/ /yid 'ong khang pa brtsegs na bzhugs/
49b4(rgyud): deng la mgon po de las ni/ /dam tshig yongs su stsal byos la/ /nga rgyal nga yi med byos te/ /sa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byos/ /gzhan du khyed cag de ring nyid/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rab
49b5(rgyud): 'khrugs pa/ /'bar ba 'jigs chen 'di dag gis/ /mgo ni shin tu 'gems par 'gyur/ /de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po dag /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /btsal med
49b6(rgyud): tshig gis go byas nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan dengs shig /ces tshig tu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de'i tshe 'byung bo'i tshogs thams cad byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
49b7(rgyud): rje'i bstan pa 'di 'tshol zhing / sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo / /chos la skyabs su dong ngo / /dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
50a1(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe rang gi snying po smras pa/
50a2(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras ma thag tu de nas
50a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
50a4(rgyud): ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa'
50a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag po'o/ /lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /de thos nas byang chub
50a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu btab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po'i
50a7(rgyud): snying po 'di smras nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil
50b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po smras so/ /de la slob dpon gsang sngags kyi/ /de nyid don mkhas tshul khrims ldan/ /sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa dang / /snying rje'i rang bzhin bzod dang
50b2(rgyud): ldan| |sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun sems/ /nges pa dang ni dus shes pa/ /g.yer ba sro shi ma yin pa/ /mdangs che zab mo'i chos la mos/ /bzlas brjod la brtson rtag
50b3(rgyud): tu ni| |bsam gtan byed pa la dga' zhing / /lag na rdo rje'i ming thos pa'i/ /sngags pa de yis rtag par ni/ /mchil ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed/ /rmi yang lag na rdo rje la/ /
50b4(rgyud): yid gnyis the tshom med pa dang / /dus shes de bzhin tshod shes shing / /byas gzo de bzhin bden smra ba/ /slob dpon de lta bus ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/
50b5(rgyud): sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje
50b6(rgyud): drag po'i snying pos yungs kar dang / mngar gsum bsres pa dag lan khrir sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'dug ste/
50b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /drag po'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang / bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu sa brtag par
51a1(rgyud): bya ste/ rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ skye ba po grog sbur la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du yang shis pa'o/ /der
51a2(rgyud): gza' gtum po la ma bab pa/ tshes grangs ngan pa ma yin pa/ mi mthun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang /
51a3(rgyud): gza' bzang por mngon pa la las brtsams na shis par 'gyur ro/ /dmar dang ser dang dkar dang nag /'dren ma pa ni lnga pa yin/ /gang yang rung ba'i sa der ni/ /
51a4(rgyud): mkhas pas khru gang tsam brkos nas/ /sngags pa yis ni brkos pa de/ /sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/ /lhag na rnam pa kun tu mchog /kha da chad ni 'bring du brjod/ /
51a5(rgyud): gang bar ma gyur sa de spang / /mkhas pas der ni brtsam mi bya/ /dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan/ /dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod/ /ser po rgyas par shes par bya/ /nag
51a6(rgyud): po drag shul spyod par shes/ /der ni mchod yon gtor ma dang / /mar me spos dang bdug pa dag /bsgrims te byin nas bsrung bya ste/ /mnyam par gzhag nas sa la
51a7(rgyud): brjod/ /de yi nub mos der ni/ /ku sha bting ba'i steng du nyal/ /gal te sa ni rung gyur na/ /der ni bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas mi mchog gis/ /de ni
51b1(rgyud): bgegs med yin zhes brjod/ /gzhan du na ni der mi bri/ /bgegs dang bcas pas phung bar 'gyur/ de nas sngags pa langs nas ni/ /de yi nyin mo mkhas pa yis/ /sa
51b2(rgyud): ni shin tu yongs sbyangs phyir/ /sbyin sreg bya ba 'di bya ste/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni 'o ma dang / /mar ba sres sbyin sreg mchog tu 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin blugs ni/ /nyi
51b3(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas sngags pas sa brkos la/ /sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo / /yang na dkyil 'khor las kyi tshe/ /sngags pas spos kyis sa dgang ngo / /legs
51b4(rgyud): par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya/ /phyogs cha dag dang sgo yi rnams/ /kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du/ /rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya/ /bye brag tu ni sa dbus su/ /rin chen sna
51b5(rgyud): lnga gzhag par bya/ /de nas yon tan ldan pa yi/ /slob ma dag ni gdams te gzung / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnam kun gyis/ /bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya/ /mchog sbyin
51b6(rgyud): rdo rje blo ldan gyi/ /gsang sngags 'di ni zlos pa ni/ /skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas/ /de dag thog mar brtag par bya/ /yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni/ /shin tu brtags
51b7(rgyud): nas gzung bar bya/ /rig dang gzo ni phun sum tshogs/ /gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang / /shes rab ldan brtan byas gzo dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang / /
52a1(rgyud): gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang / /gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' kun la yang / /yang dag rtag tu gus
52a2(rgyud): gnas dang / /pha la gus dang ma la gus/ /bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang / /gang dag pha rol don spyod la/ /snying nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang / /gang dag drang zhing des pa
52a3(rgyud): dang | |g.yo sgyu med cing chos brtson dang / /lus dang ngag dang yid dag pa/ /de dag nye bar rtag gzung bya/ /gang dag snying nas 'jig rten 'di/ /'jig rten pha rol
52a4(rgyud): yid ches dang / /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson zhing / /sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'dod pa/ /de dag bsgrims te gzung
52a5(rgyud): bar bya/ /nyan thos theg pa can rnams min/ /zhar ba lag zha zam dang / /rgur po 'on pa mi thung dang / /gang ngag sna leb gyur pa dang / /de bzhin mi g.yon gnong bag can//
52a6(rgyud): 'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang / /mkhas snyems sems dang g.yo can dang / /sngags kyi theg pa skyid chen gyi/ /theg pa la ni ma mos pa/ /de dag nam yang gzung mi bya//
52a7(rgyud): de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med/ /bstan bcos mi shes mi gzung ste/ /thor bu thor bu 'dzin pa dang / /de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa/ /smad pa de dag ring du spang / /gang dag
52b1(rgyud): yan lag ma tshang dang / /rkang zha dag dang theng po dang / /yan lag lhag par gyur pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te yongs su spang / /ji skad smos pa'i slob ma rnams/ /
52b2(rgyud): de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te/ /gcig pu yod na'ang de gzung ngo / /yang na slob ma bzhi zhig gzung / /de nas smyung ba byed bcug la/ /spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /
52b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nang gi sa la ni/ /ku sha gding ba bting ba la/ /des pas slob ma lhan cig tu/ /de ni rab tu nyal bar bya/ /slob dpon yud tsam yud tsam zhing / /de tshe slob ma
52b4(rgyud): rnams la ni/ /theg chen zab mo rgya chen gyi/ /chos kyang rab tu bshad par bya/ /gsang sngags brjod las byung ba yi/ /yon tan kun tu brjod na phan/ /byang chub sems
52b5(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi ni/ /rdzu 'phrul la sogs yongs su brjod/ /pha rol rgyu la snying rje ba/ /de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod/ /nam gyi bzhi cha lus pa'i tshe/ /gal te rmi lam bzang
52b6(rgyud): rmi na/ /dkon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis/ /nam langs pa dang legs rab tu/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni/ /khyed kyis de dag brjod par gyis/ /pad+ma'i
52b7(rgyud): steng du 'dug na mchog / gzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /rgya mtsho mthong bar rmis pa dang / /rkyal dang 'thung pa'ang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas mthong na snying dga' ste/ /
53a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /nyan thos dag dang gang mkhas pa/ /de dag mthong na snying
53a2(rgyud): dga' 'o/ /me yi phung po grags pa dang / /ba glang khyu mchog glang chen dregs/ /rta ni dkar por gang 'gyur ba/ /de dag mthong dang zhon pa dang / /ba lang khyu yang shis
53a3(rgyud): pa yin/ /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /rgyal po dge bar grags pa dang / /sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang / /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /de dag mthong na shis par 'gyur//
53a4(rgyud): rmi lam smra zhing gtam zer dang / /rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang / /sha chen za bar byed pa dang / /khrag gis 'khru bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang / /zho dang
53a5(rgyud): 'bras chan za ba dang / /chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang / /skra 'breg pa ni mchog yin no/ /so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang / /ri dang shing ni n+ya gro d+ha/ /de la 'dzegs pa
53a6(rgyud): shis par 'gyur/ /legs so bu zhe'am blo ldan zhes/ /sgra ni de skad thos pa dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i bud med dang / /nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang / /tshangs pa drag po
53a7(rgyud): nyi ma dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang / /lus ngan po dang nor sbyin dang / /brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang / /de dag mthong ngam smra ba dang / /'bel gtam byed na nges par
53b1(rgyud): 'grub/ /gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag /dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung / /rmi lam de las bzlog pa dag /'jigs med rnams kyis gzung mi bya/ /sa la rgyug dang
53b2(rgyud): 'chong ba dang / /gar byed pa dang glu len dang / /dgod dang bong bu rnga mo la/ /zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin/ /'bru mar gyis ni lus bskus dang / /gcer bu dag dang smra ba dang / /
53b3(rgyud): zhar ba theng po sgur po dang / /mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang / /phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang / /bong bu rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /ma he rnga mo ce spyang dag /rmi lam mthong na rtag
53b4(rgyud): tu smad/ /rtse gsum rtse gsum gdengs thogs dang / /mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang / /gcer bu dag dang sna leb dang / /sdigs mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang / /mdog
53b5(rgyud): gnag mi bzad chen po dang / /gos sngon gzugs byang mi sdug pa/ /su yis rmi lam rmis pa ni/ /de la dngos grub yod mi 'gyur/ /zungs shig rgyobs shig choms shig
53b6(rgyud): ce'am/ /zo zhig ces pa'i mi bzad sgra/ /drag po 'jigs byed khro thos dang / /phung dang ma rnyed thos pa dang / /bya rgod bzhad dang bya dkar dang / /'ug pa bya rog byi la dang / /byi ba
53b7(rgyud): sdig pa sre mo sbrul/ /gang yang gzhan dag skye bo gdug /de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam/ /reg par gyur na'ang mi dge 'o/ /de nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying
54a1(rgyud): pos ba'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btab te/ slob ma bos la rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te/ /shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma kong bu'am/
54a2(rgyud): snyim pa'i nang du snod du bya ba sbyin zhing / khyed de ring zas kyi tshod shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi sreg blugs
54a3(rgyud): dang | yam sreg shing nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas a shwat+tha'i shing ngam/ /yang na u du bA ra las/ /sor brgyad tsam gyi so shing bya/ /thog ma gcig ni
54a4(rgyud): me tog brgyan/ /rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab la/ /de dag la ni bca' phyir sbyin/ /shar gyi phyogs su mdun bstan nam/ /yang na byang phyogs bstan te gzhag /gsang
54a5(rgyud): sngags mgon po dran byas la/ /gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya/ /de nas phyi nyin slob ma rnams/ /smyung ba byed du bcug nas su/ /rdo rje mi pham me zhes bya/ /srid pa
54a6(rgyud): gsum po rmongs byed pa/ /rtag dran bya phyir de dag la/ /dri ma med pa'i gzungs byin bya/ /snying du sdug pa'i dam tshig brjod/ /nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod/ /sdig
54a7(rgyud): pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ /mchog tu bkra shis byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa/ /thams cad kyis ni ma yin te/ /sdig pa thams cad byang byed pa/ /de
54b1(rgyud): ni kun tu rtag dran bya/ /slob dpon gyis ni thams cad du/ /rtag tu mnyam par gzhag sems kyis/ /sna lnga'i tshon las byas pa yi/ /thig skud rab tu bzang blangs la/ /
54b2(rgyud): bsgrims te sa 'di thams cad la/ /thig ni legs par gdab par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su/ /sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'chang
54b3(rgyud): ba dang / /'khor los bsgyur ba dran byas la/ /bdag nyid der bsgoms byas nas su/ /de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la/ /de nas shar phyogs kha bstan te/ /shar phyogs
54b4(rgyud): nyid du thig gdab bo/ /de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis/ /nub phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas su/ /nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo/ /de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis/ /byang
54b5(rgyud): phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ /byang phyogs su ni thig gdab bo/ /de nas yang ni bsgyur byas la/ /lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /rnam par dbye ba shes pa yis/ /lho phyogs
54b6(rgyud): nyid du thig gdab bo/ /de ltar nang logs dkyil 'khor ni/ /cha brgyad yod pa rab tu bya/ /de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor byas la/ /kun
54b7(rgyud): tu gru bzhi lham par ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te thig gdab pa/ /dbus kyi gnas nas byung nas su/ /me yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/ /sngags pas sngags kyi cho ga
55a1(rgyud): bzhin/ /shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /gus pas dbang ldan phyogs song la/ /nub phyogs su ni kha
55a2(rgyud): bltas te/ /byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas song nas su/ /rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/ /der ni lho phyogs kha bltas la/ /nub
55a3(rgyud): phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /gnas de nas ni de byung la/ /bden bral phyogs su dong nas su/ /me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /thig skud legs par gdab par bya/ /kun
55a4(rgyud): tu gru bzhi lham par ni/ /de ltar gnas de byas nas su/ /de nas phyi rol de bzhin du/ /cho ga bzhin du cha brgyad bya/ /tshad ni bcu drug khru yin te/ /slob dpon nyid kyi
55a5(rgyud): khru yis so/ /de nas byung la blo ldan gyis/ /cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya/ /phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni/ /khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /der yang snga ma ji bzhin du/ /cha
55a6(rgyud): brgyad nyid du gcad par bya/ /brgyad pa nas ni gzung nas su/ /sngags pa yis ni thams cad du/ /'khor sa'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /gnas gsum dag tu nges par
55a7(rgyud): yang | |cha brgyad gang dag 'tsham pa yi/ /thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa bar ma la/ /snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes nas/ /rim pa gsum par
55b1(rgyud): sum 'gyur dang / /sgo gang dag kyang mkhas pas bya/ /rta babs dag gi tshad rnams ni/ /dbus kyi cha dang mnyam par bya/ /lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang / /sgo gang dag ni bya
55b2(rgyud): bar bya/ /rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor legs phye la/ /sngags mgon gnas la 'dug nas su/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /tshon rtsi
55b3(rgyud): 'dir ni bye brag tu/ /rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod/ /sA lu btags pa'i phye yang rung / /ji ltar 'byor pas byar yang rung / /gos dkar bgos shing gtsang byas la/ /dul
55b4(rgyud): zhing ze'u kha bcings nas su/ /bsgrims te byang shar phyogs mtshams nas/ /tshon rtsi dag ni dgye bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis sam/ /yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas
55b5(rgyud): sam| |snod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam/ /rig byed 'don pa'i lag pas so/ /thog mar dkar po dgye bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye/ /de yi 'og tu ser po ste/ /de yi
55b6(rgyud): 'og tu ljang ku dgye/ /thams cad dag ni nang rol tu/ /sngags pas tshon rtsi nag po dgye/ /cha brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa/ /dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
55b7(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi ste/ /de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod/ /gdan ni pad+mar bstan pa ste/ /mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin/ /de yi steng du rdo rje gzhag /de bzhin rdo rje gtsug tor
56a1(rgyud): te| |me lce 'bar ba'i snying po bya/ /mdor na sa bon ldan par bya/ /de la shar phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog gzhag par
56a2(rgyud): bya'o| |lho phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o/ /nub phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med do/ /byang phyogs
56a3(rgyud): su ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can no/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su ni de
56a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob bo/ /nub byang gi mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs
56a5(rgyud): pa 'khor ba 'jig go / mdor na dbus kyi pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa ste/ /'dab ma dkar po shar phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni dmar po nyid/ /byang phyogs
56a6(rgyud): su ni ser po ste/ /lho phyogs su ni nag po nyid/ /'dab ma lhag ma rnams kun tu/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dren mar gsungs/ /de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/ /bum pa zla 'od
56a7(rgyud): 'dra ba bri/ /de yi steng du rlung chen ste/ /'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri/ /zla gam 'dra zhing drag po ste/ /'od ni dbyar sprin mdog 'dra la/ /rlung gi steng du me bri ste/ /dbyibs ni
56b1(rgyud): gru gsum gnas pa yin/ /rtags ni 'bras bu zur gsum pa/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/ /'od ni dus mtha'i me dang 'dra/ /de yi snying
56b2(rgyud): po'i dbus su ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba bri bar bya/ /de la bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs sam/ phyag rgya 'am/ yi ge ci rigs su gzhag par bya'o/ /phyag rgya gzhag na
56b3(rgyud): rdo rje ste/ /bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya/ /de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni/ /brgyad po dag tu snga ma bzhin/ /sngags pas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya/ /
56b4(rgyud): de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang bcas
56b5(rgyud): par bri'o/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag
56b6(rgyud): rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs su ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas
56b7(rgyud): par bri'o/ /lho nub kyi mtshams su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
57a1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/ /nub phyogs su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i
57a2(rgyud): phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod pa bri'o/ /nub byang gi mtshams su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa
57a3(rgyud): b ri'o| |byang phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas
57a4(rgyud): pa dgod par bya'o/ /byang shar gyi mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang
57a5(rgyud): bcas pa dgod par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po nang du chud par bri'o/ /de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag
57a6(rgyud): rgya ni dbyug tho yin no/ /'phags skyes po'i phyag rgya ni be con no/ /mig mi bzang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/ /lus ngan gyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o/ /phyi rol 'khor yug chen
57a7(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / mu ran shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de'i
57b1(rgyud): nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de la shar phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i byang
57b2(rgyud): phyogs su ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /tshangs pa'i byang phyogs su ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi wang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa
57b3(rgyud): bri'o| |de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i byang phyogs su ni dpal chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am/ yid bzhin
57b4(rgyud): gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /brgya
57b5(rgyud): byin gyi lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /me'i phyogs su ni drang srong me'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
57b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su ni 'chi bdag gi dril
57b7(rgyud): bu bri'o/ /mtshan mo nag mo'i ni tog go /nag po'i ni zhags pa'o/ /drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ni pad+ma'o/ /khyab 'jug gi
58a1(rgyud): chung ma'i ni 'khor lo'o/ /gzhon nu ma'i ni mdung thung ngo / /phag gi chung ma'i ni tho pa'o/ /tsA muN+Di'i ni mi thod do/ /dbang po'i chung ma'i
58a2(rgyud): ni rdo rje'o/ /lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug tho'o/ /gshin rje'i nub phyogs su ni yi dwags rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sha za rnams
58a3(rgyud): ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /gnon po rnams ni lcags kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /grib gnon rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya
58a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa bri'o/ /brjed byed rnams ni lag pa brang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /
58a5(rgyud): srin mo rnams ni mche ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya 'am/ lce rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje bab col gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /
58a6(rgyud): bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs su ni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
58a7(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse
58b1(rgyud): gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de dang nye bar dka' thub zlog pa rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngos su tshogs kyi
58b2(rgyud): bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i byang phyogs su thags bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa
58b3(rgyud): dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs su ni rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod
58b4(rgyud): sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de dag gi shar phyogs su khyab 'jug la 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang
58b5(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su ni sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i
58b6(rgyud): rgyal po rnams dang / ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/ de la dri za dag gi phyag rgya rnams ni
58b7(rgyud): rnga phre'u dang / pheg rnams so/ /mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi wang la sogs pa brdung bsgreng ba rnams so/ /de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / 'bab chu chen po rnams rang
59a1(rgyud): gi zer chu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de dag gi shar phyogs
59a2(rgyud): su zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po dang / bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub sgor ni ki li ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri ste drag po rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /
59a3(rgyud): byang sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ni dbyug to'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /
59a4(rgyud): shar sgor ni khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /be con sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya dang
59a5(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o/ /lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /mngon phyogs su ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /'og logs su ni rgya mtsho dang /rgya mtsho'i
59a6(rgyud): 'gram na sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /de la tum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to'o/ /rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni mdung thung rtse gsum pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal
59a7(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'o/ /mi pham ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'o/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/ /sring mo bzhi'i lho phyogs su ni smin drug gi bu 'khor dang bcas
59b1(rgyud): pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral gri dang / ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /'khor
59b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o/ /de dang de dag lhag mar brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/ thams cad kyang rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/ /dkyil
59b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi las ci bya ba de thams cad ni rdo rje drag po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ /dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa'i cho ga'o// //
59b4(rgyud): cho ga shes pas de lta bur/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris te/ /byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su/ /rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya/ /de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag /
59b5(rgyud): kha yi cha ga shel kha can/ /mgrin pa ring zhing lto che ba/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya/ /sa bon rin chen sman gyis bkang / /spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang / /kha rgyan yal gas
59b6(rgyud): khebs byas shing / /de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la/ /mgul chings kyis kyang bcings byas pa/ /kha dog ci rigs rnam par dgod/ /sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du/ /bum
59b7(rgyud): pa snga ma ji bzhin du/ /brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste/ /dgu pa de ni bsang gtor bya/ /rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu/ /bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab/ /bcu pa dbus su
60a1(rgyud): shes par bya/ /de ni 'khor los bsgyur la dbul/ /rta babs rnams ni mdzes pa ste/ /rin chen rnam pa bzhi las bya/ /yang na yid 'ong shing
60a2(rgyud): las bya/ /tsan+dan yang na gzhan yang rung / /dum bu ma yin ma grugs pa/ /gas pa med cing 'dzer ba med/ /ba ru na dang sha ma dang / /sal krI kang ka ta yang rung / /rin chen
60a3(rgyud): dril bu rab dbyangs shing / /dar dang ras la sogs pas brgyan/ /khru ni brgyad dam bdun nam drug /me tog phreng dang ldan par 'dod/ /steng du rin chen bla re bre/ /
60a4(rgyud): mu tig rgyan phreng rnam par dbyangs/ /dar dang ras kyang dbyangs par bya/ /dkyil 'khor las ni che bar bya/ /kha dog sna tshogs ba dan rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dbyangs
60a5(rgyud): par bya/ /srad bu la ni brgyu bar bya/ /dril bu sgra 'byung ldan par bya/ /kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams/ /ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/ /rin chen bzhi las byas pa 'am
60a6(rgyud): de med zangs las byas pa'ang rung / /mchod pa'i yon gyi snod bzhi zhig /blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs spos su gsungs pa ni/ /gur gum dang ni
60a7(rgyud): tsan+dan dang / /spri ka la sogs ci yang rung / /srog chags yan lag kun mi rung / /sna tshogs bdug pa dbul bya ste/ /a ga ru dang sgron shing dang / /ga bur shi ri ba sa
60b1(rgyud): ka |ce pog dang ni ru rta dang / /sA la'i shing gi thang chu 'am/ /yang na thang shing thang chu dbul/ /rdo rje 'byung ba'i rig pa 'am/ /rdo rje drag po bzlas brjod bya/ /ut+pal dang pad+ma
60b2(rgyud): mchog / tsam pa ka dang klu shing dang / /ke sa ra dang ma li ka /mya ngan 'tshang dang skya snar dang / /ta ka ra dang bu na ga /dong ka'i me tog mdzes pa yin/ /ka ra bI ra ku mu da/ /
60b3(rgyud): sna ma d+ha nu ka ri yi/ /me tog ci rigs dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin lha bshos sna tshogs te/ /'o thug zho dang 'bras chan dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi rab tu bzang / /bag chos dang ni
60b4(rgyud): la du dang / /sbrang rtsi gzhag pa'i cung beng dang / /a sho brti be na ka /spyan gzigs khaN+Dar grags pa dang / /shi re b+he d+ha ka mo ta/ /gar+b+hod ka ra ka dang ni/ /be reg dang ni dwe tshe
60b5(rgyud): dang / /sha ku la dang par pa ta/ /'bru yi la thug 'breng bu dang / /shun tha ba li ka dag dang / /g+ha ri ka dang swa sti ka /mon sran gre 'u zhu te'u dang / /rtsa ba dang ni drungs pa dang /
60b6(rgyud): 'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang / /sge'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya/ /sran tshod ril bu che chung dang / /b+he ga na dang saM b+ha d+hi/ /bu ram
60b7(rgyud): bsres pa'i khu sman dang / /rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang / /bu ram sna tshogs bcos pa dag /kun tu rnam pa thams cad dbul/ /rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang / /zho
61a1(rgyud): bsrubs bu ram btab nges dbul/ /'o ma legs par btsags pa dang / /de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul/ /kha ra'i dbu ba kha ra dang / /mar
61a2(rgyud): dang bu ram 'bru mar dang / /sprang rtsi dang ni lan tshwa dang / /dge bar grags pa dbul bar bya/ /btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang / /tam bu la dang mal cha dang / /snod spyad
61a3(rgyud): bzang zhing mdzes pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs rtsi sman rnams/ /rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob la dbul/ /de nas so so re re la'ang //
61a4(rgyud): na bza' ras zung re re dbul/ /me long mig sman yid 'ong dang / /dung dang de bzhin gi wang rnams/ /byang chub tshogs ni bkang ba'i phyir/ /mgon po kun la
61a5(rgyud): dbul bar bya/ /skyob pa rnams la thams cad du/ /de ltar legs par mchod byas nas/ /de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya/ /snying po cho ga bzhin du bya/ /sreg
61a6(rgyud): blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig ni/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ /thams cad 'grub byed yid 'ong pa/ /zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o/ /yi ge klog pa bzhi dag kyang / /phyogs bzhi
61a7(rgyud): dag tu gzhag par bya/ /de la shar phyogs gzhag pa ni/ /'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /byang phyogs su ni mdo gzhag pa/ /gser 'od dam par dam pas
61b1(rgyud): bzhed/ /nub phyogs su ni gzhag bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin/ /sdong po bkod pa'i tshul chen ni/ /lho phyogs logs su shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor
61b2(rgyud): lha rnams ci lta bar/ /de dag la yang gus par mchod/ /dam pa'i chos ni bklag pa 'di/ /bsrung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin/ /de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang / /de yi
61b3(rgyud): tshe na dgyes par 'gyur/ /gang dag 'jig rten mi srun pa/ /de dag phyogs phyogs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na rnam kun tu/ /de tshe dam chos bklag par bya/ /slob ma
61b4(rgyud): thams cad bos nas su/ /de dag la ni skyabs gsum sbyin/ /sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya/ /sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug /mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du/ /byang
61b5(rgyud): chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug / rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis/ /de nas kun la bsang gtor bya/ /dam tshig yongs su brjod byas la/ /mkhas pas nang du zhugs
61b6(rgyud): nas su/ /gos rnams yongs su brjes byas te/ /sngags kyis yongs su gdab par bya/ /de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis/ /slob ma de dag gdong bkab la/ /'khor los bsgyur
61b7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig gi / phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching bcug ste/ /lag tu me tog sbyin byas la/ /de tshe snying gar yi ge bsam/ /skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /me tog de dag dor du
62a1(rgyud): gzhug / blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi/ /rna g.yas rdo rje dril bu bzhag /rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi/ /lha mo chen po g.yon par ro/ /me tog rnams ni gang
62a2(rgyud): bab pa/ /lha de de yi yin par 'dod/ /de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas/ /de tshe dam tshig bstan par bya/ /mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'di ltar sbyin sreg rab tu
62a3(rgyud): bya| |de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang de bzhin drag shul
62a4(rgyud): spyod| |sbyin sreg las ni mdor bsdus pa/ /sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod/ /cho ga thams cad rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin tha dad las kyang gsungs/ /sems
62a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du/ /me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi/ /yam sreg shing cis ji lta bur/ /las ni ci zhig brtsam par bgyi/ /khyab bdag thab khung bka' stsol
62a6(rgyud): la| |bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
62a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /khyod kyis dri ba gang byas pa/ /de dag thams cad brjod par bya/ /g.yeng ba med pa'i yid kyis
62b1(rgyud): nyon| |dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni/ /sbyin sreg me thab khung bu bya/ /de tshad gtan la dbab pa ni/ /khru gang tsam du brjod pa ste/ /mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nas
62b2(rgyud): su| |dbus su rdo rje gzhag par bya/ /kha khyer yang ni dar byas te/ /mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su bya/ /rtsa brtse mor dkris pa yi/ /ku sha dag ni der dgram mo/ /de ltar
62b3(rgyud): kun tu legs par yang / /sngags pas shin tu dgram par bya/ /ha cang mi nye mi ring bar/ /sbyin sreg me yi thab bya ste/ /tshul bzhin du ni byas nas su/ /der ni sbyin sreg
62b4(rgyud): brtsam par bya/ /ku sha sbams steng bdag 'dug ste/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas/ /de nas me ni 'bar byas la/ /de la bsang gtor bya ba brtsam/ /de yi 'og
62b5(rgyud): tu me der ni/ /me tog gcig gcig gzhag par bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas dgug par 'gyur/ /de la me yi phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa g.yas pa drang
62b6(rgyud): brkyang ste/ /mthe bo mthe chung drung du gzugs/ /sngags 'dis dgug par bya ba 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ag+na ye hA bya kA bya bA ha na ya swA hA/
62b7(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas rig sngags kyis/ /de nas dgang blugs sbyin sreg bya/ /de la dgang blugs phul nas ni/ /slob ma g.yon du gzhag par bya/ /de dag re re'i phyir yang ni/ /
63a1(rgyud): dgang blugs nyi shu lnga lnga bsreg /rnam pa sna tshogs las kyi rnams/ /'di lta bu dag rab bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang drag shul
63a2(rgyud): spyod pa 'o/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'o mar bcas/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o/ /rgyas la zho dang 'bras chan dang / /gang dag gzhan nas gsungs pa'o/ /drag shul spyod pa
63a3(rgyud): tsher mar gsungs/ /dbang byar snga ma ji bzhin du/ /las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis/ /ci rigs par ni sbyin sreg bya/ /ji ltar rigs pa so so las/ /de
63a4(rgyud): dag la ni yon dgug go / yang na yid la gang 'dod pa/ /de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis/ /de yi tshe na slob dpon la/ /slob ma rnams kyis yon dbul lo/ /ma byin na ni
63a5(rgyud): dam tshig nyams/ /dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis/ /'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'dod/ /de bzhin skye bo 'di la yang / /slob
63a6(rgyud): dpon de ni mig 'drar 'dod/ /dper na me yi khams des ni/ /bud shing thams cad sreg par byed/ /de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/ /mi shes bud shing sreg
63a7(rgyud): par byed/ /dper na chu yi khams de ni/ /'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcod/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / /gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya/ /dper na
63b1(rgyud): rlung gi khams de ni/ /'jig rten thams cad rtag tu bsgrub/ /de bzhin slob dpon slob ma la/ /dge ba rnam par sgrub par byed/ /dper na lus can thams cad la/ /sa ni
63b2(rgyud): rten du grags pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / /chos kyi rten du 'dod pa yin/ /dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/ /de
63b3(rgyud): bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/ /dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /gsang ba thams cad mthun par 'dzin/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / /'dir ni sngags kyi
63b4(rgyud): gsang ba 'dzin/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams/ /de ni rtag tu rjod par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /bsngags pa chen po'ang rjod par byed//
63b5(rgyud): dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra ste/ /yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /de bzhin sngags pa 'jigs med kyang / /theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin/ /bdag ltar sngags
63b6(rgyud): pa de bzhin te/ /slob dpon ji bzhin rgyal de bzhin/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya/ /yon tan 'dzin na grub par 'gyur/ /nyes
63b7(rgyud): pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams/ /slob dpon la ni smad byas na/ /'jig rten dag na tshe thung zhing / /de bzhin ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur/ /nya pa la sogs rigs su skye//
64a1(rgyud): 'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te/ /mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gdab/ /chos 'dod rnams kyis slob dpon la/ /rtag par rgyun tu mnyes par
64a2(rgyud): bya| |gang na rgyal ba'i sras gnas pa/ /sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin/ /der ni rgyal sras thams cad dang / /bdag kyang snying las chung ba yin/ /sbyin sreg las kyi
64a3(rgyud): dam pa 'di/ /dpa' bo khyod la brjod pa ni/ /sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa'i/ /mgon po rnams kyis sngon chad bshad/ /sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams
64a4(rgyud): la| |gang gis 'di ltar rnam shes pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ me'i
64a5(rgyud): tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o/ / //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
64a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas snga mas bsngags pa yi/ /dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod
64a7(rgyud): par bya/ /khru gsum tshad gcig gzhag nas su/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi tshad ni khru bzhi ste/ /dkyil 'khor logs su mngon phyogs bya/ /der
64b1(rgyud): yang sngags pas cha bsnyams shing / /kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te/ /me yi phyogs su 'dug byas la/ /de tshe byang du mngon phyogs
64b2(rgyud): te| |cho ga bzhin du thig skud bre/ /snga ma'i gnas ni spangs nas su/ /dbang ldan phyogs su 'dug byas te/ /rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni/ /byang phyogs ngos kyi thig
64b3(rgyud): gdab bo/ /rlung gi phyogs su 'dug nas ni/ /lho phyogs ngos su mngon bltas te/ /bden bral phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /de bzhin rlung gi
64b4(rgyud): phyogs spangs te/ /bden bral phyogs su 'dug byas nas/ /de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te/ /sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing / /me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /
64b5(rgyud): lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /cho ga 'di bzhin thams cad kyang / /gru bzhi lham par rab tu bya/ /mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni/ /nang rim cha brgyad byas nas su/ /'khor
64b6(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /mkhas pas rim pa gnyis su bya/ /dbus kyi pad+ma mdor brjod na/ /'dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa ste/ /'dab ma'i bar bar thams cad du//
64b7(rgyud): rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya/ /de dag la yang snying po bri/ /rang gi snying pos bskul nas ni/ /phyogs skyong brgyad po de dag kyang / /ji bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod/ /de la nang
65a1(rgyud): rol grwa rnams su/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod/ /bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gzhag /dkyil
65a2(rgyud): 'khor lha la ji lta bar/ /der yang mchod pa rab tu bya/ /ras dang bla re dril bu dang / /gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul/ /mu tig phreng sogs me tog phreng / /ci
65a3(rgyud): nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya/ /de la dbus su ni phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan bri'o/ /rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang / sman
65a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis bkang ba/ rin po che me tog dang / me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa thams cad
65a5(rgyud): rnam par sel ba dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur ro/ /sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der/ /rab tu bzhag nas bdag
65a6(rgyud): nyid kyis/ /me tog spos kyis mchod byas la/ /mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang / /
65a7(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis/ /yang dag mngon du dga' byas la/ /skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du/ /bsgrims te de ni dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar gling bzhi'i
65b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gam/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang / /bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /me tog rnams dang bdug pa dang / /
65b2(rgyud): spos mchog rnams kyis yang mchod la/ /lag pa g.yas su rdo rje dang / /g.yon du 'khor lo bzhag nas su/ /slob ma de la 'di skad du/ /rdo rje slob dpon khyod 'gyur te/ /
65b3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod/ /rdo rje chos ni rab brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis khyod lag tu/ /ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin/ /deng nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /lag na
65b4(rgyud): rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /sdang ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang / /bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa/ /de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'dren pa rnams kyis rdo rje byin/ /ji ltar 'khor
65b5(rgyud): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal/ /bdag por bya phyir dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje blo ldan dbang bskur brjod/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /de la
65b6(rgyud): bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la/ /lag pas bslang ba byas nas su/ /dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la/ /dam tshig dag ni rnam bsgrags te/ /byang chub sems
65b7(rgyud): ni btang mi bya/ /khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang / /lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi gtang / /blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang / /rdo rje bzhag pa khyod kyis ni/ /nam yang yongs su
66a1(rgyud): gtang mi bya/ /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te/ /ji ltar rang gis lus bsrungs pa/ /de ltar khyod kyis
