66a2(rgyud): 'di srungs shig / de byas sangs rgyas byas gzo ba/ /sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin/ /gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams/ /rdo rje can du khyod mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
66a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi/ /rigs ni byang chub sems yin te/ /rtags ni snying rje yin zhes brjod/ /thabs ni dbang du bstan pa ste/ /rdo rje bzhag pa go cha bgos/ /rdo rje mtshon cha
66a4(rgyud): thogs pa yin/ /khyod la lha rnams phyag kyang 'tshal/ /khyod la bsrung ba kun tu byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /rnam pa kun tu bsrung ba mdzad/ /
66a5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba rdzogs so// //de nas 'jam rab dpal ldan pa/ /ya mtshan gyis ni mig rgyas
66a6(rgyud): pas| |rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smras/ /dpa' bo gzi brjid chen po legs/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog /gang gis
66a7(rgyud): dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungs shig /lha rnams thams cad so so dang / /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi/ /phyag rgya dang ni sngags
66b1(rgyud): bcas pa'i/ /sbyor ba rnams kyis rab sbyor dang / /bsam gtan brtan bca' man ngag dang / /ri ga pa'i chos ni gang yin dang / /brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags/ /
66b2(rgyud): yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin drag shul spyod pa dang / /'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang / /nor yang rab tu dgug pa dang / /gsang
66b3(rgyud): sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang / /bye brag rnams kyang bshad par mdzod/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'dor ba su/ /gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs/ /'di dang gzhan 'bras
66b4(rgyud): 'jig rten na/ /rnyed dka' rgyal ba rnams gsungs dang / /las ni gzhan gyis byas 'gyur la/ /'bras bu gzhan spyod 'gyur ba dang / /dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams
66b5(rgyud): kyi| |'bras bu bdag la bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ /mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'/ /gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ /dad pa phun
66b6(rgyud): sum tshogs par dka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de ring khyod/ /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la/ /gsang chen 'dzin par dgongs pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor
66b7(rgyud): 'di yi bar dag gi / cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzod/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
67a1(rgyud): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de legs par smras pa ste/ de'i phyir/
67a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal/ rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /'jam dpal/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no/ /kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no/ /lha'i gnas gang
67a3(rgyud): yin pa de kho bo'i gnas so/ /kho bo'i gnas gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te/ dkyil 'khor med par gsang sngags
67a4(rgyud): med do/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / dkyil 'khor ni/ gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'o/ /de la gzugs yod pa ni ri mor bri ba'o/ /gzugs med pa
67a5(rgyud): ni bri ba ma yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni bri ru rung ba'o/ /mi bri ba ni brir mi rung ba'o/ /gzhon nu/ /de la bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o/ /bri ba ni bya
67a6(rgyud): ba dang / las kyi rgyu tsam du zad de/ de ni pha rol dad pa bskyed pa yin la/ gcig gis ni lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ste/ don gnyis bsgrub pa
67a7(rgyud): dang | bya ba dang / rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /slob dpon las dang / bya ba dang / dus dang / byed pa dang / nus
67b1(rgyud): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / man ngag dang / rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa dag la dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /gzhon
67b2(rgyud): nu| de la man ngag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / slob ma'o/ /slob dpon ni slob dpon gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /de ni de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug
67b3(rgyud): cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o/ /tshad ma de ni man ngag go /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzhan yang / tshad ma gang zhe na/ gang mdo sde dang / gsang sngags kyi
67b4(rgyud): don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myong ba dang / don de shin tu chud pas de las mi nyams ba dang / brtan par 'gyur ba de ni chos nyid do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de ni
67b5(rgyud): man ngag bshad pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ gzhan du mi 'gyur bas lha
67b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ste de ni mi slu ba'o/ /de mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do/ /
67b7(rgyud): gzhan yang / chos nyid de thob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor la sbyor ba nyid gang nyid gang yin pa de ni rig pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags
68a1(rgyud): pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang chen 'di/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sngo na bshad
68a2(rgyud): de| |gzhan du bri ba 'ba' zhig ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / lha ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang / rnam par
68a3(rgyud): smin pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o/ /chos nyid de mngon sum du tho ba pa gang yin pa ni 'bras bu'o/ /'bras bu gang yin pa de rnam par
68a4(rgyud): smin pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ngo bo'o/ /ngo bo gang yin pa de tha snyad du lhung ba'o/ /tha snyad du lhung ba gang yin pa dang / tha snyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni
68a5(rgyud): btags pa'o/ /de ni bya ba'o/ /bya ba gang yin pa de las so/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ mngon sum du bya ba med/
68a6(rgyud): rnam par byang ba med kyang las dang / rnam par smin pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'bras bu
68a7(rgyud): dang / thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ston to/ /gzung ngo / /brjod do/ /'dogs so/ /rab tu 'jog go /rnam par 'grel to/ /'chad do/ /tshul
68b1(rgyud): bstan pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
68b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga ba zhes bya ba dang / 'chi ba zhes bya dang / nad
68b3(rgyud): ces bya ba dang / rgud pa zhes bya ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang / 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang / 'ong ba
68b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / rig pa zhes bya ba dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab can zhes bya ba dang / rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags pa zhes bya ba dang / zhe sdang zhes
68b5(rgyud): bya ba dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang / 'ching ba zhes bya ba dang / thar pa zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / de kho
68b6(rgyud): na zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / mi slu ba zhes bya ba dang / mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya dang / lus
68b7(rgyud): zhes bya dang / yid ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /
69a1(rgyud): chos zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / nyan thos zhes bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan
69a2(rgyud): gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan gcig
69a3(rgyud): phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
69a4(rgyud): 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba
69a5(rgyud): dang / 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / lha zhes bya ba dang / klu zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang / dri za zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin zhes bya ba dang / nam
69a6(rgyud): mkha' lding zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci zhes bya ba dang / lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba dang / mi zhes bya ba dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang / skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / bud
69a7(rgyud): med ces bya ba dang / ma ning zhes bya bar 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
69b1(rgyud): 'das rnams sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos de la ji ltar
69b2(rgyud): gdags pa 'am/ rnam par rig par mdzad/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa 'am/ rnam par rig
69b3(rgyud): par mdzad de/ 'jam dpal/ las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid de la yang gcig ces bya ba 'am/ gnyis zhes bya bar 'dogs te/
69b4(rgyud): de ltar grangs bstan pa rnams dang / ming gi brdar byas pa rnams kyis 'dogs pa mdzad pa la ltos/ 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / nam mkha'i khams las dang /
69b5(rgyud): rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin na/ nam mkha' la yang sngon po zhes bya ba dang / ser po zhes bya ba dang / dmar po zhes bya ba dang / dog ces bya ba dang / yangs zhes bya
69b6(rgyud): ba dang / dag ces bya ba dang / ma dag ces bya bar 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
69b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dogs pa mdzad de/ 'dogs pa de yang las dang / rnam par smin pa med pas byas pa yin na/ byis pa so
70a1(rgyud): so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyis khong du ma chud par zad de/ de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil
70a2(rgyud): 'khor 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las/ /sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir bstan to/ /phyag rgya'ang de bzhin 'byung ba ste/ /gzugs
70a3(rgyud): can ma yin bstan du med/ /rtag tu 'jig rten gsum rnams su/ /thogs pa med cing chod pa med/ /dper na gtsub stan brten nas su/ /gtsub shing gtsubs pa
70a4(rgyud): byas gyur na/ /mi yis rtsol ba byas rgyu las/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i me 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las/ /gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga/ /chen po
70a5(rgyud): dag ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /byung nas yid la gang bsams pa'i/ /las rnams byed par gyur pa yin/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis
70a6(rgyud): bsams ma thag tu lha'i zas dang / skom dang / rgyan dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud med dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs
70a7(rgyud): pa thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / lha 'dus pa las thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/
70b1(rgyud): dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba de med par ma gyur na de'i tshe gang bsams pa de thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du
70b2(rgyud): sngags kyi tshul yang khong du chud par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te/ lha'i nga rgyal la the tshom med pa thob pa de'i tshe gsang sngags
70b3(rgyud): kyi chos nyid des chos nyid ston te/ de'i tshe des tshig gis de'i rnam pa ston pa na bya ba nus par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ brten pa'i chos nyid ji ltar las byed nus par
70b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba la ltos/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya la brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdzas med na yang rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung la/ yod kyang bya ba
70b5(rgyud): dang / las dang bral na rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ gnyis ka yang phan tshun du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/ /mis rtsol ba byas pa de las ci 'dir rdzas
70b6(rgyud): byung ba'am/ 'on te las kyi bya ba de byung ngam gang yin te/ snga phyi 'gal ba'i phyir brten nas gsang sngags sam/ phyag rgya 'byung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba med
70b7(rgyud): do| |'jam dpal/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan las rgyal ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed du blta'o/ /'di la rgyal bar byed
71a1(rgyud): pa su yin zhe na/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa mang
71a2(rgyud): por brtags pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di ni gsang sngags so/ /'di ni phyag rgya'o/ /'di ni lha'o zhes rnam par gzhag
71a3(rgyud): pa mdzad do/ /chos kyi dbyings de ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ gzung ba ma yin pa/ dkrug pa ma yin pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas rten cing 'brel par
71a4(rgyud): 'byung bar rnam par gzhag pas rnam par gzhag go / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad byed do/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / ji ltar gzhan gyis las
71a5(rgyud): byas pa la ji ltar gzhan spyod ces gang smra ba de ni/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sems la dbang thob pa de 'dod pa bzhin du longs
71a6(rgyud): spyod sna tshogs la yongs su spyod par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud
71a7(rgyud): med dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas bdag kyang yongs su spyod cing gzhan dag la yang sbyin par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
71b1(rgyud): de nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa la gzhan yongs su spyod do/ /'jam dpal/ gcig byed pa la mang
71b2(rgyud): po yongs su spyod pa'i rnam grangs yod do/ /dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ zhing pa bzhin no/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / 'jig rten 'di
71b3(rgyud): 'dor ba ni su/ gzhan du 'gro ba ni su zhes smra ba ni/ 'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe sems dang / sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'dus byas kyi khams la gnas pa
71b4(rgyud): de'i tshe de 'jig rten 'di yin no/ /gang gi tshe sems dang / sems las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin
71b5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten 'di 'dor zhing / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o zhes 'dogs te/ 'di ni chos nyid
71b6(rgyud): rtogs pa'i gang zag gi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams su rnam par gnas pa ste/ de ni nam du yang 'dus byas kyi dri
71b7(rgyud): mas mi gos so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje 'dam rdzab kyi rnyog pa'i dri ma'i skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /de bzhin du chos nyid de yang 'dus byas kyi skyon thams
72a1(rgyud): cad kyis mi gos so/ /'jam dpal/ byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyud du ltung
72a2(rgyud): ba ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ba'i sems pas srid par skye ba nyon mongs pa can rnam par sgrub bo/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas te 'du byed
72a3(rgyud): kyi tshogs 'di 'gags pa'i tshe lha'o snyam mam/ mi'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal nyid rgyud de'i rjes su 'brel to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil
72a4(rgyud): 'khor la bzhin blta ba'i mi ni bdag gi bzhin yon tan khyad par can 'di lta bus bzang ngo zhe 'am/ mi bzang ngo zhes rtog par byed kyi/ de dang tha dad pa yang ma
72a5(rgyud): yin| tha mi dad pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i phyir sems la ngar 'dzin pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal/ mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
72a6(rgyud): gsang sngags kyis dug dang / rims la sogs pa sel ba'o/ /ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/ mngon sum dang / rtog pa'i dra ba dang bral ba bsam gtan
72a7(rgyud): rtogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/ rjes su dpag pa dang / dpag par bya ba'i rtog ge ba'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ yid ches pa'i lung gis grub pa dang /
72b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor dang /rigs pa dang ldan pa dang / rang gis myong ba'i rnam pa ni 'bras bur bstan te/ 'di ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang /
72b2(rgyud): drag shul spyod pa'i las smros shig ces gang smras pa ni bya dgos par gyur pa na khro bo nyid brtsam par bya ste/ zhi ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba dang / byams pa'i
72b3(rgyud): rang bzhin dang / rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la blta bas lha'i gzugs dang / rang gi khro bo'i gzugs tha mi dad par sbyor ba dang ldan par byas pas/ me'i yang
72b4(rgyud): khro bo'i gzugs la/ gcig shos kyang khro bo'i gzugs so/ /rang dbang bsgyur ba'i khro bos sngags kyi ngo bos bkug la myur du brang ngam/ snying ga 'am/ mgo
72b5(rgyud): 'am| lto 'am/ rked pa 'am/ byin pa 'am/ rkang pa 'am/ rgyab bam/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la srog chags thams cad dgod kyang rung / rtse yang rung / chags
72b6(rgyud): kyang rung / sdang yang rung / lam du 'gro yang rung / nyal yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / chu klung gi pha rol dpag tshad brgyan 'dug kyang rung / lha
72b7(rgyud): la sogs pas bsrungs kyang rung / bdag la me sbar bas sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni zhi ba/ ma zhi ba la ni ma zhi bar gsungs so/ /de
73a1(rgyud): nas lag na rdo rjes thogs pa med pa'i ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / bstan pa don yod par yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i
73a2(rgyud): phyir sangs rgyas kyi gsung bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
73a3(rgyud): par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stobs mtshungs pa med pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa/ dam tshig chen po'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsarba ta
73a4(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA badzra sa ma ya d+h+r-ika /dam tshig gi rdo rje'i gsang sngags smras ma thag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
73a5(rgyud): dang | 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i sgra 'ur zhes grags so/ /'di thos byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de
73a6(rgyud): dag skad cig de nyid la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga ru/ /rdo rje mchog stobs gzungs thob bo/ /yang bdud bzhi pham par byed pa'i rnam par bsgyings pa'i
73a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsrung ba chen po stobs po che stobs bcu'i gzi brjid las byung ba'i gsang sngags 'di
73b1(rgyud): smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ badzra gi ni/ badzra shu u la ni/ badzra mu ta re/ ba li na ma a gra /mahA ba le/ hi li hi li/
73b2(rgyud): mi li mi li/ shi lo shi lo/ Ti lo Ti lo/ Ta Ta le/ mahA tsaN+Di/ ku ruM g+ho na/ shwe ta/ pad+ma ma li ni/ hi hi he he/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ mahA sa ma ya a nu ga te
73b3(rgyud): swA hA| |de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ /kye ma bsrung ba dam pa 'di/ /gsang sngags rjes su spyod pa yi/ /sems
73b4(rgyud): can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /lag na rdo rjes rab tu brjod/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes yang dkyil 'khro gyi thabs thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod smras pa/ na
73b5(rgyud): maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA badzra a gra d+ha ra/ a na lo bi shwa saM b+ha ba swA hA/ /rdo rje'i me lce chen po 'bar ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA
73b6(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sh+tsaN+Di badzra a rtsi s+pha ra Na swAhA/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ mahA tsaN+Da badzra ka ba tsa bi
73b7(rgyud): s+phu ra badzraM ga swA hA/ rdo rje go cha'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ mahA badzra a gra d+ha ri te dzod ga te swA hA/ rdo rje mchog gi spyi gtsug gi
74a1(rgyud): sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ badzra a nan+ta ga ti hi swA hA/ /rdo rje gtsug tor chen po'i sngags so/ /na maH
74a2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ ta thA ga te/ A shA pa ri pU ra tsin+ta ma Ni rA dza badzra hUM/ /rdo rje mdzod spu'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu
74a3(rgyud): khe b+h+yaH/ ta thA ga te lo tsa na dz+nyA na badzra swA hA/ rdo rje spyan gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ oM badzra An nan swA hA/ rdo rje zhal gyi sngags
74a4(rgyud): so| |na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te sa t+ya d+harma pra tiSh+Tha te badzra ga pu ru sa ra swa ti bu ha a laM kA ra gar+b+ha badzra dzi hwA hUM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba
74a5(rgyud): satwa san+te Sha Na ka ri swA hA/ rdo rje ljags kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ badzra a gra sa me b+h+yo bi shwA rU pa d+ha ra swA hA/ rdo rje sku'i

80b1(rgyud): sarba thA badzra bi dA ra/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ ba ha ba ha swA hA/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu kha b+h+yaH/ sarba thA he laM gi li kur da ni ha he ki hi
80b2(rgyud): swA hA/ rdo rje 'gro lding ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA ha la hu na ra ku pa ra ba d+ha ra/ d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra ka d+ha/ ka d+ha ka thA/ badzra pA Ni/ badzra pri
80b3(rgyud): ya ka ha ka ha ha ha he he/ kany+tsi rA ya si sa ha sra b+hu dza ha sra/ A nan bi du daM Sh+T+ra/ dur dAn+da da ma ka pra dz+wa li ta ke sha /na kha ro/ ma da sha na da li/ bin+du s+phu ri ta dzi hwa/ tsan+d+ra a dit+ya/ mu ku Ta/ go
80b4(rgyud): ti bi ra tsi ta shi kha ra/ badzra ga da ke yU ra kuN+Da laM/ a laM kr-i Ta sha rI ra/ badzra na kha badzra aM gu laM/ badzra ha sta/ badzra tsa ra na/ badzra gA tra/ badzra ne tra/ nI la badzra badzra ga ta/ ba Da pa mu kha ga ni
80b5(rgyud): gaM b+hi ra hUM kA ra/ ra ti ta sa ta si ta ha si ta laM bo da ra/ gra sa gra sa pra bi sha a bI sha A bi sha /g+hUr+Na g+hUr+Na/ g+hUr+Na pa ya g+hUr+Na pa ya/ sarba satwa/ b+hU ma b+hU ma/ b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/ sarba
80b6(rgyud): duSh+Ta pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ ma tha ma tha hUM hUM/ badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje na da ku be ra'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA pra tsa la/ mo bu
80b7(rgyud): li bid d+ha ra/ badzra kr-i ta na kha/ badzra satwa swA hA/ rdo rje rig sngas 'chad ga sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA sha d+d+ha badzra pa kr-i ti shud+d+ha/ sho d+ha ya swA hA/
81a1(rgyud): rdo rje rdzas thams cad dag par byed pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ag+ni badzra swAhA/ rdo rje me'i sngags so/ /
81a2(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra a na la pra tsa la mau li thid d+ya da ra swAhA/ rdo rje rlung tshig gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
81a3(rgyud): thA badzra ga badzra d+ha ra dzi na A d+ha ra swAhA/ rdo rje sa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi ra dze badzra swAhA/ /rdo rje rdul dang bral ba'i sngags so/ /na maH
81a4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA smr-i ti na dad badzra satwa swAhA/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pad+ma badzra swAhA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i
81a5(rgyud): sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzrod ta ma ka ru Na a ga d+ha ri kA ru Na maN+Da la swAhA/ /rdo rje snying rje'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
81a6(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA me t+yud ga ta/ sarba satwa hi taM ka ta swAhA/ /rdo rje byams pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pA ra mi tA gar+b+ha sarba tra
81a7(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta badzra tsin+ta swAhA/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA sarba shU n+ya ta badzra ni ta bi shud d+ha sa twa/ a beR+ya badzra
81b1(rgyud): hri da ya swAhA/ /rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra d+hA ra NI shwa ra d+ha ra badzra swAhA/ /rdo rje gzungs kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
81b2(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra bo d+h+yaM ga dr-i b+ha A shA ya sarba bud+hA swAhA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA mArga bi Sha d+ha ka d+ha ka d+ha ka
81b3(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra swAhA/ /rdo rje lam gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA sat+ya badzra sa mud ga ta bud+d+ha rU pa d+ha ra swAhA/ /rdo rje bden pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga
81b4(rgyud): te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a bi ni ka badzra saM b+ha ba bud+d+ha bu tra swAhA/ /rdo rje ma 'dres pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a b+hA+e Sha ra dwa badzra mArga ni da ri Sha
81b5(rgyud): ka swAhA/ /rdo rje mi 'jigs pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tri rat+na sarba pa ka bud+d+ha rU pa Ni da ra swAhA/ /rdo rje dkon mchog gsum gyi sngags so/ /
81b6(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA dr-i d+ha mu la badzra brik+Sha bo d+hi na da da swAhA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi shing gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
81b7(rgyud): thA A pa rA dzi ta badzra/ dzi ta ri la b+ha drA nu dz+nyA na swAhA/ rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra rat+nA ka ri swAhA/ /rdo rje rin chen
82a1(rgyud): 'byung gnas kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pra la ya badzra dz+wa dz+wa dz+wa la d+ha ka swAhA/ /rdo rjes rmeg med pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba
82a2(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra bi ba d+ha ya sarba hUM hUM swAhA/ rdo rje 'chags pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA saM b+h+yaH sarba badzra badzrod ta ma ka
82a3(rgyud): ru Na mA ya swAhA/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA saM bat+ti badzra sa ma ya swAhA/ /rdo rje phun sum tshogs pa'i sngags so/ /
82a4(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ku mA ra badzra hasta swAhA/ /rdo rje gzhon nu'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA kA ma badzra bi la
82a5(rgyud): si ni ta ki ti swAhA/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje sgeg mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA kA ma badzra bid+yA d+ha ri ku mu de swAhA /'dod pa'i rdo rje'i rig sngags
82a6(rgyud): 'chang ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA rak+Sha badzra ni ka mnad de kA ma yak+Sha Ni swAhA/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga
82a7(rgyud): te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ma taM gi khi ri khi ga kha ri ka swAhA/ /rdo rje gdol ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ru d+hi ra pri ya ru d+hi ra
82b1(rgyud): be tA li/ li hi la ha/ li li gi ni badzra ma thi ni ra hi/ /rdo rje khrag gi ro langs ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra be tA li ka li mA li na ba mA li lu
82b2(rgyud): shud d+ha swa ri he swAhA/ /rdo rje ro langs ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra du na te badzra shI ti ki/ ud pA da ni pA da mA bi lam+ba badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya

82b4(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzraM gi ku ruM ga ni badzra tun+de ke swAhA/ /rdo rje sgros ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra d+ha ba li d+ha li taM gi badzra
82b5(rgyud): b+h+ra ma ri ke swAhA/ rdo rje bung ba mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tai b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra sha ba ri sha ba ri rU pa d+hA ra Ni g+hi ni g+hi ni Ni ke swAhA/ /rdo rje sha ba ri'i sngags

82b7(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu kha b+h+yaH sarba thA hA sa badzra ha san+tu nr-i t+ya nr-i t+ya swAhA/ /pho nya mo rdo rje bzhad ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA he ma da pa
83a1(rgyud): li ge badzra ma da kha badzra pA ni ma nu sma ra swAhA/ /pho nya mo rdo rje ra ro ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra badzra kuk+ku

83a5(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra maM ka ti rak+tA mu khi rak+ta ak+Shi badzrot+ta kad da ka da da mA bi lam+ba/ badzra pA Ni ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ /pho nya mo rdo rje bran mo'i
83a6(rgyud): sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra d+ha ra NI d+ha ra d+ha ra/ saM d+ha ra swAhA/ pho nya mo rdo rje 'chang ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH

83b1(rgyud): ga li ta mahA ma Ni ku T+waM sa swAhA/ /pho nya snyems par 'dug gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pra tsaN+Da badzra d+ha ra ka ni ra da yaM da ha da ha/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sa

84a1(rgyud): gdong gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra dan du ra tsa pi Ta badzra ra na/ si la da ha ri laM bo da ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ba ra

84a3(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA trai lokya gra sa na badzra du he badzra pA sha hasta A na ya A na ya kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ /pho nya rdo rje
84a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsaN+Da la/ badzra kiM ka ra ku ru sarbaM/ kiny+tsi rA ya si bi tsi tra pa tiM pa ra te swAhA/ /phyag brnyan
84a5(rgyud): rdo rje gtum po'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra piM ga la/ la li ta ke sha/ pra dz+wa li ta sha rI ra hA ka d+ha ka/ ku ru ku ru swAhA/ /phyag
84a6(rgyud): brnyan rdo rje ser skya'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ke tu kiM ka ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tha ra tha ra/ ka ra ka ra swAhA/ /phyag brnyan rdo rje tog gi
84a7(rgyud): sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA te ga d+hi la ka kiny+tsa rA ya/ la li ta be Sha d+ha ri/ d+hA ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/ pra ti dz+nyA mu hu mu hu/ muny+tsa da ha saM swAhA//
84b1(rgyud): phyag brnyan rdo rje dus po che'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ku la A dz+nyA ka ra/ ra ta ra ta riM bi swAhA/ /phyag brnyan rdo rje bka' bzhin byed kyi
84b2(rgyud): sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA hakr-i tAn+da/ sha ma na b+hany+dza ka la ha/ bri ya hi li hi li la li ta duSh+ta sarba hriM da ya swAhA/ /phyag brnyan rdo rje 'thab
84b3(rgyud): sred kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra shaM kha ra/ mu lu mu lu/ he lu he lu swAhA/ /phyag brnyan rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA

84b5(rgyud): b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ha la ha la/ Ta ra Ta ra lun ta na badzra kiM ka ra swAhA /phyag brnyan rdo rje phung byed kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra
84b6(rgyud): d+ha tan dza ya dzaM ka ra bu tan+ta ra hwa swAhA/ /phyag brnyan rdo rje rlung las rgyal gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ko ti na dza ya/ kiny+tsa rA ya saM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na
84b7(rgyud): ko ti tiM ga ti ga ta swAhA/ /phyag brnyan rdo rje mtha' las rgyal gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsa pa li ke tsa pa la badzri Ni swAhA/ bran mo rdo rje phyar
85a1(rgyud): mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA sa su badzri Ni badzra du ti ke swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje legs kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta
85a2(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra pany+dza ri ke badzri ni swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje dra ba mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA rat+na mA li ke badzra pA Ni

85a4(rgyud): sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra laM bi ke swAhA/ bran mo rdo rje spyan ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA
85a5(rgyud): badzra su ga na ti ge badzra gi badzra da yi ta ke swAhA/ bran mo rdo rje snying brtse mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA su thi tiSh+Tha badzri NI badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM
85a6(rgyud): ga me swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje legs gnas mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra du ku la bak+She shu ha ra ni swAhA/ bran mo rdo rje du ku la'i ras
85a7(rgyud): can gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ka ra li ke brti ke swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje mnyam pa mo'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
85b1(rgyud): sarba mu kha b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra dza ya ka ri badzra sha rI rA Ni swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje rgyal byed ma'i badzra badzra Ni badzra ma ba d+hi ke swAhA /bran mo rdo rje b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ka ra b+hi badzra a ti sha
85b2(rgyud): ni ke swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje bsdigs ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra badzra Ni badzra ma ba d+hi ke swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje gsod byed kyi sngags so/ /
85b3(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA me kha la/ la li ta ke sha ba ri badzra gan+d+ha ri swAhA/ /bran mo rdo rje tshig 'dzin gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu
85b4(rgyud): khe b+h+yaH sarba thA su sid+d+hi ka ra badzra sA d+ha ka yaM sarba badzra pA Ni ra Adz+nyA ku ru swAhA/ /rig pa'i rgyal po legs par grub byed kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
85b5(rgyud): sarba thA rat+na ma li badzra d+ha ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan rtse gsum gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi d+yot+ta ma tsin+ta badzra hUM/
85b6(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa mchog gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ba la ki li ki la badzra ma ku Ta d+ha ra swAhA/ /rig pa'i rgyal po ba la ki li
85b7(rgyud): ki la'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA rat+na ki li ki la/ rat+na ma ku na d+ha ra swAhA rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen gi li ki la'i sngags so/ /na maH
86a1(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA su rU pa mA la badzra badzra hi taM ka ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po gzugs legs kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH
86a2(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra bi naM du ga ta badzra d+ha ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje thogs pa med pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA la li ta/ badzra pu
86a3(rgyud): ru Sha mahA yak+Sha rU pa d+ha ra sa ra sa ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ga dza kar+Na badzra lo tsa naM tsa na tsa lak+Sha swAhA/ rig
86a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po glang po rna ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tra Ta badzra kany+dza hUM swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga
86a5(rgyud): te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+hI Sha Na badzra b+hi ma/ badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
86a6(rgyud): thA ha ri ti/ sarba tra me pra ti ha ta ta ra ta ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'phrog byed kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA hA sa badzra d+ha ra su tA nu/ sarba arta
86a7(rgyud): sarta ka / hi hi ri swAhA/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje bzhad pa'i sngags so// //phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas yang lag na rdo rje yan
86b1(rgyud): lag thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus pu snying nas skyes pa kha nas byung ba dag yid dang / yan lag thams
86b2(rgyud): cad las byung ngo / /de la lag pa gnyis las ni gzhon nu lag bzang ngo / /kha nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde'o/ /rdo rje cod pan las ni gzhon nu rdo rje cod pan no/ /spyi gtsug nas
86b3(rgyud): ni gzhon nu rdo rje gtsug byung ngo / /rdo rje me tog rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog go/ rdo rje me tog thod las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog thod do/ /rdo rje'i brang las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i
86b4(rgyud): brang ngo / /rdo rje'i snying las ni gzhon nu rdo rje sdug gi/ rdo rje'i dpral ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'o/ /rdo rje'i smin ma las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i smin ma'o/ /rdo rje rna ba las ni
86b5(rgyud): gzhon nu rdo rje 'chang ngo / /rdo rje'i mig las ni gzhon nu 'jig rten mig gcig pa'o/ /rdo rje'i sna las ni gzhon nu rdo rje shugs 'chang ngo / /rdo rje'i mkhur tshos las ni
86b6(rgyud): gzhon nu rdo rje'i rten no/ /rdo rje'i kos ko las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gces pa 'dzin to/ /rdo rje'i so rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i mche ba'o/ /rdo rje'i mgul pa las ni gzhon
86b7(rgyud): nu rdo rje'i glu'o/ /rdo rje mchan khung las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid do/ /rgyab las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin to/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa
87a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i bu gzhon nu khro bo de dag lag na rdo rje thogs pa/ sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ snying rje'i dkyil
87a2(rgyud): 'khor las yang dag par byung ba/ lag na rdo rje'i smon lam gyis snying drangs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mchog dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs
87a3(rgyud): rgyas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang /
87a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid chen por lus rnam par bskyed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje'i snying du 'thad pa sha stag go/ de nas gsang
87a5(rgyud): ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra se nod b+ha ba badzra pA Ni pr-i ya swAhA/
87a6(rgyud): rdo rje sde'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ba hUd b+ha ba badzra ba hu shu ram ga ma swAhA/ /rdo rje lag bzang gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga
87a7(rgyud): te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi tsi tra badzra she kha ra/ badzra shi kha ra bi lam+bi ta ta ra swAhA/ /rdo rje me tog thod kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
87b1(rgyud): thA ki ri Ti badzra d+ha ri/ bi shud+d+ha aM ga ra swAhA/ /rdo rje cod pan gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra mu ra d+ha a gi ta/ hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ /rdo rje gtsug
87b2(rgyud): nas byung ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ku su ma/ a tsi dra ta badzra mu rti badzra swA b+hA ba swAhA/ /rdo rje me tog gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te
87b3(rgyud): b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ba ra d+ha ri/ u ra badzrod ta ma swAhA/ /rdo rje brang gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra hraM da ya badzra pA Ni bri ya sa twa
87b4(rgyud): hi taM ka ra swAhA/ /gzhon nu rdo rje sdug gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsan+d+ra badzra aM ga sun+da ra swAhA/ /gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'i sngags so/ /na maH
87b5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra tsakra maN+Dal saM bu ta badzra b+h+ru ba swAhA/ /rdo rje smin ma'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra aM ku d+ha ri
87b6(rgyud): shu tA d+ha ra d+ha ra na ni rda da swAhA/ /rdo rje rna mchog 'chang gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra lo tsa ne dz+nyA na tsak+Shurda da swAhA/ rdo rje mig gi sngags so/ /
87b7(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra be ga d+ha ri ma no dza be d+ha ra swAhA/ /rdo rje shugs 'chang gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA
88a1(rgyud): ud d+ha ra badzra sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya swAhA/ /rdo rje rten gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra d+ha ra d+ha ra dz+wA li ta mUrti swAhA/ /
88a2(rgyud): rdo rje gces pa 'dzin gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra aM ku ra badzra ke tu sa ra sa ra swAhA/ /rdo rje mche ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga
88a3(rgyud): te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA saM bo d+hi badzra d+ha ra pri ya badzra gI ti swAhA/ /rdo rje glu'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra dz+wa li ta badzra mU rti badzra d+ha ra
88a4(rgyud): swAhA/ /gzhon nu rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA te dza a ba laM bi ta/ murti d+ha ka d+ha ka swAhA/ /gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin
88a5(rgyud): gyi sngags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa lag na rdo rjes rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
88a6(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi yum sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang bskur cing / gnod pa thams cad 'gog pa/ lus la srung ba chen po'i srad bu thogs pa/ rtag tu ma byed zer
88a7(rgyud): ba bdag gi zhes brjod pa'i sgra phyung ngo / /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA he badzra shU li ni badzra ma taM gi a nan+da mu kha badzra hi li dza yan tiM/ ru ti mu kha ti
88b1(rgyud): si s+phu ran+ti swAhA/ /mA ma kI'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pu bi mo badzra mA lI ni/ badzra ang b+hU te/ sany+tsa ya sa man+ta shI di sha ma badzra ran d+ha ne na/ g+hu d+hu
88b2(rgyud): g+hu d+hu/ dza hi dza hi mA bi lam+ba/ b+ha ga ba ti bA rA hI/ sma ra sma ra/ badzra saM gI ti swAhA/ /rdo rje mtshams kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra mahA man+Da
88b3(rgyud): daR+sha ya badzri bi kra ma swAhA/ /rdo rje lding khang gi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra si tA ta pa tre dz+wa kr-i ta swAhA/ /rdo rje gdugs dkar po'i sngags so/ /
88b4(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi ta ta mahA badzra bi da na raM ga raM gA pa ya swAhA/ rdo rje rin po che'i ba dan chen po'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba
88b5(rgyud): mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA rat+na kU Ta/ dz+wa li ta badzrod b+ha ba swAhA/ /rdo rje khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra pad mod+b+ha ba/ badzra A
88b6(rgyud): sa na badzra na dad swAhA/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA smr-i ti/ badzra d+ha ra ka swAhA/ /rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so/ /na maH
88b7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bo d+hi bi bo d+ha na badzra ba ma ba ma ba swAhA/ /rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bI ma ti ha ra
89a1(rgyud): ka/ badzra rat+na d+ha ma d+ha ma swAhA/ /rdo rje yid gnyis rnam par gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
89a2(rgyud): sarba thA dz+nyA na badzra swAhA/ /rdo rje shes sbyin gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a mr-i ta badzra pa swAhA/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta
89a3(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pra brta ya badzra dz+nyA na sA ga ran ra swAhA/ /rdo rje chos brjod kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra saM sa thA pi ya/ bi rA ga
89a4(rgyud): ko Ti swAhA/ /rdo rje chags bral gyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA shU n+ya tA ko Ti badzra saM d+ha ra ka swAhA/ /rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so/ /na maH
89a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA sarba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA pra ba ka badzra sa twa swAhA/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
89a6(rgyud): thA ga ga na gany+dza na ti ra shi sha ya ma khaM badzra swAhA/ /rdo rje nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra yak+Sha Ni badzra da de id
89a7(rgyud): tsa ba ra Ni ma na si badzra mA li ni swAhA/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
89b1(rgyud): cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa sems
89b2(rgyud): c an thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsregs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i tshe 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun
89b3(rgyud): ltar 'bar ba/ rgya mtsho'i gling chen po'i me sgron ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i tshogs za ba/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje snying
89b4(rgyud): po'i mchog 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA phaT hUM/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po'i snying po smras ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
89b5(rgyud): 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang / rlung drag po chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du 'gul nas/ stan thams cad las khas bu ba tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i
89b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /lag na rdo rje'i mthus thams cad dang
89b7(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / rgya mtsho
90a1(rgyud): dang rgya mtsho chen po thams cad bskams nas rnam par tshig ste/ thal bar gyur par mthong ngo / /lag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po
90a2(rgyud): ' jig pa'i me lce chen po zhes bya ba byung nas gad mo rta bgad chen po rgyas par 'byin cing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi snying rnams yongs su bsdus nas nam mkha'
90a3(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa nyid du gyur te/ lag na rdo rje'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ yang snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin
90a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka'
90a5(rgyud): stsal pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ni/ /snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di/ /bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing / /thag pa chen po'i gnas 'di la/ /gdul dka' rtag tu
90a6(rgyud): 'dul ba ste/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil
90a7(rgyud): 'khor du 'gyel bar rig nas cher snying rje skyes te/ mig gnyis kyis ring du bltas nas rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ spyod
90b1(rgyud): b a chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po la blta zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rab dam pa la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa byang chub sems
90b2(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad cig stsol cig dang / des bstan pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing
90b3(rgyud): dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal
90b4(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ /ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing / /nam mkha' lta bur chags med la/ /kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa/ /
90b5(rgyud): gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang / /de bzhin gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang / /brtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang gzugs/ /dus dang yul dang cho ga shod/ /de'i tshe rdo rje de rdo rje
90b6(rgyud): mchog gi stobs kyi gzungs dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA e hi mahA badzra ko Ti ku Ti la pA
90b7(rgyud): pa ka aM ku la she khe ka pi la ke shrI ta Ti ta Ti/ ko Ti ko Ti/ kar+k+ka Ti mu Ti mahA thi na dud lo lo/ /du ka du ka/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ s+phu ra s+phu ra/ ud+d+ho ti te/ ha
91a1(rgyud): ri piM ga le| tsa Ti bi tsa Ti/ dz+wA le bi dz+wa li/ badzra g+ho na/ badzra sa ra d+h+r-iSh+Ta pra ha ra Ne/ ma ti d+hU te/ rat+na tra ya/ a ti ta le/ badzra d+ha ra bI shA sa ma/ a pra ti ha ta
91a2(rgyud): pra marda ni swAhA/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed 'di dran par gyis
91a3(rgyud): shig dang / 'di khyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes rig pa chen po 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rjes
91a4(rgyud): 'khor de byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das mi pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te/
91a5(rgyud): skad cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal
91a6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid/ /kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab/ /des ni bdag cag thams cad kyang / /mgon
91a7(rgyud): dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan/ /sems zhi tshegs ni ma mchis par/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/ /bdag cag
91b1(rgyud): thams cad mchis nas su/ /cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir/ /snying po dag ni da dbul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
91b2(rgyud): 'das/ bdag kyang lag na rdo rjes dbang chen po bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
91b3(rgyud): thA oM/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi snying po'i mchog lags te/ rig byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa/ rigs bzhi kun tu 'jog pa/ dbyangs dang ldan pa'i bkod pa
91b4(rgyud): chen po 'god pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las rig byed rnams 'byung / sngags rnams dang / mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhin
91b5(rgyud): du chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'o/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rdo rje oM zhes bya ba ste/ /byams dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes/ /nga rgyal rnam par
91b6(rgyud): sbyangs pa legs/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po rgyal
91b7(rgyud): srid thams cad la dbang sbyin par bgyid pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi da rA ya/ mau li mau li/ bi hu bi hu swAhA/ /bcom
92a1(rgyud): ldan 'das/ snying po 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
92a2(rgyud): zhugs par gyur pa der bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des dang por lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar thang shing gi yam sreg
92a3(rgyud): shing mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su skye
92a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje la blta zhing zas mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste/ dam
92a5(rgyud): tshig nyams pa ni ma gtogs te mi 'grub bo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan
92a6(rgyud): 'das/ klu'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o/ /dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dug bsal bar bgyi'o/ /na maH
92a7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA re re rA tiM nA ga le li ri/ phut+ta ri/ dzi he swAhA/ /snying po 'di'i bsgrub pa lags te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ mtsho
92b1(rgyud): chen por zhugs te lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs te mchi bar mthong ngam/ mtsho 'khrugs kyang de la 'jigs par ma bgyis na 'grub
92b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /tha mar seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar las smyugs pas lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na yang 'grub bo/ /de 'gro ba'am/ mi 'gro
92b3(rgyud): ba'i dug rnams kyang bsam pa tsam gyis sel bar 'gyur/ sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bsam pa tsam gyis bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde
92b4(rgyud): dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba mang po
92b5(rgyud): 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA yak+Sha
92b6(rgyud): sha ra/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ de b+hi mi bai shra ba Na pri ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
92b7(rgyud): mchod rten gyi drung du gcig pu mchis te snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la /mtshan thog thag tu til nag po
93a1(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /zas mi 'tshal bar lkog tu dben par
93a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te/ nyin zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis na/ gnod sbyin mo stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /lo gcig gi bar du nyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter
93a3(rgyud): cig stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phrog gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag kyang
93a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA khi mi si ri smra shi/ pa ri pU ra yan pra ti dz+nyA man+ta ke swAhA/ bcom ldan
93a5(rgyud): 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i slad bzhin du bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor
93a6(rgyud): mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol
93a7(rgyud): to| |de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang
93b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi d+ha ra d+ha ri/ gan+d+ha ri ri si swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig
93b2(rgyud): snying po 'di dran par bgyid pa de la dus ma lags par 'gum pa mi 'byung ngo / /rtag tu dpal gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal ba des zla ba tshes nas bzung ste/
93b3(rgyud): nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag 'bras kyi'o
93b4(rgyud): thug sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
93b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maH
93b6(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA shrI d+hi d+ha ra ya bi rU pAk+Sha swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu
93b7(rgyud): dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor
94a1(rgyud): mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag tu gu gul shing gi yam
94a2(rgyud): sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /ma grub na yang yul gru bzang po lnga stsol to/ /de nas chu dbang rmugs
94a3(rgyud): byed 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi don thams cad grub pa snying
94a4(rgyud): po mchog 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ku ru tsu ru mu ru dzam+b+ha dza lod b+ha ba swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po
94a5(rgyud): 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la ci 'tshal ba de bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod
94a6(rgyud): bgyis na/ rgyal srid dam/ gter chen po stsol to/ /gi wang la lan gcig sngags te mig la bskus na gang bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo gdong la sngags
94a7(rgyud): te bsam nas nyal na ci bsams pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo / /gos 'dod na me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba chur bor ba kha dog de 'dra ba'i gos de dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /
94b1(rgyud): phyugs chung 'dod na zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan la sngags lan gcig btab pa'i me tog phog par bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal
94b2(rgyud): che bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lag brgyad pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskad
94b3(rgyud): pa'i slad du bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsakra dwa dwa ba hu rA dza swAhA/ bcom ldan
94b4(rgyud): 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des bsgrub pa bgyis la skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs gtsang mar shing mya ngan 'tshang gi 'og tu lan sum 'bum
94b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshan thog thag a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed dam/ nang par de la
94b6(rgyud): bdag bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa gang 'tshal ba stsol to/ /zas mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o/ /gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /
94b7(rgyud): ci ste mi mchin 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen gyis btud nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom
95a1(rgyud): ldan 'das/ bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen
95a2(rgyud): po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA pany+tsa la pany+tsa mu kha pany+tsi kha ka hrIM hrIM rak+Sha k+Sha swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi
95a3(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste/ gsang sngags bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po
95a4(rgyud): 'di lan gcig brjod par bgyi'o/ /de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag mchi
95a5(rgyud): ba'i snga ltas ni sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad 'bar bar 'gyur/ spro ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ bgegs thams cad ma mchis
95a6(rgyud): par tshegs chung dus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan sum
95a7(rgyud): 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste du ba 'thul lam/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la de 'thungs
95b1(rgyud): na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor
95b2(rgyud): 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsams nas lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur
95b3(rgyud): te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas thags bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ bcom
95b4(rgyud): ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA traM gi ni bo de de mA li ni dza ti mi
95b5(rgyud): hUM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des/ dpal gyi sgo mo'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di
95b6(rgyud): lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa ma
95b7(rgyud): mchis shing 'khrul 'khor ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdag cag gis rim gro cher bgyis te rigs kyi bu de bzhugs par bgyi'o/ /yo byad thams cad kyang stsol
96a1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o/ /dngul chu dang / sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams
96a2(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /
96a3(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA mad+ta ma tang gi swAhA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'dis
96a4(rgyud): bdag cag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o/ /lha'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo / /mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nus so/ /mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i
96a5(rgyud): gnas thams cad na mchis so/ /ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des thog mar ri phug tu ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas
96a6(rgyud): brjod bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tha mar du ru ska'i 'bru mar gyi me bus la /a ga ru'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na/ de nas de'i
96a7(rgyud): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /gi wang la sngags kyis btab ste dpral bar thig le bgyis na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil la
96b1(rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste gdong la byabs na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub
96b2(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te

96b4(rgyud): dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchi'o/ /lha dang / klu'i
96b5(rgyud): gnas thams cad du kun gyis kyang bkur to/ /snying po 'dis ci la yang mi brjod do/ /ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des gcig pu dgon par slong mo'i zas
96b6(rgyud): 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor pas
96b7(rgyud): mchod de/ gur gum gyi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid
97a1(rgyud): d o| |de nas rnam par bdud kyi bu la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras
97a2(rgyud): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA rang+kA ri bi Sha ri
97a3(rgyud): bi She Sha ni krin+ta ni ku mA ri ke ha swAhA/ phu phu swAhA/ bdag cag gi snying po 'di klu thams cad rang gi dam tshig la dgod par bgyi'o/ /snying po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis
97a4(rgyud): klu thams cad bdag cag gi phyag brnyan du 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing zhum pa dang / 'dar ba dang / re ba chad par 'gyur/ dug ma mchis shing phyogs phyogs su
97a5(rgyud): 'bros par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci ste rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des mtsho chen por zhugs la
97a6(rgyud): mid pa tsam nub par 'greng ste snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas mtsho de nyid nyin gcig bzhin skam mo/ /klu'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar bar
97a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /rang gi gzugs kyang ston to/ /bgegs gzhan brgya dag kyang bgyid de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas mtshan ma de dag byung nas tha mar ba lang gi
97b1(rgyud): lci ba sa la ma lhung ba de nyid kyis rgya mtsho'i ngos su dkyil 'khor bskus la/ bcom ldan 'das/ lag na rdo rje la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ dug dang / nye ba'i dug thams cad las
97b2(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po brgyad bgyis la/ de nas ske tshe'i 'bru re re nas khrag gis bskus te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas klu thams cad lhags nas dam pa longs shig ces mchi na skrag par
97b3(rgyud): mi bgyi'o/ /'di skad du/ phyag brnyan dag tu gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do//
97b4(rgyud): de nas 'jigs su rung ba la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang
97b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA kaM kA ri Ni lu N+Di ni swAhA/ bdag cag gi snying po 'dis mi thams cad
97b6(rgyud): kyi gzi brjid dang / stobs 'phrog par bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdor na rgya ba dang / mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
97b7(rgyud): gsum po dag na ci yang dgon pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des dur khrod du du ba 'thul bar zas su sha 'tshal zhing
98a1(rgyud): gos sngon po bgos la lag tu ral gri thogs te/ snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o/ /ci
98a2(rgyud): 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas srin po'i bdag po gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la 'jigs par mi bya bar
98a3(rgyud): mchod yon stsal na bdag la 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi dngos grub byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /des ral gri de blangs nas stsol bar 'gyur te/ de nas lha'i 'gro
98a4(rgyud): ba can du 'gyur/ ngo mtshar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong chen po mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
98a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang sgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu
98a6(rgyud): khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ka bI la dz+ye ti ni ra Na da bing+ga la lo tsa na swAhA/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags te/ 'dis bdag kyang bkug
98a7(rgyud): te dbang du mchi'o/ /dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/ /nor stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /snying po 'dis rtag tu bza' ba'i sbyin
98b1(rgyud): sreg bgyis na bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor na rdzas gang gis sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i rdzas de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la slong mo'i
98b2(rgyud): zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de me thab bgyis la rgya shug gi yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la
98b3(rgyud): smyugs nas lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas grub par 'gyur te dga' mgur las rnams byed do/ /de nas sprin gyi phreng ba can la sogs pa rlung lha rnams kyis byang chub sems
98b4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po
98b5(rgyud): 'bul lo/ /sgrub pa po dngos grub grub par 'tshal ba rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+ha
98b6(rgyud): ma ra b+ha ma re/ tsa ba li tsa pa li/ ke he ra m+bi ni swAhA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te 'dis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin bgyi'o/ /byang
98b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung dang mi 'gal bar bgyid do/ /phan pa dang / bde ba bsgrub par bgyi'o//
99a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des thog mar snying po 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas bdag cag gis de'i
99a2(rgyud): bgyi ba thams cad gnang bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des zas mi bza' bar lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba
99a3(rgyud): lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o/ /kha dog sna tshogs kyi ba dan bdun bzhag go/ de nas ba dan 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas
99a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te/ bskyed pa dang / dgag pa la sogs pa las rnams dga' mgur bgyid do/ /de nas skar ma'i rgyal po zla bas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
99a5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po/ gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ dpal yang
99a6(rgyud): dag par 'jog par bgyid pa 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsan+d+ra kAn+ti bi shud+d+ha haM ga swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi snying po
99a7(rgyud): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na bkra
99b1(rgyud): mi shis pa rnams sel to/ /dpal bskyed do/ /rtag tu skal ba bzang po stsol to/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des zas su 'o ma 'thungs shing pad+ma'i rdzing du zhugs la snying po 'di
99b2(rgyud): lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar zla ba nya la shal lam/ mar sar las zla ba bgyis la/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phrag tu stsal te/ mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis
99b3(rgyud): na| nam phyed dam/ nyi ma shar ka'i tshe 'od zer 'byung ste/ byung nas kyang sgrub pa po'i khar 'jug go/ de nas 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor 'khor nas kun nas 'khod par gyur te 'dug
99b4(rgyud): go| de nas grub par 'gyur te gdung ba ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ bdag gi gzhal med khang du bskal bar gnas shing lha'i bde ba dang ldan pa
99b5(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dpal yang mchis par 'gyur te/ rgyal srid la sogs pa gang 'dod pa stsol to/ /de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad kyis byang chub sems
99b6(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi snying po gzi brjid dang / stobs thams cad pa zhes bya ba mchis te/ sgrub pa po rnams la
99b7(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa bgyi ba'i slad du de dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA sid+d+hi bi d+yo
100a1(rgyud): da na swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgrub pa po gang la las snying po 'di bzlas brjod ba gyis na de la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /rtag tu bzlas brjod
100a2(rgyud): bgyis na gzi brjid can du 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des 'bab chu'i 'gram gyi bye ma la mar me kha lnga bus la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
100a3(rgyud): de nas mer sbyin sreg bgyis la nyi ma nub kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la
100a4(rgyud): gang 'dod pa de bslangs la/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mchi bar 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de bgyid do/ /gzhal med khang gang yang rung bar mchis so/ /de nas
100a5(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po chu lha klu'i rgyal po du ma dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor
100a6(rgyud): 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a ba ma ba ti bi ra dza swAhA/ gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang
100a7(rgyud): sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /spyod pa gtsang ma thams cad la blo mngon sum du 'gyur
100b1(rgyud): ro| |ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rgya mtsho chen por mid pa nub tsam du zhugs la/ snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas tha mar rin po che sna bzhi
100b2(rgyud): las klu bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ klu'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon stsal te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig
100b3(rgyud): ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /de phan chad gang bsgo ba de bgyid do/ /de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang por gnas so/ /de nas khyab 'jug gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga
100b4(rgyud): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta
100b5(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA e ka e ka/ ba ra ba ra/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ biSh+Na be swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags te/ 'dis sdang ba thams cad
100b6(rgyud): bzlog par bgyi'o/ /phung bar bgyi'o/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i blo nyams par mi
100b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa dang / ba'i rnam lnga bsres
101a1(rgyud): pas khyab 'jug gi gzugs lag pa bzhi pa bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon pa gcig na 'khor lo/ g.yas pa gcig na dbyug to/ /g.yon pa gcig na dung /
101a2(rgyud): g.yas pa gcig na dam pa sbyin pa bgyis la/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod la kha nub phyogs su bltas te mchis la
101a3(rgyud): khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'gul ba'am/ dung sgra 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ dgos pa gang bsams pa de thams cad bgyid do/ /de nas
101a4(rgyud): yi dwags kyi bdag po drag pos byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchis
101a5(rgyud): te| des na bdag las drag po bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams cad kyi drag po zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying po 'dis bdag rgyu ba dang /
101a6(rgyud): mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum ma rungs par bgyid do/ /dbang du bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul
101a7(rgyud): lo| |na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
101b1(rgyud): spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /yi dwags kyi tshogs thams cad lhan cig bka' bzhin bgyid
101b2(rgyud): do| |'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ der dur khrod du lus thal bas byugs la mi mgo'am/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing lag na
101b3(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa thogs te khri'i zur shing khyer la/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs 'tshal zhing slong mo'i zas bab bab tu 'tshal la snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod
101b4(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /de nas du ba 'thul ba'i dur khrod du ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis te mdung rtse gsum pa dang / khri'i zur shing bzhag la ci 'byor pa'i mchod
101b5(rgyud): p a bgyis nas sha chen gyi bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag brjod pa bgyis na dag po nyid yi dwags mang pos bskor nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i gzugs
101b6(rgyud): can du mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la mi 'jigs par bgyi zhing mchod yon stsal lo/ /de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad kyang bgyid do/ /de'i slad bzhin du bka'
101b7(rgyud): bzhin sdod pa lhur len to/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan
102a1(rgyud): 'das/ bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bon+ne te dat+ta b+hu ta a d+hi pa ti swAhA/
102a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsal pa ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyis
102a3(rgyud): na| bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des skyed mos tshal dben pa'i gnas su
102a4(rgyud): zas nub mo 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor bas mchod par bgyi ste tsan+dan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing / gtor ma rgya chen po yang
102a5(rgyud): phul/ mar gyi mar me brgyad kyang phul la/ nyi ma nub pa nas brtsams te nam phyed kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad
102a6(rgyud): kyang bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /sman bcud kyis len kyang stsol to/ /de nas lha mo dka' thub zlog gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad
102a7(rgyud): ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA u
102b1(rgyud): ma ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni skal ba bzang po thams cad bgyid pa ste/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ lig mu mig gam/ gi wang la sngags lan gcig
102b2(rgyud): btab te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des dbang ldan gyi snying po las cho ga rgyas pa nyis 'gyur
102b3(rgyud): du sbyar te bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po smin drug gi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang dkyil
102b4(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dir yid rab tu dga' zhing rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA he ku mA ra dz+wa li ta mUrti tsa ru tsi tra ma ba ra swA hA/ bdag
102b5(rgyud): gi snying po 'di ni thams cad kun tu skrag par bgyid pa ste/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /glags 'tshol ba'i gdon thams
102b6(rgyud): cad kyis glags mi thong ngo / /rma bya'i mjug ma la sngags kyis btab ste/ gdon gyis btab pa la bya ba bgyi zhing de'i bdug pa'ang bsregs na sos par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste
102b7(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog mar byis pa khye'u brgyad bkur sti cher bgyis te 'tshal ma stsal la de dag zas gang la sred pa stsal to/ /de nas ma mo'i khyim du lag na mdung
103a1(rgyud): thung thogs la gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ma mo'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du mchod pa ci 'byor
103a2(rgyud): pas mchod pa bgyis te/ 'bab chu'i 'gram gnyis kyi 'jim pa las gzugs brnyan bgyis la/ snying gar mdung thung btsugs te/ ji srid shi'o zhe'am/ rgya ba chag
103a3(rgyud): go zhes sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na grub par 'gyur ro/ /de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do/ /de nas lha'i bu sprin dkar sprin gyis lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan
103a4(rgyud): cig tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen
