103a5(rgyud): po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA gu lu gu lu/ gardza gardza/ mahA spud b+ha ba/ ba ra bin+du tut+ma la/ da ra da ra/ pu
103a6(rgyud): ra pu ra/ ka sa ka sa swAhA/ bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad la sman par bgyid pa ste/ 'dis ni bdag cag rgya che zhing stug pa'i sprin gyi dra bas nam mkha'i
103a7(rgyud): dkyil khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyid do/ /sa chen po 'di yang char pa'i rgyun chen pos tshim par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan
103b1(rgyud): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la chus phongs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung
103b2(rgyud): ngo / /lus la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /de'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par mchi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des byams pa dang ldan pas zla ba drug
103b3(rgyud): tu zla ba shar ba nas brtsams te/ zla ba shar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /zla ba drug tshang nas ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa bgyis te/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs la bum
103b4(rgyud): pa zhabs nag po med pa bkang ste/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mchod la/ nam chu las dbu ba 'byung zhing gyen du 'thor ba dang / sgra 'bug 'bug po'am/ 'brug
103b5(rgyud): gi sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na/ lha'i bu char sprin gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas chu bar snang la 'thor ro/ /de nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pa bzhin dgos
103b6(rgyud): pa thams cad bgyid do/ /de nas glog sprin 'joms pa dang / glog gzi brjid dang / glog 'od snang dang / glog phreng bzang zhes bya ba rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag
103b7(rgyud): na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnod pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag kyang dkyil
104a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ spu ra sarba mahA pri ti ka ra swAhA/
104a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na de la bdag cag gis bsrung par bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub
104a3(rgyud): par 'tshal na des phyogs bzhir sgron ma bus shing phyogs bzhir bdug pas bdugs la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te/ phyogs bzhir kha dog ji lta bzhin du bum
104a4(rgyud): pa bzhi bzhag pa la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhir glog byung ba la 'jigs par mi bgyid par thams cad la mchod yon stsal na 'grub
104a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ rang gi gnas su khrid nas bsrung bar bgyid/ yid kyis bsam pa rnams sgrub par bgyid do/ /gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de stsol to/ /de nas ri'i rgyal po
104a6(rgyud): ri rab la sogs pa ri'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom
104a7(rgyud): ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po
104b1(rgyud): 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsa la tsa la/ ma hI d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi snying po 'di
104b2(rgyud): gang zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de dgon par mchis pa'i tshe/ bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang
104b3(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /ci ste sgrub pa 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / sbrang
104b4(rgyud): rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag cag ri'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis te 'di skad ces smra'o/ /bu/ tshur shog
104b5(rgyud): nged kyi gnas su 'dir/ ci 'dod pa de sbyin no zhes smra'o/ /des kyang nam bdag dgos te dran pa'i tshe tshur shog cig ces smras na de bzhin du gyur cig thams cad bgyi yi/
104b6(rgyud): khyod su la yang ma slong zhig ces smra'o/ /de nas gshin rje dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / be con nag po can dang / skyes bu nag po dang / rna nag po dang / dpal byed ma
104b7(rgyud): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying
105a1(rgyud): po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ba b+hA sa twa ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang la la
105a2(rgyud): zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag gis de gsad dgug gi slad du rang gi g.yog 'khor mi bgyi bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des zla ba mar ngo'i zhag bcu
105a3(rgyud): bzhi'am/ zhag brgyad la bsnyung ba bgyis te/ 'bras sA lu btags pa las/ gshin rje sor brgyad dam/ sor drug nas 'khor dang bcas pa bgyis la/ ma he dang /
105a4(rgyud): be con yang ngos gnyis su bzhag ste/ de nas ci 'byor ba'i mchod ba bgyis nas mtshan thog thag gsang sngags brjod na/ nam phyed dam/ nyi ma shar na/ ma he sgra 'byin
105a5(rgyud): pa'am/ be con 'gul te/ mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i las rnams bgyid do/ /de nas mtshan mo nag
105a6(rgyud): mos rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi ka rA la rA tri mA te swahA/ gang la la rtag tu dran par bgyid na de bdag gis bsrung
105a7(rgyud): bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na snga ma bzhin no/ /be cen nag pos kyang rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ta mod b+ha
105b1(rgyud): ba kA la pA sha ga swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi bar bgyi'o/ /phan gdags pa'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci ste sgrub
105b2(rgyud): par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi ste/ bdag gis de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas skyes bu nag pos rang gi snying po smras so//
105b3(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ut+ta ma pu ru Sha swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan
105b4(rgyud): 'das/ bdag de'i drung du mi mchi bar phan gdags par bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /khyad par cung zad ni/ 'di lta ste/ skra'i zhags
105b5(rgyud): pa ni gnyis gzhag par bgyi'o/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'chi bdag gis rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma| sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu
105b6(rgyud): khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a pra ti ta tA ka te karma pa sha a bu ke de be ba ra de swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i ngang
105b7(rgyud): du mi mchi ste sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dril bu gzhag go /de nas dpal byed kyis rang gi snying po
106a1(rgyud): smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bA kr-i ti mahA trai t+ye b+ha ga ba ti/ mu ti mu khi swAhA/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na
106a2(rgyud): bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / bla ma la smod pa ni ma gtogs so/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des
106a3(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /'bras kyi 'o thug lan tshwa can gzhag par bgyi ste/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol to/ /de nas rna nag mos rang gi snying po
106a4(rgyud): smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA kA la tsakra Ni swAhA/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste/ pha dang / ma mi
106a5(rgyud): dga' ba bgyis pa ni ma gtogs so/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bye brag tu ni phub ma'i me dang bcas pa'i me snod gzhag
106a6(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /su zhig de ltar bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas ma mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba
106a7(rgyud): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma mo drag mo bdag cag kyang 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i slad du grong dang /
106b1(rgyud): ljongs thams cad du gnas par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdag cag so so'i snying po 'bul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshangs pa'i chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maH
106b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA oM brah+ma ba ti ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du
106b3(rgyud): 'brang par bgyi'o/ /ma mo thams cad kyang yi rangs nas rtag tu bsrung bar bgyid do/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal ba des/ oM zhes bgyi ba snying gar bsams la lan 'bum bzlas
106b4(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas ma mo'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ mtshan thog thag tu sngags bgrang nor bu dang / ril ba sbyi blugs lag na thogs la/ oM zhes
106b5(rgyud): bgyi ba'i sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas bsgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba'i las de bgyid do/ /gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /de nas drag po'i chung
106b6(rgyud): mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA hrIHphaT swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rgyun tu dran par
106b7(rgyud): bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing bsgo ba bzhin bgyi'o/ /gang bsams bde stsol to/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dur khrod
107a1(rgyud): na mtshan gcig mchis par lha chen po'i glo g.yas par lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/ da tu ke ra ka'i
107a2(rgyud): me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la smyugs pa bzhi khri dur gyi mer sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /nam phyed na khyu mchog gi sgra'am/ oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur te/
107a3(rgyud): de nas ma mo thams cad grub par gyur to/ /de nas khyab 'jug gi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA nA ra ya ni dza gar+thi
107a4(rgyud): ha ri/ ba la ba di dza ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bsrung pa dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin
107a5(rgyud): 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des bsod nams 'bab par lan lnga khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ston zla tha chung tshes bcu gnyis la ci
107a6(rgyud): 'byor pas mchod de/ man dA ra ba'i me tog mar la smyugs pa la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /ma mo thams cad kyi dam tshig
107a7(rgyud): 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhon nu'i chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ku mA ri/ ma yU ra/ tsi tra ke ta ga dre shak+ti
107b1(rgyud): d+hA ri Ni/ bid tsi swAhA/ phu swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de'i slang bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o/ /ci ste snying po 'di
107b2(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na des kha lho phyogs su bltas la lag pa g.yon par mdung thung thogs shang lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin du ci 'byor bas mchod
107b3(rgyud): la 'bru'i la du rgya shug tsam gyis mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /nam phyed dam/ nang par gzhon nu mchis nas mdun du 'greng ste/ de la mchod yon stsol to/ /de
107b4(rgyud): phyin chad grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/ /de nas tsa muN+Dis rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ru d+hi ra be tA li/ A
107b5(rgyud): kaR+Sha Ni/ mahA kr-it+te ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da tsa muN+Ti bid tse swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin
107b6(rgyud): 'brang zhing yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o/ /ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des gos sngon po bgos te/ lag na mi thod thogs te zla ba gcig
107b7(rgyud): zas su sha bza' zhing dur khrod dam/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor par mchod de/ sha chen po'i sreg blugs yungs kar gyi
108a1(rgyud): mar la smyugs pa lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te lce myug myug bgyid la/ lag na mi thod thugs shing mchi bar
108a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ mi thod khrag gis bkang ba'i mchod yon stsol to/ /de nas legs so zhes mchi ste/ sgrub pa po la bskor ba bgyis te/ de nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de slan
108a3(rgyud): chad rtag tu slad bzhin 'brang zhing ci 'dod pa de bgyid do/ /de nas phag gi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra go Ni
108a4(rgyud): ni bId brjod tir/ bI ra li hUM ka ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams
108a5(rgyud): cad bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ske tshe'i 'bru dang chang bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan 'bum ma
108a6(rgyud): mo'i dkyil 'khor du sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas nam phyed na phag gi chung ma nyid byi la mo'i gzugs kyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na lha'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ngo / /de nas
108a7(rgyud): grub par rig par bgyi ste/ de phyin chad ci 'dod pa bzhin du las thams cad bgyid do// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po drug pa/
108b1(rgyud): de nas lus ngan gyi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsi da ri Ni ku ra bin+de dAn+da pA Ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying
108b2(rgyud): po 'di dran par bgyid na de la rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /nyin gcig bzhin du nor thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/ /bdag gi phyag brnyan bzhi
108b3(rgyud): rtag tu g.yog 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lag na
108b4(rgyud): be con thogs la shing drung gcig na mchis par snying bo 'di lan sum khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor pas mchod pa la 'bras yos kyi sreg blugs zho dang /
108b5(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ de slan chad gang 'tshal ba de bgyid de/ /de nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i chung
108b6(rgyud): mas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo//
108b7(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA he ku na khi/ mahA na khi sha ku ni/ u lU ka mu khi/ ya ma dU tI bita tse swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di
109a1(rgyud): rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lam gyi bzhi
109a2(rgyud): mdo'am/ shing drung gcig par mchis la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de/ bu btsas pa'i thal ba'i sreg blugs lan 'bum
109a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i chung mas srul po'i gzugs 'dzin cing mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la 'ug pa'i 'dab ma'i bdug pa stsal to/ /de nas
109a4(rgyud): grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/ /de nas chu klung chen po gang gA la sogs pa chu klung chen po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag
109a5(rgyud): btsal te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe
109a6(rgyud): b+h+yaH sarba tha ma na si ma no nu ge ga li bi ma le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de la chu'i 'jigs pa thams cad
109a7(rgyud): mi 'byung ngo / /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na lkog ma nub tsam gyi tar zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de/ 'bras
109b1(rgyud): sA lu btags pa'i phye ma zho dang / sbrang rtsis sbrus pa las sor drug tshad tsam gyi gzugs bgyis la stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ de slan chad chu klung
109b2(rgyud): rnams su zhugs kyang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de dag nyid dang / ji srid 'dod kyi bar du gnas shing bu bzhin rjes su spyod la gang 'tshal bde stsol to/ /de nas sna tshogs
109b3(rgyud): phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po thams cad kyis lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
109b4(rgyud): kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+ha ga ba ti gan+d+ha rba rA dza pri ye swAhA/ gang la la zhig bdag
109b5(rgyud): cag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag cag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis gnang ba stsal bar
109b6(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /bskor nas gnas par bgyid do/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa bgyid cing steng du bla re bzung la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
109b7(rgyud): 'dun rjes su dran pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma dgon pa chen por zhugs la zas su 'bras bu bza' zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum
110a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de/ du ru ska'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis na dri za'i rgyal po gang
110a2(rgyud): yang rung ba zhig mchis nas mgo la me tog gi phreng ba stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas dri za'i nang du kun gyis bkur bas 'gyur te/ dri za'i gnas thams cad
110a3(rgyud): du zhugs kyang nam yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdor na gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog la sogs pa rig sngags
110a4(rgyud): 'chang gi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gal bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
110a5(rgyud): cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+ya| sarba thA ga ga na saM b+ha be ga ga na gau ri/ u tA t+ti ke hi ri khi ri
110a6(rgyud): sa nas ra ba haM ga mi swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po zhes
110a7(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa zhes bgyi'o/ /mdor na 'dod pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad bgyid do/ /bcom
110b1(rgyud): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag de la dngos grub dang / mthu dang / stobs
110b2(rgyud): brtan pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par bgyid na nges re'i rtse mor mchis la cho ga snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas
110b3(rgyud): mchod la ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/ mar gyi sreg blugs lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /thogs pa med par 'dod dgur 'gro bar
110b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de nas so can la sogs pa srin mo chen mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras
110b5(rgyud): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ker ka ri ko ta re pi te ke
110b6(rgyud): swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par byed na/ de dgon pa chen po na mchis kyang rung / dur khrod na mchis kyang rung / /chu'i nang na mchis
110b7(rgyud): kyang rung / ma'i nang na mchis kyang rung / rgya mtsho'i nang na mchis kyang rung / srin mo'i nang na mchis kyang rung ste/ bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar
111a1(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /chad pa la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong ngam/ dur khrod chen por gcig pu bong bu la zhon zhing
111a2(rgyud): bslangs pa ma lags pa'i kha zas 'tshal la/ lag na gri thogs shing ce spyang gi lpags pa'am/ byi la'i lpags pa'i sham thabs bgos la snying po lan 'bum bzlas brjod
111a3(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /tha ma nya sha la sogs pa ci 'byor bas mchod la ba lang gi lci ba'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ phyogs phyogs su bya b+he ru Na Ti
111a4(rgyud): ka phyogs bzhir sgra 'byin pa'am/ bong bu kha nas me lce 'bar ba 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing 'jigs pa mi bgyi bar legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod la mchod
111a5(rgyud): yon stsal to/ /legs so zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/ /bong bu la zhon zhing gang dga' bar 'gro bar
111a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i rgyal po brtsegs pa la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btung
111a7(rgyud): de 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang /
111b1(rgyud): phan pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu kha b+h+yaH sarba thA hi si hi si/ mi si mi si/ gi li gi li/ b+hU te shwa ri swAhA/
111b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag des bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bye brag tu ni zas kyi phung stsal la don thams cad bsgrub par
111b3(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des shing ba ti'i drung du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o/ /tsan+dan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing kha zas mi bza' bar 'byung po'i rgyal po
111b4(rgyud): thams cad lhags nas gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /yang na rang gi khyim du khrid nas dngos po thams cad kyis mgron
111b5(rgyud): bgyid do/ /gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/ /las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang bgyid do/ /de nas ba lang skyong la sogs pa sha za thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag
111b6(rgyud): na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba
111b7(rgyud): mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA mi tsi/ khi si khi si swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /
112a1(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad la gnang ba stsal par bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong du snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci
112a2(rgyud): 'byor pas mchod de/ gzegs ma'i sreg blugs sam/ rgya skyegs kyi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na sha za gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas dam pas mgron
112a3(rgyud): bgyid do/ /gang 'tshal ba de bslang bar bgyi ste 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/ /de nas gnon po 'gul po la sogs pa gnon po thams cad kyis byang
112a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te
112a5(rgyud): b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA gu ru gu ru swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyis na/ de la 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /de nas
112a6(rgyud): rnam par 'byam pa la sogs pa grib gnon rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil
112a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA gi ni dza miny+dzi swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di
112b1(rgyud): rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /de nas nya mid la sogs pa mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
112b2(rgyud): rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe
112b3(rgyud): b+h+yaH sarba thA gi li gi li swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag cag de'i mdangs 'phrog par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas bzhin ngan la sogs
112b4(rgyud): pa yi dwags kyi tshogs thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
112b5(rgyud): rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+hi mi ri b+hi mi ri/ dur la b+he swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par
112b6(rgyud): bgyid na bdag cag de'i dgos pa thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid do/ /de nas legs rgyal la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyis byang chub sems
112b7(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdud kyi stobs thams cad ba zhes bgyi ba'i snying po 'bul
113a1(rgyud): lo| |na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA taM gi ra swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag
113a2(rgyud): cag de'i gan du mi mchi bar bsrung ba bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar gtsang mar bgyis shing gos gtsang ma bgos la skyed mos tshal lam/ lha
113a3(rgyud): chen po'i gnas su glu len gar bgyid cing rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dag gis yid dga' bar snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas de nyid du
113a4(rgyud): yo byad thams cad kyis rgya cher mchod la spos thams cad las 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs bgyis te/ mar gyi mar me brgyad bus la glu drug ldan nam/ 'dab brgya ma'i
113a5(rgyud): dbyangs kyis mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed na dga' ma'am/ sdug ma dang lhan cig tu mchis shing / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ mi snang
113a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'am/ rjes su rgyu ba nyid kyang rung ste dam pa stsol to/ /ci ste ma grub na grong dam pa brgyad stsol to/ /skal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan zhing 'dod pa'i lha gnyis
113a7(rgyud): pa dang 'dra bar sa la rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal ma la sogs pa sring mo chen mo bzhi phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs te 'dug nas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na
113b1(rgyud): rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /de nas rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA
113b2(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsa ye tsa yod b+ha be swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar
113b3(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bu mang por bgyi'o/ /skal pa bzang po stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu'i
113b4(rgyud): klung du zhugs kyang rung / ri'i rtse mor mchis kyang rung / snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar gcig pus sa phyogs gtsang ma dben par ba lang gi lci ba sa
113b5(rgyud): la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ ba ser mo'i mar gyi mar me bus te/ nam gyi gung la yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams
113b6(rgyud): cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / 'dod dgur 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rnam par rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa/
113b7(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA dza yot+ta re dza ya bi dza ya ni nan+da ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag
114a1(rgyud): rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa phun sum tshogs par stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub
114a2(rgyud): par 'tshal na des yang snga ma bzhin lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug
114a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /nor chen po dang ldan pa dang / lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi pham mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA
114a4(rgyud): an+ta a dzi te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i
114a5(rgyud): slad du rtag tu slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor
114a6(rgyud): pas mchod de/ /tshan thog thag tu gu gul gyi bdug pa bsreg cing til nag pos nam gyi gung la sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal
114a7(rgyud): ba de bgyid do/ /de nas gzhan gyi mi thub mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA an+nardza be a ku ti le a pa rA dzi ti swAhA/
114b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /snying po 'di bzlas brjod
114b2(rgyud): bgyis na skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / gzung ba'i tshig dang / skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan bzhi
114b3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/ klu shing gi me tog mar dang bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na de dag 'grub par 'gyur te/ tshig
114b4(rgyud): tsam gyis las bgyid de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas tam bu ras byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das
114b5(rgyud): b dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po
114b6(rgyud): 'bul lo/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM he dzaM b+he/ oM he mo he swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni gdong bzhi pa phyogs bzhi nas
114b7(rgyud): byung ba/ skye dgu gnas pa/ 'byor pa/ 'byin pa/ sdud par bgyid pa ste/ /'bru dang bsangs dang bkra shis dang / /dpal dang rnam par 'byor pa 'phel/ /ngo mtshar mang po rnams
115a1(rgyud): dang ldan/ /'di ni bcud kyis len gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di dus thams cad du yid la bgyid na/ bdag 'khor dang bcas te
115a2(rgyud): de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / lam du 'gro yang rung / bdag la rnam par dgod pa bgyis pa
115a3(rgyud): bzhin du skyes bu bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gdod bzhi pa rnam par bkod la phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ zla ba nya'i bar du bgyi'o/ /ci 'byor pas
115a4(rgyud): mchod de 'bras sA lu btags pa las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas par bgyis la/ snying po oM zhes bgyi ba dang / dza zhes bgyi ba shar phyogs su dgod do/ /b+ha zhes bgyi
115a5(rgyud): ba nub phyogs su gzhag go/ ma zhes bgyi ba byang phyogs su gzhag go/ /ha zhes bgyi ba lho phyogs su gzhag la/ dngos grub 'tshal bas rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du mchis
115a6(rgyud): te| nub gcig lan tshwa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na/ nang par dngos grub ci 'tshal ba'i 'bras bu stsol to/ /bzlas brjod bgyis na yi ge go rims bzhin du rig
115a7(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bltas nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag/ 'di ltar khyed kyis dkyil 'khor
115b1(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams smras shing phul ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba ni/ grogs po dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /snying po 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis drangs pa ste/ de
115b2(rgyud): bas na 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis zin pas dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig bstan pa 'di las 'das na snying po mchog gis rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu mched cing
115b3(rgyud): 'bar bas de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos
115b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe rdo rje ye shes chen po'i 'od zer 'phro ba las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
115b5(rgyud): zhugs nas lag pas lag na rdo rje las rdo rje blangs te/ ye shes las byung ba'i ut+pal dri ma med par byas nas ye shes chen po las byung ba'i ut+pal de la rdo rje gzhag go /rdo rje chen
115b6(rgyud): po de bzhag ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ kye ma/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
115b7(rgyud): 'di na dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying ga nas mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po byung ngo / /
116a1(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA many+dzu badzra dza ya ra ti ta bi las hUM kr-i da na ku mA ra swAhA/ rdo rje'i snying bo'i hUM zhes bya ba mchog dang ldan pa byung
116a2(rgyud): ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'jam dpal
116a3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur ba'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje chen po legs so legs/ /stobs chen rdo rje dam pa sbyin/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur bar/ /dngos grub bsgrub
116a4(rgyud): pa rgya cher ni/ /bstan pa 'di la bshad par bgyis/ /de skad gsungs nas rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas de dag der bzhugs bzhin/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu'i spyi bo nas/ /phyag
116a5(rgyud): rnams de dag slar bkug go / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnang bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba smras pa//
116a6(rgyud): thog ma nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du snying po gang yang rung ba rgya cher brjod de/ slob
116a7(rgyud): dpon mgu bar byas la gsol ba gdab ste/ slob dpon/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag la gsang sngags stsal du gsol zhes brjod par
116b1(rgyud): bya'o| |slob dbon la de skad ces gsol ba btab nas/ thal mo sbyar te pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs la lag pa stong pa ma yin pas sngags gang 'dod pa mnod par bya ste/ byang chub
116b2(rgyud): kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du'o zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan du sngags bdag gis blangs na ni grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i snying po 'di dag
116b3(rgyud): gi spyi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa na 'di yin te/ ri'am/ nags tshal lam/ khang stong ngam/ phug gam/ dur khrod ngam/ chu klung ngam/ dben pa gang yang rung ba der gnas la slong
116b4(rgyud): mo'i zas za yang rung / bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas za yang rung / /gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos lan gsum brjes te/ snying
116b5(rgyud): po gang yang rung ba zhig lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas ldong ros sam/ lig bu mig gam/ gi wang ngam ba'i rnam lngas bkrus kyang rung / ba lang gi lci ba'i
116b6(rgyud): phung po'i steng du gzhag kyang rung te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du gzhag go/ bdag gis lha dang / bdag gi gzugs tha mi dad par byas la mtshan ma byung
116b7(rgyud): gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te sngon ma byung ba'i chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos par
117a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa myong ba snyam du shes ba dang / bdag nyid la yid ches par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
117a2(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ rdzas de lag pa'i snyim par btsug la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam/ nyi ma 'char kar
117a3(rgyud): rdzas de 'bar ba'am/ du ba 'thul ba'am/ dro bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar na ni lus la bskus na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang / bskal bar
117a4(rgyud): gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad du rgyu ba dang / 'dod na mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul na sum ris byas na mi
117a5(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dro bar 'gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /ma grub na las su rung ba dang / blon bo chen po'i srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig
117a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed cing snying po gang yang rung ba zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la blta zhing
117a7(rgyud): mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de'i gzugs de grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang yang rung ba'i mdun du bsgrubs na yang de bzhin du
117b1(rgyud): 'grub ste gang 'dod pa de byed do/ /sngar spyad pa ma byas kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la dbus kyi yul du ni 'khor lo sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das drag po chen po 'grub
117b2(rgyud): bo| |lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni lag na rdo rje drag po 'grub bo/ /'gro lding ba'i yul du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'gro lding 'grub bo/ /byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni byang chub sems dpa'
117b3(rgyud): lag na pad+mo 'grub bo/ /shar phyogs kyi yul du ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'grub bo/ /skyed mos tshal chen por ni gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams 'grub bo/ /khang
117b4(rgyud): stong du ni sha za dang / sha za mo rnams 'grub bo/ /dur khrod du ni ma mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / srin mo la sogs pa 'grub bo/ /ri rnams su ni rig sngags
117b5(rgyud): 'chang rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams 'grub bo/ /dgon pa chen po rnams su ni dri za rnams 'grub bo/ /'bab chu rnams su ni klu rnams 'grub bo/ /khang pa chen po dang / shing ba
117b6(rgyud): ta'i drung dag tu ni 'byung po rnams 'grub bo/ /byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni gnod sbyin chen po dang / na da ku be ra 'grub bo/ /rgya mtsho chen por ni sring mo bzhi dag 'grub bo/ /
117b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang / grong khyer chen po rnams su ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can 'grub bo/ /chu 'dus su ni tshangs pa 'grub bo/ /dur khrod
118a1(rgyud): du wa dang bcas par ni drag po 'grub bo/ /skyes bu chen po'i gnas su ni khyab 'jug 'grub bo/ /byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni nyi ma 'grub bo/ /
118a2(rgyud): gangs ri la ni zla ba 'grub bo/ /lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni smin drug gi bu 'grub bo/ /ri sul dag tu ni lha ma yin rnams 'grub bo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ rgya mtsho
118a3(rgyud): chen po rnams su ni lto 'phye chen po rnams 'grub bo/ /yul ma ga d+hAr ni drang srong chen po rnams 'grub bo/ /mya ngam dag tu ni yi dwags rnams 'grub bo/ /
118a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang / ri rnams su ni rin po che dag 'grub bo/ /'bab chu rnams su ni 'bab chu chen po dag 'grub bo/ /yul ka
118a5(rgyud): ling kar ni 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan 'grub bo/ /gtor khung rnams su ni gnon po dag 'grub bo/ /khyim gyi bar rnams su ni grib gnon rnams
118a6(rgyud): 'grub bo/ /rten dang / gnas rnams su ni brjed byed kyi gdon rnams 'grub bo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ gzhan yang / yul lang ka dang / ri ma
118a7(rgyud): la ya'i steng du ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub bo/ /gzhan yang / srin po chen po rnams ni yul lang ka dang / ri ma la yar 'grub
118b1(rgyud): bo/ /gzhan yang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'grub bo/ /gangs khrod du ni dbyar sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams 'grub bo/ /gzhan yang / ri
118b2(rgyud): rtse brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni klu bdud 'grub bo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
118b3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung ste/ dus kyi dbang gis gsang sngags 'grub pa gdags par mdzad cing rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/ /de
118b4(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ dus zhes bya ba 'di ni
118b5(rgyud): chos gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ dus
118b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho
118b7(rgyud): la gzhes pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po
119a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po yod de/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de srid du chu skam par mi 'gyur te nor bu rin po chen po mang po dag
119a2(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho chen po de yang skam la gnas pa dang / chu la gnas pa'i mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kha cig tu ni btung bas/ kha cig
119a3(rgyud): tu ni gnas kyis/ kha cig tu ni rin po che rnam par 'geng pa nas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi bar gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing nam yang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nor bu rin po che
119a4(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po de med par gyur na chu med pa dang / dngos po thams cad med pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po yang srog chags thams cad kyi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo
119a5(rgyud): gros/ de bzhin du ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i
119a6(rgyud): dbang nye bar bzung nas dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dngos grub de yang nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i
119a7(rgyud): blo gros ltos/ ji tsam du shing yod pa de tsam du 'bar te/ shing med na me mi 'bar ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub
119b1(rgyud): bar khong du chud par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni dus yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
119b2(rgyud): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas 'byung bar brtson par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gsang
119b3(rgyud): sngags spyad pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la gsang sngags spyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / spro ba dang / yi dam la brtan par gsang sngags kyi
119b4(rgyud): gzhi re re nas spyad par bya'o/ /ji tsam du 'gro yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung ste/ de sems rtse gcig kho nas 'jug ste/ gnyis su ni ma yin no/ /gcig pu gnyis su
119b5(rgyud): med par dpen par nyams dga' ba 'du 'dzi med pa rang gi yul na gnas shing sngar bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te nya'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas ral gri 'am/ 'khor
119b6(rgyud): lo'am/ lig bu mig gam/ gi waM la sogs pa gang rung ba zhig blangs la/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba gcin dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor byugs la bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor
119b7(rgyud): bri bar bya'o/ /'khor lo bsgrub na/ 'khor lo rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /ci ste ral gri bsgrub na des rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /ci ste lig bu mig dang / gi wang la
120a1(rgyud): sogs pa bsgrub na mdung rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /ci 'byor pas mchod la nyi ma nub kar dmar thag chad nas nyi ma shar gyi
120a2(rgyud): bar du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas la bsrung ba byas pa dang / byams pa'i sems kyis rdzas de blangs te/ mtshan
120a3(rgyud): thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam/ nyi ma 'char khar rdzas de nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar na yan lag bkra la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang ba thams
120a4(rgyud): cad 'ong zhing de dag gis bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur te/ 'dod na ma chi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
120a5(rgyud): cad la mchod pa byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i yid du 'gyur ro/ /gi
120a6(rgyud): wang la sogs pa yang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su spyad pa spyod pa dang / bskal par gnas
120a7(rgyud): shing rgyu ba dang / 'dod dgur thags thegs med par 'gro bar 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas kyang rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul na
120b1(rgyud): mi snang ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang / 'dod pa bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyu ba dang / longs spyod kyi drug cha 'phrog par 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas kyang dga' ldan
120b2(rgyud): gyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad shes par 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas kyang
120b3(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du gnod sbyin gyi pho brang lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin gzhon nu'i lus 'thob bo/ /ci ste ma grub na yang nges par yul thob par 'gyur
120b4(rgyud): ro| |de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po
120b5(rgyud): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du gyur pa/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa gsang sngags kyi mgon
120b6(rgyud): po'i sgrub pa nyon cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ thog ma nyid du sngar spyad pa byas pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dam tshig thob pa/ gnang ba/ rdo rje 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i
120b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor bris la rin po che dang / spos dang / sman thams cad kyis bkang ba'i bya ma bum bcu drug 'khor
121a1(rgyud): los bsgyur ba chen po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dus thams cad du lha'i gzugs
121a2(rgyud): mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas ri'i rtse mor song la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dus gsum du khrus bya/ dus gsum du gos brjes la shing ltar mi smra bar bya zhing gtsang spra dang
121a3(rgyud): gtsang spra spyod pa phun sum tshogs par byas la bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po sa ya phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje drag po'i
121a4(rgyud): snying po lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas gser mgar gso sbyong gzung bas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am/ drug pa nor bu me shel gyi lte ba
121a5(rgyud): can 'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba byed du bzhug go/ de nas spos chus bkrus te mchog sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i sngags kyis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje drag
121a6(rgyud): po'i snying pos bskul bar byas te/ bskul nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na tsan+dan gyi sgrom bu yod pa'i nang du bcug la bzhag go/ de
121a7(rgyud): nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku mtho gang tshad kyi mchod rten khri bya'o/ /de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te a ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing zla ba nya'i bar du bya'o//
121b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byed cing bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas za bas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/ rdo rje'i
121b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de na 'dug pa'i 'khor lo lag pas blangs la 'khor lo las 'od zer rnams ma byung gi bar
121b3(rgyud): du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de dag gis sgrub pa po snang bar byas nas lus 'gyur ro/ /nam phyed dam/ nyi ma 'char kar sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rol mo'i sgra
121b4(rgyud): 'byung ngo / /lha'i spos chu dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char bar snang las 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams
121b5(rgyud): cad 'dus te/ de dag gis dbang bskur nas lha'i rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mthong ba dang / gang dag gis mthong ba de
121b6(rgyud): dag dang lhan cig tu gyen du 'phags so/ /nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan zhing yid mgyogs pa'i shugs 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
121b7(rgyud): la mchod pa byed pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
122a1(rgyud): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong nas gong du 'gyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang dang / lha'i bu mo bya
122a2(rgyud): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i g.yog 'khor can/ lha'i sil snyan dang / pheb rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur nas/ 'di
122a3(rgyud): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po bya ba bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo de la zhon te 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
122a4(rgyud): 'khor rnams su mchod pa'i don du skad cig re re la yang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / ras thams
122a5(rgyud): cad dang / gos thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / gzhal med khang thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba thams cad
122a6(rgyud): dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / zas dang / skom thams cad dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad dang / lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang / lha'i sman gyi shing ljon pa
122a7(rgyud): rnams dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thams cad dang / dus thams cad du lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams 'bul lo/ /yi dwags rnams kyi nang du ni bza' ba dang / gos dang /
122b1(rgyud): rgyan dag gi sprin mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /'dod na mchi'o/ /rgyal ba'i sras mos pas spyod pa gzhal du med pa'i sa thob pa yin no/ /grags pa chen po dang ldan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
122b2(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bskyed pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par gzi brjid dam/ stobs sam/
122b3(rgyud): ye shes sam/ bkod pa'am/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ 'phrul pa'am/ gzugs sam/ dpal lam/ spobs pa de dang mnyam pa'am/ lhag pa gang yang med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros
122b4(rgyud): kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ci ltar bkod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa dang / bsam gtan dang / bsam pa zad mi shes pas re ba
122b5(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ji tsam du mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /'jam
122b6(rgyud): dpal| gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rtag tu rjes su dran pa de dag kyang yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
122b7(rgyud): nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin
123a1(rgyud): no| |bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po ni yon tan gyi chos dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po
123a2(rgyud): 'di ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho yang sa chen po 'di na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po yang mi rtog rnam par mi
123a3(rgyud): rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa chen po ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po 'di ni lo tog thams cad skyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi re ba
123a4(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po yang thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
123a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod byed pa dang / bsgrungs pas kyang rnam pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
123a6(rgyud): par mdzad do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/ /klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
123a7(rgyud): nyid do/ /bdud bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/ /las bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes gang dag yang dag par smra bas smras pa de dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'di nyid la
123b1(rgyud): yang dag par smra bas smras pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de dag thams cad ni 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten
123b2(rgyud): las 'das pa'i bsam gtan kha cig bsam gtan bsgrub pa'am/ /bdud dam/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gam/ klu'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
123b3(rgyud): chos dang ldan par gyur pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'di nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs kyang ston to/ /zhi
123b4(rgyud): ba'i blo gros/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'di ji ltar gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po dang / gtso bo dang / mnga'
123b5(rgyud): mdzad pa dang / 'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang mchog gzhan la med par rig par bya'o/ /'khor lo la ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa
123b6(rgyud): gdengs pa dang / mdung thung dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / thong gshol dang / zhags pa dang / ka na ya dang / lcags mda' dang / lcags thag dang / gzhu dang / be con
123b7(rgyud): dang | mdung dang / gtun shing rked nyag dang / dbyug to rnam ba sna tshogs bsgrub par bya'o/ /lig bu mig dang / gi waM dang / ldong ros la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bsgrub
124a1(rgyud): par bya ste/ de dag gi dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin du rnam pa gsum mo/ /ci ste ril bu bsgrub par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur
124a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po'i sngags lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas ldong ros dang / lig bu mig dang / ud ma gup+ta'i rtsa ba dang / an+d+ha puSh+pi ka'i rtsa ba rnams cha bsnyams te gcig
124a3(rgyud): tu bsres la ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad du byas te/ lcags sna gsum gyis bskor la/ 'khor lo lag na thogs sam/ ral gri lag na thogs shing ring bsrel dang
124a4(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du zas mi bza' bar de khar bcug la nub kha dmar thag chad nas bzung ste/ 'khor lo dang / ral gri las sngon po'am/
124a5(rgyud): ser por snang ba'i 'od zer byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas na sgrub pa po snang bar byed cing grub par 'gyur te/ nyi ma shar ba'i mdog can dang / rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / bskal
124a6(rgyud): par gnas pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa de shi 'phos nas kyang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs
124a7(rgyud): dang / sku gzugs med par gyi na bsgrubs kyang dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/ /ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo gzugs
124b1(rgyud): bzang ba/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ gso sbyong bzung ba zhig la rin la ma brtsegs par nyos pa'i shing bal 'khal du bcug la/ tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / yud
124b2(rgyud): tsam bzang po la yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i tha ga pa 'thag tu bcug ste ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
124b3(rgyud): la sogs pas mchod do/ /skra med pa dang / mnyam pa dang / 'jam par bya'o/ /thag pa'i thags cha rnams kyang ba'i rnam lnga dang / spos chus bkru'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ thams cad kyang
124b4(rgyud): rdo rje drag po'i snying pos lus bsrung bar bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung ba dang / mkhas pa dang / dad pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa/ ser sna med pa dang / yan lag thams cad
124b5(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa zhig sa phyogs dben zhing dug med pa/ gtsang ba me tog bkram par a ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing tshon rtsi sar pa sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis
124b6(rgyud): 'drir gzhug go/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ yang na sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya'o/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing sil snyan dang / dga' bar 'gyur
124b7(rgyud): ba'i sgra mang po dang / shis pa rgya chen po dang / bkra shis pa brjod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sgrub pa po byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thod ze'u ka
125a1(rgyud): bcings pa/ sngags bgrang nor bu 'phyang ba dang bcas par ri mo mkhan gyi rgyab na 'dug cing bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i
125a2(rgyud): gzugs dang / kha dog bsam par bya'o/ /phyag rgya dang / yi ge rnams kyang bsam zhing bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bri bar bya ste/ pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs
125a3(rgyud): pa| gser gyi kha dog gi mdog can/ me lce 'bar ba lang long du gyur pa/ thor tshugs can dar ram/ ras kyi sham thabs mnabs pa/ na bza' bla gos dar la mnabs pa/
125a4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa/ zhal yid tsam 'dzum pa/ mtshan thams cad dang ldan par bri'o/ /de'i g.yas rol tu dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gur gum gyi kha dog can
125a5(rgyud): phud bu lnga pa/ rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pal sngon po lag pa g.yon pa na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyis smad g.yogs bgos
125a6(rgyud): pa| bla gos dar la gyon pa/ me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ pad+ma dkar po la 'dug pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i
125a7(rgyud): g.yon rol tu ha cang yang mi ring bar de'i zhal du blta ba la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ cod pan thogs
125b1(rgyud): shing cod pan 'gul ba/ gos tshig gu gyon pa/ pus mo btsugs pa/ rdo rje dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ bka' nod pa bri'o/ /de'i mdun du snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjed
125b2(rgyud): bya'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/ lag na ral gri'am/ lag na 'khor lo thogs shing mtshan thog thag a ga ru'i yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la smyugs pas
125b3(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam/ nyi ma 'char kar nges par ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag 'byung ste/ de dag gis snang bar byas na grub par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin gar dga'
125b4(rgyud): ba der 'gro'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs de mthong ba tsam gyis kyang sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /ri mo mthong ba'i mthu yis ni/ /mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i
125b5(rgyud): las/ /sdig pa sngon chad gang byas pa/ /de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur ba gzi po che/ /mgon po dran pas 'dod pa bzhin/ /'jig rten kun gyi don bsgrub
125b6(rgyud): pa'i/ /'phrin las mdzad pa smos ci dgos/ /sngags pas ri mo'i gzugs mdun du/ /pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/ /'dod bzhin dngos grub mchog sbyin pa/ /dpal ni
125b7(rgyud): mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/ /sngags pas gang yang rung bar ni/ /zad mi shes pa'i gter mthong zhing / /nam mkha' la yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bsam pa bzhin du 'dod pa
126a1(rgyud): rnyed/ /gi wang dang ni ldong ros dang / /lig bu mig kyang de bzhin te/ /kha zas mi bza' gtsang byas la/ /mkhas pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ /sngar
126a2(rgyud): bsnyen bya ba med par yang / /sngags pas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /'jig rten gsum na mi snang zhing / /skye bo kun gyis thub mi 'gyur/ /ri dang nags tshal bcas pa yi/ /sa
126a3(rgyud): rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang / drag po chen po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni 'di
126a4(rgyud): yin te/ rang gi yul na gnas shing gtsang mar byas la byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du byas te ri'i rtse mor song la/ slong mo'i zas bza' zhing gos lan gsum
126a5(rgyud): brjes la dus gsum du khrus bya zhing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams te/ gus shing de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du byas la mi smra bar sa ya chig 'bum bzlas brjod
126a6(rgyud): bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ral gri'am/ 'khor lo'am/ be con nam/ zhags pa'am/ dgra sta'am/ gtun shing rked nyag gam/ tho ba'am/ mdung thung blangs la ba'i rnam lngas
126a7(rgyud): bkrus shing spos chus kyang bkrus la shubs dang bcas par lag na thogs te/ 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'gro yang rung / zla ba gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyal na
126b1(rgyud): yang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas zla ba phyi ma la tshes nas brtsams te/ nya'i bar du bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor bas
126b2(rgyud): mchod de/ ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la ri'i rtse mo de nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi sku
126b3(rgyud): gzugs bzhag la mchod pa byas te/ phyogs gcig tu bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /de la shar phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po yan lag bkras byin gzhag go /lho
126b4(rgyud): phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde gzhag go / nub phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog ldan gzhag go/ byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal
126b5(rgyud): po kI la ki la gzhag go/ grwa bzhir ni tshon sna bzhi pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa gzhag go/ dbus su ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bris la snying
126b6(rgyud): po'i steng du gang bsgrub pa de bri'o/ /de'i steng du rdzas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de shing a shat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag go/ pad+ma nas khru gang tsam gyis sa gzhi bor la/ rdo rje rgya gram
126b7(rgyud): bris te der 'dug la bsrung ba bya ste/ 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /'bar nas g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na me tog gi char 'bab
127a1(rgyud): bo| |zhi ba'i blo gros/ yang na snang ba chen pos sgrub pa po snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te/ mchod yon byin la blangs na
127a2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang / yid ltar mgyogs pa dang / khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
127a3(rgyud): cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / dbang phyug thams cad kyi gnas thob pa dang / 'dod na mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na mi ma yin pa'i
127a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /bdag 'chi ba shes par ro/ /lag na rdo rje bdag nyid ston par byed do/ /shi 'phos nas kyang lcang lo can du lag na rdo rje'i khyim du gzhon nu'i lus
127a5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i chu 'thungs na nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang la lan gcig sngags
127a6(rgyud): te mig la bskus na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /so shing la sngags lan gcig btab te 'chos na 'dod pa'i zas rnyed do/ /chu'i nang du me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba bor
127a7(rgyud): ba de 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /kha la sngags kyis btab na gang dang / smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la hUM zhes bya bas dug sel to/ /
127b1(rgyud): khros pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs na bag 'khums par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa la rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs shing ram zhes bya ba 'bar bar byas
127b2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis 'bros te the tshom med do/ gdon gyis zin pa lag mthil du ha zhes bya ba bsams la byabs na sos par 'gyur ro/ /me tog gam/ spos sam/ bdug pa la sngags kyis
127b3(rgyud): btab ste/ su la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon drag po thams cad kyang cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /sngags pa dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ slong mo'i zas bza'
127b4(rgyud): zhing srung ba byas la/ klu'i rgya mtshor lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na klu 'byung ste/ gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed do/ /skud pa sngon po la sngags kyis btab ste/ rims kyis btab
127b5(rgyud): pa'i mgul par bcings na de'i mod la rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /mig na ba la shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma blangs te lan cig sngags kyis btab ste/ zangs kyi snod la brud de
127b6(rgyud): mig la bskus na de'i mod la sos par 'gyur ro/ /klad nad thams cad la ni gu gul la sngags kyis btab ste lus thams cad g.yogs la mgor gtugs na klad nad med
127b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /zas ma zhu bar gyur na chu la sngags kyis btab pa'i khyor chu lan bdun 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro/ /lto na ba la ni skud ba dmar po ldum bu rat+na su rtsi'i rtsa ba dang
128a1(rgyud): bcas pa la sngags kyis btab ste rked par bcings na lto ba'i nad sos bar 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa gdon thams cad
128a2(rgyud): sel ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci las 'di dag grub pa yin par bstan tam/ 'on te ma grub pa yang yin
128a3(rgyud): nam| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rtag tu grub pa yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba ma gtogs par sngar
128a4(rgyud): spyad pa bya mi dgos/ sngar bsnyen par bya mi dgos par tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa/ byang chub
128a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa la bye brag tu brjod pa'i bsgrub pa rnams bstan to/ /shing arka dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / ki ri kar ni dkar po'i rtsa ba
128a6(rgyud): dang / ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / u shi ra dang / ba la ka dang / tsan+dan dang / na le sham dang / ni rgun ti dang / gu gul dang / mar du bsres pa'i bdug pas ni
128a7(rgyud): gdon thams cad phung bar byed pa'o/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /dpal dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang / skal ba bzang po byed pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sngon byung
128b1(rgyud): b a 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab las bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba rig byed rnams la rig byed kyi don la mkhas
128b2(rgyud): pa| bzo dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad mngon par shes pa/ gsang sngags kyi don la mkhas pa zhig byung sta/ de ri zhig gi rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo
128b3(rgyud): rje drag po chen po 'di bsgrubs bsgrubs pa las/ bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dag gis gtses pa dang / de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
128b4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
128b5(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze blo gros ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshul smos te gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
128b6(rgyud): 'di na ri che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje drag po chen po de lan gnyis su bsgrubs na/ yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
128b7(rgyud): de'i dngos grub ma rnyed ma thob mi dmigs na/ rdzas cung zad cig bsgrubs na de thams cad kyang bgegs rnams kyis phrogs na/ de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad
129a1(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bram ze blo gros ldan la gdug pa 'di dag bka'
129a2(rgyud): stsal cing gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang gsungs so/ /s+yad ya the dan/ ru ru le le/ bud d+ha ma tang gi/ puk+ka si/ sha ba ri ka /gr-ih+Na khA da ya swAhA/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe
129a3(rgyud): de'i dus na rig pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub pa'i bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs sam/ yid gnyis za na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o
129a4(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ rdo rje 'chang spros pa med par gnas pa zhes bya ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams 'di nyid du 'dus pa yin te/ spros pa rab 'byams rgya
129a5(rgyud): chen po mtha' yas pa la mkhas pa des gsang sngags 'di dang bdug pa yang de rnyed de bsgrubs so/ /ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na/ snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan
129a6(rgyud): gso sbyong bzung bas tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'dres pa dag gis ras la lag na rdo rje ut+pa la'i 'dab ma'i mdog lta bu'am/ pri yang ku'i kha dog lta bu'i mdog sngo bsangs
129a7(rgyud): sam| margad kyi kha dog lta bu'i sngo bsangs su bri bar bya ste/ zur te phyed snang ba/ rgyan thams cad gyi brgyan pa/ bzhin cung zad khros pa dang bcas pa/ gos tshig gu gyon
129b1(rgyud): pa| rin po che'i brag la rin po che'i phug na tshul bzhin du shis shing skyil mo krung phyed bcas te 'dug pa/ bsgyings pa dang bcas pa/ bsnyems pa dang bcas pa/ me lce 'bar ba'i phreng
129b2(rgyud): ba can/ lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa gsor ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i mgo bo'i g.yas rol gyi steng du ha cang yang mi ring bar de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim snang dpal
129b3(rgyud): pad+mo dkar po la skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa mdzad pa bri'o/ /g.yon rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra bas
129b4(rgyud): rab tu 'joms par dbugs 'byin pa snga ma bzhin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i 'og g.yas rol du/ phyag brnyan sog ma'i du ba'i mdog lta bu'i gos dri ma can gyon pa/ skra kham pa gyen du
129b5(rgyud): 'greng ba/ mig dmar ba/ dpral bar khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang bcas pa/ lag na zhags pa dang / ral gri thogs pa bka' nod pa lhur len pa/ pus mo gnyis btsugs pa bri'o/ /
129b6(rgyud): g.yon rol tu phyag brnyan ma pus mo btsugs pa/ mdog sngo bsangs/ ral gri so gcig pa yu ba can dang / zhags pa lag na thogs ba snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /dben pa dug
129b7(rgyud): med par de'i mdun du zas dkar gsum bza' zhing / gos dus gsum du brjes la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/ a ga ru'i yam sreg
130a1(rgyud): shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi la smyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/ nam byed dam/ nyi ma 'char kar ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag 'byung ngo / /
130a2(rgyud): yang na ri mo'i gzugs 'gul lo/ /yang na me tog gi phreng ba 'gul lo/ /snga ma bzhin du grub par 'gyur te/ las thams cad byed do/ /rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya
130a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan zhing nad thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i
130a4(rgyud): blo gros/ gzhan yang / 'jigs pa'i me'i snying po chen po stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa/ dpag tu med pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
130a5(rgyud): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin pas mchod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/
130a6(rgyud): tshes grangs dang / skar ma 'dam mi dgos/ smyung ba yang bya mi dgos par ri'i rtse mor song la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/ ske tshe'i
130a7(rgyud): 'bru'i sreg blugs dug dang / khrag dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pa lan sum 'bum sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po grag cing snga ma bzhin du 'grub par
130b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang / yid ltar mgyogs pa dang / gzi brjid mtshungs pa med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma
130b2(rgyud): gtogs par de bas lhag par su la yang med do/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi khung gi sgor song nas khros te/ lan khri
130b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya zhing sbyin sreg kyang snga ma bzhin byas na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa med par 'gyur te/ ci 'dod pa bzhin yongs su spyod cing 'dod pa bzhin du rang
130b4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad byed do/ /ci ste gter chen po 'byung bar 'dod na zas mi bza' bar snying po 'di lan khri bzlas brjod byas la tha mar shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas lan
130b5(rgyud): gsum bsnun na rang 'byung ngo / /rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /khros pa'i mdun du phyag rgya bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na dang
130b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /byis pa gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon chen po thams cad la ni gzugs byas la rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te
130b7(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ gdon de tshig cing sgra 'byin cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /dris pa myur du smra bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste pha rol la gnod par byed par 'dod na ba
131a1(rgyud): ru ra'i shing bu sor drug pa dag gcig la ming nas brjod cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags la nam phyed na/ khang steng ngam/ sgo'i steng du btsugs nas
131a2(rgyud): khyim du gnod pa chen po 'byung ngo / /yams kyi nad chen po yang 'byung ngo / /yid kyis ni zhi bar byed do/ /ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub na/ ras la bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo
131a3(rgyud): rje 'od kyi kha dog dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba/ rgyan med pa/ mig dmar ba/ khros pa/ ma mchu sos mnan pa/ dpral bar khro gnyer gyi rim pa 'chas pa/ rkang pa g.yon pas sa mnan
131a4(rgyud): te 'dug pa/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i rdog pas bsnun pa ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs mo byed pa/ lag pa g.yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje mi bzad pa 'phen
131a5(rgyud): pa ltar 'dug pa bri bar bya ste/ bsrung ba byas pa/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan
131a6(rgyud): pa'i yid du gyur pas sa phyogs dben par/ dug med par mchod pa rgya cher byas la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung ba 'drir gzhug go /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang
131a7(rgyud): bskur ba/ dam tshig thob pa/ spro ba dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug go/ gzhan ni gang gis kyang ma yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ dam tshig mi shes pa/ dkyil 'khor ma mthong
131b1(rgyud): ba| gang la la zhig gis ri mo'i gzugs mthong na/ de'i mod la de nad rnam pa gnyis kyis btab par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rims drag po dang / gcod chen por
131b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ kye ma/ gang gi yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu bstan pa'i snying po mchog /don chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa
131b3(rgyud): 'di ngo mtshar to/ /'jam dpal/ snying po mchog 'di ni gang zhig /'di'i ming ci zhig bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
131b4(rgyud): po| sra ba'i yon tan rnams dang / mthu la ni mtha' med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'i me las byung ba'i rdo rje
131b5(rgyud): zhes bya ste/ ma dul ba thams cad 'dul ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bstan pa
131b6(rgyud): mchog tu kun tu bsrung bar smon lam btab pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
131b7(rgyud): rgya mtsho rab 'byams rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam sgrogs pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/ thams cad du sngon du rgyug pa'o/ /de'i mdun du ci 'byor pas
132a1(rgyud): mchod pa byas te gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de byed do/ /ri'i rtse mo'am/
132a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i ngog su song ste ri mo'i gzugs bris la slong mo'i zas sam/ bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas bza' zhing mid ba nub pa tsam du chur zhugs la lan gsum 'bum bzlas
132a3(rgyud): brjod bya'o/ /tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la/ ral gri'am/ 'khor lo lag na thogs shing dug dang / khrag dang / yungs kar bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg byas na 'grub
132a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho las sgra 'byung zhing bskams par 'gyur ro/ /ri'ang 'gul ba'am/ 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdzi char ram/ lce 'bab
132a5(rgyud): pa la yang lan cig bsdigs pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gnod pa 'byung ba thams cad la lam gyi bzhi mdo
132a6(rgyud): 'am| shing drung gcig yod pa'am/ 'bab chu'i ngogs sam/ mtshan ma gcig yod pa'am/ grong khyer gyi sum mdor ri mo'i gzugs bris la rgya cher mchod la spos
132a7(rgyud): dang / me tog gis mchod pa'i bum pa yungs kar gyis bkang la/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags bzlas brjod bya ste/ snying po snying gar gzhag la ri mo'i gzugs de la shis
132b1(rgyud): pa snyan pa rgya chen po brjod pas mngon sum du dga' bar byas te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /yungs kar de dag gis ni gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / 'chi ba thams
132b2(rgyud): cad sel to/ /sems can dpag tshad tsam na 'khod pa thams cad kyis ri mo'i gzugs de mthong na yang de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang
132b3(rgyud): bskur ba/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag
132b4(rgyud): gi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba nyon cig / zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la sgrub pa po rig pa'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba sgrub par 'dod pas rig sngags gdon par bya ste/ tshes grangs
132b5(rgyud): dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po la smyung ba byas la/ mar gyi mar me bus te ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun
132b6(rgyud): du rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs med mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nang par khrus byas la dri zhim pos bskus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la zas dkar gsum zos te dbang po
132b7(rgyud): gsal ba dang / nyams tha mal bar gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i slob dpon bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas la thal mo sbyar te pus
133a1(rgyud): mo btsugs la gsol ba btab ste/ slob dpon/ bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la stsal du gsol/ byang chub kyi
133a2(rgyud): snying po la gnas kyi bar du bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis kyang thams cad du snying rje dang ldan pas ser sna med par byas la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o/ /de ltar rig
133a3(rgyud): sngags dang / dam tshig mnos nas ji skad bstan pa lta bu'i sa phyogs rnams su de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur la ri'i rtse mo'am/ 'bab chu'i ngogs sam/ nags khrod dam/
133a4(rgyud): chu mig gi dngo 'am/ yid du 'ong ba dben pa der zas dkar gsum za ba'am/ 'o ma btung zhing lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ral gri
133a5(rgyud): 'am| rdo rje'am/ mdung thung ngam/ be con nam/ mdung rtse gsum pa'am/ lcags sna gsum gyi 'khor lo blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng
133a6(rgyud): du gzhag la rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying pos bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la spos chus
133a7(rgyud): bkrus te/ ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris te/ ci 'byor pas mchod la shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag la/
133b1(rgyud): mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam/ nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'bar zhing rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'dus te/ de dag gis bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang
133b2(rgyud): bskur nas rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur
133b3(rgyud): ro| |ci ste ma grub la brtul zhugs ma nyams na de bzhin du lan gsum du bsgrub pa byas na/ mtshams med pa'i las byas pas kyang nges par 'grub bo/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na
133b4(rgyud): tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /sman la bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ /mar la sngags kyis btab te/ zan za kar 'thungs na lo khyud 'khor du lus brtan par 'gyur
133b5(rgyud): ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs kyi mdun du mig btsums te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs kyis dge ba dang / mi dge ba
133b6(rgyud): brjod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba bkab ste bzlas brjod byas na yang thams cad thos par 'gyur ro/ /nyal kar mal du zhugs la mig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te nyal na snang bar
133b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing thams cad mthong ste/ nyin mo ji lta ba ltar mtshan mo yang de bzhin no/ /so shing la lan gcig sngags te 'chos na ma bslangs bar zas rnyed do/ /lig bu mig
134a1(rgyud): gam/ gi wang la lan gcig sngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /spos la bzlas brjod byas te bskus na/ gang
134a2(rgyud): dag gis dri tshor ba de dag dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dgra mthong na phyag rgyas bcings la lan cig brjod na dgra dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /spos dang / me tog la sogs pa la sngags
134a3(rgyud): kyis lan cig btab te/ gang la byin pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod na skyes bu bcing ba byas la zhugs na g.yul ngor rgyal bar
