205b5(rgyud): gar byed pa yi tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa g.yas pas bsnun par bya/ /g.yon pas kyang ni de bzhin bsnun/ /rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /lag pa gyen du bsgreng
205b6(rgyud): bar bya/ /gyen du bltas nas drag tu ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun nas yang / /tshangs par bcas dang brgya byin bcas/ /gnas
205b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa thams cad 'gul/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing / /grogs dag bskal pa 'khrugs gyur tam/ /'on te sems can che 'byung ngam/ /'on te
206a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byung gyur tam/ /ci zhes thams cad phan tshun smra/ /myos ches gyur nas phan tshun dang / /phyogs bcu dag tu lta bar byed/ /
206a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na/ /gnas de nas ni dong nas su/ /rdo rje ldan pa ci bzhed pa/ /gsungs zhes lung ni nod par byed/ /bdag cag nongs pa ma
206a3(rgyud): mchis shing / /bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid ma lags/ /rdo rje 'bar bar gzir gyur nas/ /bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol/ /rdo rje can gyis rdo rje la/ /
206a4(rgyud): mig mi 'dzums par rtag tu lta/ /lha phal gzhan rnams de dag kyang / /rdo rje 'bar bas brgyal gyur nas/ /rdo rje'i dam pa ldan pa la/ /thugs la ci
206a5(rgyud): dgongs bslang mdzod dang / /gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam/ /de bzhin mi dang lha bzhed dam/ /lha yi bu mo bsnyems pa dang / /lha yi bde ba yid mthun
206a6(rgyud): bzhed/ /thugs la gang bzhed de rnams kun/ /de dag dbul bar bgyid par 'gyur/ /de nas lha mang rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag yid ni rab dga' nas/ /
206a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag /sgrub pa po la myur du dbul/ /de nas byams pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas bltas nas gtang bar bya/ /gzhan du na
206b1(rgyud): ni gzir de dag / glags rnyed gnod pa byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste/ /rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs
206b2(rgyud): rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas pa bteg cing de bzhin g.yon/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng bar
206b3(rgyud): bya| |g.yon pa snying gar gzhag nas su/ /smin ma dgug cing bskul bskyod de/ /mig gis bgegs la bltas byas na/ /hUM dang bcas pas rab bskul na/ /
206b4(rgyud): gal te tshangs pa nyid gyur tam/ /gal te khyab 'jug nyid gyur tam/ /drag po brgya byin nyid gyur yang / /bltas pas myur du 'jigs par 'gyur/ /ci ste khyab
206b5(rgyud): 'jug drag po rnams/ /bdag gi dbang du gyur 'dod pas/ /kun tu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i mig can gyis/ /rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis
206b6(rgyud): su| |rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/ /sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo/ /de nas brgya byin lha rnams dang / /lha min srin po
206b7(rgyud): gsang ba pa/ /stan las nyams par bdag nyid kyis/ /ma shes shig ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas khyab 'jug drag po rnams dang / /yid ni blong zhes gyur
207a1(rgyud): nas su/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa/ /ga la ba der thal sbyar dong / /bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis par/ /sngags kyis bdag cag
207a2(rgyud): shin tu gzir/ /gzir ba'i lha rnams de dag kun/ /stan las sems ni nyams par gyur/ /ci ltar ci bgyi bka' stsol ces/ /lung la gus pas lta
207a3(rgyud): zhing 'khod/ /kun la byams pa byas nas su/ /snying la bsam pa gcig bslangs na/ /de yi mod la de dag rnams/ /dga' zhing mgu nas sbyin par byed/ /
207a4(rgyud): sngags pa mnyam par gzhag nas su/ /de nas phyag rgya'i rgyal po btang / /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin
207a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje'i gnas ni rked nas gcod/ /rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ /dbang po chen po'i gnas su brtan/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar
207a6(rgyud): byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs byas la/ /gar byed pa yi lag pa yis/ /bgegs
207a7(rgyud): kyi gzugs rnams bsdigs par bya/ /de bzhin g.yas dang g.yon gyis kyang / /gnas nas song gi bar du bya/ /ci ste bgegs chen rab sdang ba/ /
207b1(rgyud): bsdigs kyang 'gro bar mi byed na/ /rdo rje gom pa myur bor la/ /gyen du lag pa kun tu bskyod/ /lag gnyis sa la brdabs nas su/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM
207b2(rgyud): brjod la/ /gsang sngags blo ldan rkang bskum ste/ /rnam pa kun tu lus bskor ro/ /de nas ldang ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje'i lag pa g.yas brkyang la/ /rdo rje lcags
207b3(rgyud): kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul du ni/ /lag gnyis gcig tu sbyar byas la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i
207b4(rgyud): hUM rnams dang / /phaT rnams kyis ni rab bskul te/ /rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya/ /bde gshegs go 'phang
207b5(rgyud): ma gtogs par/ /rdo rje can dang 'khor lo can/ /sangs rgyas sras po gang zhig gis/ /de yis lus la mi sems na/ /lha dang dri za gsang ba dang / /gzhan
207b6(rgyud): yang gang dag klu rnams dang / /shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin/ /hUM brjod 'jigs 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /lha min srin po ma rungs dang / /yi dwags
207b7(rgyud): grul bum mngag gzhug dang / /bdud dang bdud kyi pho nya rnams/ /'di ltar 'gyur ba ci zhig smos/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing / /snying rje la yang
208a1(rgyud): mnyam bzhag nas/ /byang chub sems dran sngags pa yis/ /phyag rgya bsdu ba brtsam par bya/ /nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/ /
208a2(rgyud): bgegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya/ /shin tu sdang bar rig nas ni/ /gal te bgegs la gnod bya na/ /shin tu sdang ba drag rnams la/ /'jam des nyid ni mi
208a3(rgyud): bya'o| |gal te 'jam des nyid byas na/ /de yi mod la gnod par byed/ /thog mar 'jam por sbyar bar bya/ /lan gnyis tshe ni dbye bar brtson/ /gsum
208a4(rgyud): tshe mchod yon thogs nas su/ /me tog snyim par gnas byas la/ /de nas bgegs la mchod par bya/ /'byung po kun phan gtor byin nas/ /'di skad
208a5(rgyud): kyi ni tshig brjod da/ /bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyi/ /song zhig bgegs chen 'gro bar gyis/ /phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /khyod kyi stobs dang
208a6(rgyud): rtsal mthong ste/ /khyod ni bgegs kyang byed par nus/ /khyod ni lha yis sprul pa ste/ /khyod ni bgegs byed mi nus min/ /sngon chad mchod pa ma thob pa/ /de
208a7(rgyud): ring bdag gis mchod byas na/ /khyod kyis da ni mchod khyer la/ /bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod/ /gal te 'dug kyang bgegs min na/ /de yi spyod
208b1(rgyud): pa bzang po yin/ /sngags pas mchod byas 'on kyang ni/ /ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dpang gyur pas/ /mi mchog rnams la mkhyen
208b2(rgyud): pa gsol/ /bgegs la chad pas gcad slad du/ /sbyor ba bgyis kyang nongs ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/ /byang chub sems dpa'
208b3(rgyud): rnams kyi ni/ /bka' dang bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod/ /lha dang lha min gsang rnams dang / /phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang / /gza' dang mi'am ci gang dag/
208b4(rgyud): mgon po mgon po che rnams la/ /bgegs kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya/ /gal te cung zhig bskyab ce na/ /myur du yongs su skyobs shig ces/ /bsgrags pa
208b5(rgyud): gang dag mnyan byas nas/ /bgegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni/ /de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya/ /gal te de ltar mi 'dug na/ /
208b6(rgyud): me tog thal mo mchod yon gyis/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskul la/ /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /drag po shin tu sdang sems pa/ /bka' lung las ni
208b7(rgyud): 'gal byed cing / /srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi g.yel bar/ /de la phan par shes nas su/ /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /
209a1(rgyud): sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi/ /sdug bsngal mang po 'dir 'gyur te/ /de ltar sman pas sems can gyi/ /nad rnams med par
209a2(rgyud): byed pa bzhin/ /gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med/ /mkhas pa rnam par sbyangs pa yi/ /de ltar sems ni mnyam bzhag cing / /snying rje'i yid dang ldan pa yis/
209a3(rgyud): byang chub sems ni brtan byas te/ /de la chad pas bcad pa brtsam/ /ji ltar sman pa mkhas pa yis/ /nyes te yal bar mi 'dor bzhin/ /thabs dang shes rab
209a4(rgyud): mkhas pa yang / /mi byed mkhas na'ang nyes dang bcas/ /ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa/ /thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis/ /nad pa yal bar 'dor byed cing //
209a5(rgyud): gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa/ /de bzhin shes dang bral ba yis/ /gal te gso bar brtson na yang / /thabs dang shes rab bral ba la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags
209a6(rgyud): mi mdzad/ /nad pa nad pa rnams la ni/ /sman pas ji ltar sman byin pa/ /tshwa dang kha dang bska ba yang / /'jig rten smod par mi byed pa/ /de bzhin 'dul ba'i
209a7(rgyud): bye brag gis/ /ci rigs pa ni gso bar bya/ /sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ /'phyas te sangs rgyas rnams mi smod/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /
209b1(rgyud): shin tu rmad byung rgyal ba byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i chos ni 'di 'dra ste/ /shin tu sdang sems drag po yi/ /sems can thams
209b2(rgyud): cad de tshe byung / /shin tu drag po mthong nas ni/ /'jam po nyid du mi sbyor te/ /shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /
209b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying stobs khros gyur pa/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pa/ /de nas pha rol gnon pa yis/ /sems can khams ni du ma gnon/ /sdig med nan gyis
209b4(rgyud): stobs gyis su/ /thams cad dbang du dgod par bya/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rigs tshul gyis/ /ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas nas/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag/
209b5(rgyud): thams cad dbang du dgod par byas/ /rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis/ /log 'dren bgegs rnams de ltar dgod/ /byang chub sems dran bsgrim byas nas/ /skyon
209b6(rgyud): gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir sngags pa che khros la/ /bskal pa'i me yi mthu lta bus/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par
209b7(rgyud): bya| |rkang pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /rdo rje'i gar gyis gar byas la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor/ /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten te/ /rked pa'i gnas
210a1(rgyud): kyi ral gri de/ /shugs nas phyung nas gdab par bya/ /rno ba med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /shugs kyis lag pa sar bsdams la/ /rkang pa spo
210a2(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis su/ /ral gri 'phyar ba 'dra bar bzung / /ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni/ /mdzub mo gung mgo gshibs par bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /
210a3(rgyud): ral gri shubs su bya ba ni/ /mthe'u chung dang ni srin lag dang / /mthe bos ral gri shubs su bya/ /de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis/ /sa la bgegs kyi gzugs
210a4(rgyud): bris te/ /so yis mchu mnan khros byas la/ /bdag ni rdo rje nyi 'bar bas/ /rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas nas/ /lag pas ral gri phyung nas su/ /rdo rje 'gro ba'i
210a5(rgyud): gom stabs kyis/ /gar gyi tshul du kun bskyod de/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya/ /rdo rje ldan des gang bcom pa/ /de
210a6(rgyud): ni srog la mi sems so/ /de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs zhig na'ang / /de yang mod la brlag
210a7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon che/ /snying rje snying brtse'i sems ldan pas/ /ji ltar de yang skye 'gyur ba/ /de ltar de la snying brtser bya/ /rdo rje ral gri'i stang
210b1(rgyud): stabs so/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ches/ /rdo rje gtub par bya ba byas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /gnod par sems pa thams cad gtub/ /rdo rje 'byung
210b2(rgyud): bar 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la/ /rkang pa bteg cing bzhag tshul gyis/ /rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/ /'khor los bsgyur bar bya rim gyi/ /pad+mo'i thal
210b3(rgyud): mo sbyar byas la/ /rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas/ /sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya/ /rting sprad gnas su 'dug byas la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/ /thal mo
210b4(rgyud): brdab pa'i tshul gyis su/ /sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya/ /bzlog ste lan bur byas nas su/ /lag pa sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /'khor lo lta bur byas nas su/ /
210b5(rgyud): gyen du 'phang la gzhig par bya/ /bkug ste rkyang pas mgo mnan nas/ /bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya/ /'on te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na zhi 'gyur the
210b6(rgyud): tshom med/ /de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis/ /bgegs rnams la ni gnod par bya/ /sdig pa'i gnod pa med par ni/ /bskul yang bde bar mi 'dong ngo / /gal te rdo
210b7(rgyud): rje sems dpa' che/ /snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur pas/ /bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na/ /cho ga 'di yis tshul du bya/ /ba lang gi ni lci ba las/ /de 'dra ba yi gzugs
211a1(rgyud): byas la/ /sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis su/ /sngags pas 'o mam bkrus nas ni/ /mod la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/ /de ltar kun tu
211a2(rgyud): bgegs rnams ni/ /kun la cho ga 'di bzhin bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /gsang sngags rnams la'ang sbyar bya ste/ /gcad dang gnod pa byas pa dang / /
211a3(rgyud): bkag pa dang ni bcing ba'ang rung / /gal te bsgrub par 'dod pa ni/ /de nas snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/ /'on kyang gsang sngags rnams la ni/ /bye brag tu ni spos
211a4(rgyud): kyis bya/ /ba ni ser mo'i 'o ma dang / /yang na mar gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis/ /sbyin sreg gis ni kun zhi 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba
211a5(rgyud): ste| |dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa'o/ /drag shul spyod lam gang yin pa/ /de ni khros pas brtsam par bya/ /de ltar las ni ci rigs pas/ /gsang sngags
211a6(rgyud): rnams la sngags pas bya/ /rnam pa gzhan du mi bya ste/ /las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i stang stabs so/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas kyang / /
211a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje'i gar ni rab tu byas/ /rting sprad rnams kyi tshul gyis su/ /smin bsgyur rkang pas reg par
211b1(rgyud): bya| |lag pa gnyis kas sa la byug / de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /yid kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /lag gnyis
211b2(rgyud): rked pa'i gnas bzhag la/ /rdo rje'i bgad pa rab byed cing / /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mdzub mos rab tu bsdigs/ /hUM brjod bsgyings dang bcas
211b3(rgyud): byas la/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni/ /bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang / /bltas pas de ni mod la 'bros/ /bya rog bong rdo
211b4(rgyud): 'phen mthong bzhin/ /rdo rje bgad pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje sngags pa ches/ /rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/ /mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa bsnol te khu tshur
211b5(rgyud): bcang / /mthe bo gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /gung mo gshibs te bsgreng bar bya/ /mdzub mo de gnyis zla la bsgreng / /rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg
211b6(rgyud): par bya/ /g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya/ /rdo rje lce ni me ltar 'bar/ /rgod ma'i kha ltar mngon sum bya/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/ /kha yi thad kar gzhag
211b7(rgyud): par bya/ /phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu 'thungs na/ /mig sngar snang bar gyur pa yi/ /sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos/ /de ltar byas na phyogs
212a1(rgyud): bzhi po/ /kun nas 'byung ba thams cad skems/ /'tshub ma kun dang lce 'bab dang / /sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba dang / /rdo rje'i kha ni glal
212a2(rgyud): ba dang / /gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten du ni ltas byung ba/ /kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa/ /sngags pas rdo rje me lce yi/ /me ltar bsgyur na
212a3(rgyud): de kun zhi/ /rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/ /rdo
212a4(rgyud): rje kha glal ba'i gar stabs so/ /de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su/ /bgegs la gso ba byas na ni/ /nyes pa yod pa ma yin no/ /rgyal
212a5(rgyud): ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon gso byed pas/ /bdag 'drar sngags pa de 'dra ste/ /sngags ba ci 'drar rgyal de bzhin/ /sems can kun la
212a6(rgyud): snying rje dang / /byang chub sems ni brtan bya ste/ /thabs kyi dam pa thob 'gyur pas/ /rnam par gso ba thams cad bya/ /gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na/ /bzhugs
212a7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dang bral ba ni/ /lha yi mchod 'os ma yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab bral gyur pas/ /rgyal ba'i
212b1(rgyud): sras po nyan thos dang / /gang yang rang sangs rgyas dag ni/ /dka' thub gnas la gnas pa ste/ /bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas/ /de dag la ni bya ba med/ /thabs
212b2(rgyud): dang ye shes las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/ /byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang / /byams dang snying rje'i kha bsgyur dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang / /
212b3(rgyud): bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa dang / /byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la/ /brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/ /sems can don
212b4(rgyud): dga'i rtse bas brtse/ /de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis/ /sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sems ni rab tu gso bar
212b5(rgyud): bya| |rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni/ /rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste/ /rdo rje thal mo gzhum byas la/ /rdo rje'i gar ni
212b6(rgyud): byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng / /g.yon pa kos kor brten nas su/ /gung mo dang ni mdzub mo gshib/ /mthe chung mthe bo sprad par bya/ /
212b7(rgyud): g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum/ /g.yas brkyang rkang par gnas nas su/ /rdo rje bgad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /kye ma bdag nyid rdo rje can/ /bdag nyid du ni bdag
213a1(rgyud): gnas so/ /hUM brjod bsnyems dang khros pa yis/ /rdo rje gar gyis gtang bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs/ /rdo rje bgad pas
213a2(rgyud): bsdigs pas na/ /lha dang lha min gsang bar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor tshe 'am bsgrub pa'i tshe/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar
213a3(rgyud): bcing / /gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum zhes/ /bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing / /
213a4(rgyud): bsrung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun/ /lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung du 'dong / /rdo rje stangs kyis bskul bas na/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ /bsod nams tshogs ni
213a5(rgyud): bsags pa la/ /gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de na yang / /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs
213a6(rgyud): rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul byas te/ /bskal pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas/ /thal mo brdabs pa'i tshul gyis su/ /khros te lag pa
213a7(rgyud): gdab par bya/ /lag gnyis rdo rje'i tshul gyis su/ /mthe'u chung mthe bong sbrad byas la/ /g.yon pas kos kor brten nas su/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng
213b1(rgyud): byas la/ /A hUM hUM hUM brjod de bskul ba yis/ /sngags pas kun tu sgra yang brjod/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni byung ba na/ /sdang ba thams cad phung bar 'gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs
213b2(rgyud): dang zla ba sogs/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' gzhan yang / /thos pa tsam gyis sa g.yos te/ /kun tu sgra yi sems kyang nyams/ /de tshe thal mo sbyar te 'dud/ /rdo rje
213b3(rgyud): sgra chen gang na bar/ /thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su/ /rdo rje sgra yis gzir gyur te/ /stan las sems ni nyams pas na/ /mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal
213b4(rgyud): ba| |bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces/ /sngags pa la ni lung yang nod/ /sngags pas bsams te gar byas na/ /lha rnams myur du grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas
213b5(rgyud): byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol/ /rdo rje kun tu sgra'o/ /rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje gar ni 'bar byas la/ /rdo rje thal
213b6(rgyud): mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te/ /mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/ /bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni gshibs te
213b7(rgyud): bsgreng | |gung mo gnyis ni gshibs byas la/ /mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshig bkug ste/ /gung mo gnyis la sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje kha ni byas pas na/ /sdang ba thams cad
214a1(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur/ /kha yi thad kar bzhag na ni/ /rdo rje sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bdag ni rdo rje chen po can/ /rdo rje ye shes stobs dang
214a2(rgyud): ldan| |hri ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ /rdo rje'i gom stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje gnon po'i gom pa yis/ /bzhag dang 'degs pas 'gro byed cing / /phyogs
214a3(rgyud): rnams bzhi por brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sgra byung bskul bas na/ /bgegs chen rnams dang grags rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams kyang / /de yi
214a4(rgyud): mdun du 'gro bar byed/ /rdo rje sgra yis bdag cag tshig /rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na/ /bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos/ /rdo rje dbang po bka' myur stsol/ /
214a5(rgyud): gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/ /rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang / /kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam/ /bka' stsol cig ces de skad smra/ /dga' bar
214a6(rgyud): byin nas sgrub po la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong / /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i slob dpon mthu chen gyis/ /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/ /
214a7(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis phyag rgya bcing / /rkang ba bus mor btsugs nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas su/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni
214b1(rgyud): ngos la sbyar/ /g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/ /myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/ /'khrul 'khor kun la bsnun byas la/ /sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/ /
214b2(rgyud): lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po dang / /srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang / /thams cad rang gi gnas nas g.yos/ /bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas
214b3(rgyud): bsnun pas na/ /sems ni blong zhes gyur nas su/ /ye shes rdo rje che ldan pa/ /gal ba der nye bar dong / /rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig /sngags pas dpal gyi
214b4(rgyud): sgo bzhed dam/ /'on te dngul chu bcud len bzhed/ /rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol/ /smras nas kun gyis de mod la/ /yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed/ /gal
214b5(rgyud): te lha dang lha ma yin/ /gsang ba bkol bar 'dod na yang / /'dod pas de dag lhags nas su/ /'dod pa bzhin du las byed do/ /lung dang 'gal bar byed pa
214b6(rgyud): dag |ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yongs ldan pa/ /sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang / /me 'bar lta bur 'jigs
214b7(rgyud): rung bas/ /myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/ /sa rnams kun la pa bsnun par bya/ /g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/ /ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas
215a1(rgyud): bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/ /a la la zhes de skad smra/ /stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams/ /lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar//
215a2(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa/ /ga la ba der nye bar dong / /bskal ba chen pos yongs su skyobs/ /bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol/ /lha dang gsang ba lha min rnams/ /
215a3(rgyud): 'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed/ /bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs nas su/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su dong / /de lta na ni lha dbang song / /de lta ma yin mi gtong ngo / /de nas
215a4(rgyud): bsgo lung bzhin byas nas/ /de dag myur du gnas su dong / /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /de nas phyag rgya btang byas te/ /rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rked pa'i
215a5(rgyud): gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya/ /dus bzhin
215a6(rgyud): rab tu bskul byas la/ /gal te bsgo lung 'gal byed na/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o/ /rdo rje thal
215a7(rgyud): mo btsum nas su/ /mthun pa'i stabs su gnas bya ste/ /lag pa rgyab tu bsnun byas la/ /rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje la bltas la/ /'brug sgra dal
215b1(rgyud): 'dra'i hUM brjod de/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pas so/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang / /mthe bo rtse sprad zhags par bya/ /lag pa
215b2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis/ /rtse bkug lcags kyus brtan por bya/ /rdo rje rgyas pa'i mig ldan pa/ /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /gang la bgegs ni yod pa
215b3(rgyud): der| |rdo rje thabs kyis myur song la/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas te/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bkug bya zhing / /
215b4(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /gal te 'khor lo can dang ni/ /dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa/ /gal te rdo rje 'chang srung yang / /sngags pa gzhi nas
215b5(rgyud): drangs te dgug / bkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje'i gzeb tu gzhug par bya/ /ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs 'gyur ba/ /de srid bar du gzhag par bya/ /
215b6(rgyud): bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te/ /gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na/ /bdag gi 'byor ba 'byor 'dod pas/ /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /de yi gzugs ni byas
215b7(rgyud): nas su/ /rdo rje'i rkang bas gzir byas na/ /ha ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing / /lha yi dbang po'ang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de la bsgo ba'i lung yang 'bog /rdo rje gar gyi/
216a1(rgyud): de nas yang / /thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la/ /dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas bar bya/ /rkang pa
216a2(rgyud): spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su/ /phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni bshibs
216a3(rgyud): nas su/ /mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya/ /nga yi rdo rje phyag rgya de/ /bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin/ /snga ma bzhin du stabs tshul gyi/ /phyag rgyas
216a4(rgyud): bgegs rnams bkug nas su/ /khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis/ /de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje stabs kyis phyag rgya bcing / /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /bdag
216a5(rgyud): nyid rdo rje bsgyur nas su/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /lan ni smra bar mi byed na/ /de ni gtang bar mi bya 'o/ /gal te cung zad mi smra na/ /de la
216a6(rgyud): chad pas gcad bya ste/ /shing gi dug dang star bu dang / /yungs kar dag ni bsregs pa las/ /de yi gzugs ni byas nas su/ /me yi nang du bor byas na/ /
216a7(rgyud): gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang / /bgegs de de yi mod la 'gro/ /sngags pas de la bsro bar bya/ /de nas de la rgyas par bya/ /byams pa'i sems
216b1(rgyud): ni bskyed nas su/ /phyag rgya btang bar bsam byas na/ /gzir dang bcing dang dgug pa rnams/ /thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //
216b2(rgyud): ye shes che la rab gzhol zhing / /sems can don la snying rje bas/ /rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur te/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo
216b3(rgyud): rje thal mo legs sbyar te/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /gom pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni/ /
216b4(rgyud): de nas thal mo yang sbyar ro/ /gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /mkhas pas phyogs bzhi rnams su bskor/ /rdo rje rengs byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams
216b5(rgyud): thams cad rengs par bya/ /myur du rdo rje gom pa yis/ /phyogs rnams rdo rje rengs par bya/ /rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che/ /rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya/ /'og
216b6(rgyud): tu lag pa rdo rje can/ /steng du g.yas pa'ing rdo rje can/ /rdo rje rengs byed rab byed cing / /phyogs rnams kun tu bskor byas na/ /gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa//
216b7(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'tsho mi byed/ /de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni/ /legs par 'dug
217a1(rgyud): par bsam byas na/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la thug pa nas/ /sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar/ /rdo rje rengs pas rengs 'gyur te/ /rmongs
217a2(rgyud): shing sems kyang med par 'gyur/ /sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod bar du/ /de srid du ni rengs par byed/ /rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas
217a3(rgyud): la| |mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas te/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas na/ /kun nas 'byung ba'i chu rnams kyang / /sngags pas skam par byed par nus/ /mthun
217a4(rgyud): pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje'i thal mo gzhum byas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni/ /zhags pa bcas pas brkyang bar bya/ /de bzhin rkang pa
217a5(rgyud): g.yon pa ni/ /g.yon dang lhan cig gdeg par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mngon du bskal pa'i me lta
217a6(rgyud): bu| |so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /'og logs su ni mig bltas te/ /rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te/ /lhun po'i rtse
217a7(rgyud): mor gzhag par bya/ /'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa'i lag /g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te/ /mchong ba'i rkang stabs sbyar ba yis/ /kha yi tshul du 'dug par
217b1(rgyud): bya| |rgod ma rta yi kha tshul gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i chu rnams btung bar bya/ /rdo rje ldan pas bshad pa yis/ /bsam gtan sngags pa ldan gyur nas/ /chu ni a la la zhes
217b2(rgyud): su| |sgra 'byin nas ni 'du 'gyur na/ /'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang / /sprin las byung ba smos ci dgos/ /bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi/ /chu las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur/
217b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i thal mo mtshog mar sbyar/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te/ /sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya/ /dbang chen gom stabs
217b4(rgyud): byas nas su/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa gyen bteg ste/ /de nas sa la gzhag par bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /g.yas phyogs su ni
217b5(rgyud): bskor bar bya/ /lag gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa bsgreng / /g.yon pa mkhur bar brten nas su/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /
217b6(rgyud): de bzhin g.yas pa gzhag nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor/ /g.yas pa mkhur bar brten nas su/ /rdo rje ldan pa g.yon pa bsgreng / /rdo rje gom pas
217b7(rgyud): myur song la/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis/ /ti se'i rtse mor rkang bzhag ste/ /rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su/ /
218a1(rgyud): rengs byed rtsa bar sbyor ldan pas/ /so yis chu mnan khros gyur cing / /bdag nyid me dang 'dra 'gyur ba/ /stobs chen sgra yang che ldan pa/ /
218a2(rgyud): gtum po chen po pha rol gnon/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis steng bskor la/ /nges par gnon pa blang bar bya/ /sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med pa/ /des ni gang du khros
218a3(rgyud): pa 'dor/ /rdo rje des gnon tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su/ /rdo rje gnon pas bsnun byas na/ /dbang po chen po'ang phye mar rlog /rdo rje gnon
218a4(rgyud): pas bsnun byas na/ /sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yos/ /lhun po man dAr ti se dang / /khor yug ri rnams g.yo 'gyur na/ /lha mi sgo lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje
218a5(rgyud): ldan pas bshad na'o/ /bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te/ /phub ma sbar gang rlung gtor bzhin/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /sa sbyang brtsam par bya ba
218a6(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /snying gar bzhag ste rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su/ /lag pa gar byed sbyong ba dang / /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis
218a7(rgyud): su| |g.yas dang g.yon pa gzhag par bya/ /rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su/ /de nas rting pa yang sprad de/ /gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /phyogs bzhir yongs
218b1(rgyud): su bskor bar bya/ /khros pas dbus kyi gnas su ni/ /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /gung mos srin lag 'khyud byas la/ /gnyi ga khu
218b2(rgyud): tshur bcang byas te/ /rting pa sprad pa'i rkang stabs kyis/ /sa la bzhag dang bteg byas te/ /g.yas su yongs su brkyang byas la/ /bar bur thams cad bsal bar
218b3(rgyud): bya| |me me zhes ni brjod byas la/ /nang na gang dag ci yod pa/ /sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya/ /hUM dang bcas shing phaT bcas pa'i/ /gsang sngags
218b4(rgyud): mkhas pas brjod par bya/ /'og dang sa yi steng na ni/ /bar bur thams cad zhi 'gyur te/ /kun tu bgegs ni med gyur nas/ /sngags pas mnyam gzhag las rnams
218b5(rgyud): bya| |de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje bzhag pa legs bslabs pas/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /tshangs pa'i rkeng stabs byas nas su/ /pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar
218b6(rgyud): byas te/ /snying ga'i thad kar bskor bar bya/ /gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcang bar bya/ /g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya/ /g.yas pa
218b7(rgyud): g.yas su brkyang bar bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang thabs byas nas su/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /rdo rje gom pas myur song
219a1(rgyud): la| |g.yas brkyang gom stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /de nyid kyis ni yang bskor ro/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra
219a2(rgyud): phyung la/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /rdo rje khu tshur bskor bas na/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis/ /sa
219a3(rgyud): bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni/ /gom pa bzhag pa'i 'gros kyis su/ /myur du g.yas pa brkyang byas la/ /gcig ni ri rab rtse la bzhag /gcig shos ti se'i rtse
219a4(rgyud): mor bzhag / de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni/ /kun tu 'dor bar rab byed cing / /sa 'og na ni lag pa g.yon/ /g.yas pa sa yi steng na ste/ /ha ha zhes ni
219a5(rgyud): sgra 'byin cing / /'jig rten khams su 'phen byed pa/ /bgegs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /log 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas
219a6(rgyud): ni| |gzhan du 'phen pa smos ci dgos/ /ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang / /kun nas tshig par byed 'dod na'ang / /rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /phyogs
219a7(rgyud): bzhi dag tu 'jug par bya/ /rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni/ /me lce'i phreng ldan bzod
219b1(rgyud): dka' ba/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la/ /rdo rje 'dzin de lag pa bsgreng / /lus ni btud par byas nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg byas la/ /sngags pas 'khor
219b2(rgyud): lo bzhin du bskor/ /rlung rnams kun kyang sdud byed cing / /nam mkha' ma 'drar bsgyur nas su/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug /lag na 'dzin pa'i
219b3(rgyud): rdo rje ni/ /kun tu ri rab 'drar bsams la/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras gnon zhing / /rdo rje 'og tu 'phang byas na/ /ri dang nags su bcas pa yi/ /sa rnams thams cad
219b4(rgyud): 'khrug par 'gyur/ /de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur te/ /mer ni shing bal bcug pa bzhin/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /de nas bsdu ba brtsam byas te/ /rkang stabs
219b5(rgyud): tshul ni de nyid de/ /bye brag tu ni lag pa bsgreng / /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /mchongs ba bskor ba byas nas su/ /phyag rgya yi ni stang stabs bya/ /rgyab nas rkang
219b6(rgyud): stabs tshul gyis ni/ /dbus kyi gnas su phyin par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su yang / /rdo rje bsnun pas brdeg par bya/ /rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid dang / /
219b7(rgyud): sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis/ /sa rnams thams cad blangs byas la/ /de nyid du ni gzhag par bya/ /kun nas bsdu bar rab byed cing / /mkhas pas gsang sngags
220a1(rgyud): brjod byas la/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin/ /sa rnams kun tu gzhag par bya/ /rim ba'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis/ /mkhas pas thams
220a2(rgyud): cad kun tu bzhag / de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /sdang ba lha dang lha min dang / /mi rnams gzhag bya gdul bar bya/ /bsam
220a3(rgyud): dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yi/ /rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa/ /thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya/ /gdung pas
220a4(rgyud): 'dul ba'i 'jig rten na/ /gdung ba nyid kyis grub par 'gyur/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /dpa' bo'i lnga po kun tu bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs
220a5(rgyud): byas nas su/ /g.yas brkyang stabs kyis gnon par bya/ /rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'ben la lta zhing lag pas gtad/ /srin lag mthe'u
220a6(rgyud): chung sprad byas la/ /lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya/ /g.yon pa'i gung mo mtheb mtshungs sbyar/ /g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de/ /brkyang pa'i tshul du byas
220a7(rgyud): pa ni| |gzhu dang mda' zhes brjod pa yin/ /gung mo yi ni rgyab logs su/ /mdzub mo mda' yi tshul du bzhag /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs tshul gyis ni/ /
220b1(rgyud): hUM bcas brjod de phog par bsnun/ /gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam/ /tshangs pa rab tu gnas gyur tam/ /drag pas bsrungs par gyur kyang rung / /rdo rje 'phang bar
220b2(rgyud): byas nas su/ /rdo rje mda' yis phog gyur na/ /de ni gson par mi bsam mo/ /'phang ba'i stang stabs so/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /thabs shes pa la
220b3(rgyud): mkhas gyur cing / /'phang ba'i tshul du legs bslabs pa/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'dul bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs
220b4(rgyud): bslabs pas/ /srid pa gsum la khyab lus kyis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rkang pa bzhag pa'i
220b5(rgyud): tshul gyis ni/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/ /thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya/ /de yi phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun la bskor byas na/ /
220b6(rgyud): srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na/ /log 'dren bgegs rnams smos ci dgos/ /dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /mthun
220b7(rgyud): pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /gnas ni myur du bzung
221a1(rgyud): byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag /khros pas hUM gi sgra brjod de/ /rgya mtsho bzhi po'i gnas rnams la/ /rdo rje'i lag pas bsnun par
221a2(rgyud): bya| |klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag / rgya mtsho nas ni 'thon par 'gyur/ /gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa/ /lha min gsang ba srin po rnams/ /bsgo ba'i lung la
221a3(rgyud): brtson yid kyis/ /ci 'tshol cig ces 'khod par byed/ /rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag gzir/ /gnod sbyin mo'am srin mo'am/ /lha min mo'am klu mo 'am//
221a4(rgyud): bcud kyis len nam dngul chu'am/ /rin chen rnams sam nor bu rgyan/ /dpal dang phun sum 'dod ldan nam/ /thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa/ /bdag cag
221a5(rgyud): rnams la bka' stsol cig / sngags pas gang yang rung blangs te/ /gsang ba pa kun gtang bar bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa/ /ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong
221a6(rgyud): na| |rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /g.yon brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya/ /lhun po la ni rkang bzhag ste/ /lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgra sgrog
221a7(rgyud): cing ni thams cad nas/ /sa 'og thams cad mnan par bya/ /ha ha zhes ni sgra 'don cing / /bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa/ /thams cad kyis ni gzung
221b1(rgyud): nas su/ /shin tu myur bar 'bul bar byed/ /sngags pas de gcig tshar bcad de/ /lhag ma thams cad gtang bar bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la/ /mkhas
221b2(rgyud): pas legs par bslabs par bya/ /gsang ba srin po thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems ni yang bskyed de/ /de dag dam tshig byin nas ni/ /de rnams kun tu gtang
221b3(rgyud): bar bya/ / //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las// //bam po bcu gcig pa/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas//
221b4(rgyud): mi dang mi min la sogs pa/ /shin tu gnod byed lha rnams dang / /lha min gsang bar bcas pa rnams/ /gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs/ /nad sprul dug la
221b5(rgyud): sogs rnams kyis/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed cing / /dam tshig la ni mi gnas te/ /rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag /nad dang mu ge la sogs pas/ /
221b6(rgyud): sems can rnams la gnod byed de/ /pha rol la gnod mngon dga' ba/ /de dag snying rje med pa dang / /bstan pa las ni 'gal byed cing / /shin tu rgyags pa'i
221b7(rgyud): shas che ba/ /mthong nas de dag tshar gcad phyir/ /sngags pa mkhas pas sbyar bar bya/ /bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du/ /bdag nyid las ni mi sems
222a1(rgyud): shing / /bdag nyid la min zhugs gyur la/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa/ /gzhan la gnod byed de dag la/ /sngags pas bzod
222a2(rgyud): par mi bya ste/ /skrag par bya zhing bcing bar bya/ /btub par bya zhing gsad par bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /nam
222a3(rgyud): mkha' go skabs med byas te/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgyur nas su/ /gus pas bsgrims bcas 'jo tshul dang / /bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje'i
222a4(rgyud): gar ni rab byas la/ /lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu gar bya zhing / /dngos dang mthun par bzung byas la/ /bsgo ba la ni sems
222a5(rgyud): bzhag cing / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus sra bas/ /mi mthun rkang stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje 'chang bas lag bsgreng ste/ /rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la/ /srid pa
222a6(rgyud): gsum po thams cad mnan/ /dpa' bo gnas su gnas nas su/ /rkang pa gdengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /hUM brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs rung ba/ /mig gnyis nyi ma
222a7(rgyud): zla ba ste/ /kha ni rgod ma rta yi kha/ /lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo/ /lto ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya/ /lhun po de yi mgo bo bya/ /de bzhin lag pa khor yug ri/ /
222b1(rgyud): sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te/ /nor rgyas bu sprul gsang bsrel yin/ /rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis/ /de yi sgra rnams me yin te/ /lce ni 'jigs pa chen po'i glog/ /ha ha ha
222b2(rgyud): zhes sgra chen ldan/ /'brug sgra hUM zhes sgra phyung la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su bskor/ /rab tu bskul bas de nas ni/ /rdo rje'i sgra yis brgyal gyur nas/ /klu dang
222b3(rgyud): dri za chen po dang / /lha dang lha min sogs kun dong / /hUM brjod pa ni 'jigs 'gyur zhing / /'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /rdo rje sgra yis tshig gyur cing / /blong
222b4(rgyud): bar gyur te dman par blta/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa/ /ga la ba der nye bar dong / /rdo rje chen po bka' stsol la/ /slan chad de ltar ma mdzad cig /de nas dam tshig
222b5(rgyud): bzhag byas la/ /lha rnams thams cad gtang bar bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum po che/ /'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs bya rnams la 'jigs
222b6(rgyud): bskyed pa/ /chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung bas/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams la/ /'jigs chen ltas 'byung che 'byung dang / /lha dang klu dang sha za dang / /gza'
222b7(rgyud): dang ma mo brtse med rnams/ /nad dang mu ge la sogs dang / /yul 'khrugs pa dang 'chi byed dang / /bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren dang / /srul po srin po la
223a1(rgyud): sogs pa/ /bdag yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i/ /gnod pa gzhan yang du ma rnams/ /de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ rdo rje
223a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa rab bskul bas/ /thams cad myur du 'jigs
223a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /'di ni don yod thogs pa med/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ /sngags pas kun tu sbyor byas nas/ /srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi
223a4(rgyud): yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa/ /byed par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na/ /gang dag shin tu dregs ldan pa/ /srin po lha min
223a5(rgyud): gsang ba dang / /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /dbang phyug kun dang yon tan 'thob/ /lha rnams kun gyi rgyal
223a6(rgyud): por 'gyur/ /mkhas pas dbang la 'god par byed/ /klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za rnams kyi bdag por
223a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /lha min gnas su lha min dang / /mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding dang / /mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /bsgo
223b1(rgyud): ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis/ /rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa/ /de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /kun la rdo
223b2(rgyud): rje rnam 'phrul pa/ /de yi 'og tu brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan mchod pa byed pa pos/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa kun tu mchod/ /srid
223b3(rgyud): par bdag nyin chen rnams kyi/ /bsam yas mchod min gang yang med/ /'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas pas/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis/ /rdo rje'i thal
223b4(rgyud): mo bcum byas la/ /phyogs bcu rnam pa kun tu 'dud/ /dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs bskor zhing / /dus gsum rnam par bzhugs
223b5(rgyud): pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o/ /bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod/ /sems can gdul ba'i mchod pa ni/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'dug pa ste/ /bsam
223b6(rgyud): pa tha dad sems can khams/ /bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel/ /bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par rtog /bsam pa chags med de dang des/ /sngags pas rnam pa
223b7(rgyud): thams cad du/ /sems can khams mang gdul bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /kun la shes pas cher byung ba'i/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang / /rgod
224a1(rgyud): dang khros dang 'jigs byed dang / /'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams/ /bsam pa chags pas rnam dgur dgongs/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje
224a2(rgyud): 'chang / /kun la ye shes 'byung byed pa'i/ /rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/ /gom pa mdzes dang ldan pa yis/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/ /gar byed pa yi
224a3(rgyud): tshul gyis su/ /mdzub mo mthe bong rtse sprad la/ /g.yon phyogs su ni blta bar bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyis/ /'dzum byas rgyas pa gus bsgrims shing //
224a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gsor ldan pas/ /rjes su chags pas gar bya'o/ /lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang / /lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang / /'dod khams dbang phyug
224a5(rgyud): bdag po dang / /sa gsum gnas rnams chags byed cing / /mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/ /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /sa gsum thams cad 'gugs
224a6(rgyud): byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas/ /sdom pa can gyi dbang 'jog ste/ /thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed cing / /mngag
224a7(rgyud): gzhug par ni rab tu dgod/ /rdo rje che ldan kun shes pas/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i glu yis bskul bas na/ /rjes su chags shing chags chen 'gyur/ /
224b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar smos pa yis/ /glu dang gar ni rab tu bya/ /bsam pa chags pas brgyal 'gyur nas/ /sems can khams ni rjes chags bya/ /rdo rje'i glu ni 'byung ba ste//
224b2(rgyud): sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rjes su chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas/ /nyi ma stong phrag bcu bas rno ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa po/ /rnam mang cha byad gzugs
224b3(rgyud): kyis sems can 'gro ba rjes su chags mdzad pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gsol/ /Sha Ta ba la sogs pa'i glu/ /
224b4(rgyud): rdo rje gar gyis rab byas pas/ /sa gsum thams cad 'gug byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo
224b5(rgyud): rje nyid du yang bsgyur zhing / /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya/ /gom stabs thams cad mdzes ldan par/ /g.yas pa dgug pa'i phyag
224b6(rgyud): rgya dang / /g.yon pas btang ba'i phyag rgya bya/ /mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/ /'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /tshangs
224b7(rgyud): pa la sogs lha rnams ni/ /rnam pa kun tu dbang 'gyur te/ /mngag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing / /rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson/ /rdo rje chags pas chags byas pas/ /
225a1(rgyud): shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i/ /lha dang mi dang gsang ba pas/ /bsgrub dka' rnams kyang sngags pas bsgrub/ /rdo rje lus la
225a2(rgyud): yongs chags pas/ /'dod chags thams cad yongs su dor/ /rdo rje'i glu snyan ldan pa yis/ /sems can khams rnams chags par bya/ /rjes su
225a3(rgyud): chags pas chags pa'i phyir/ /lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i glu yi snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang / /gzod nas rang bzhin dag
225a4(rgyud): pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang dang / /snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis/ /dbang bsgyur
225a5(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas snang / /'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dren/ /bdud rnams thams cad yongs su 'dul/ /shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong / /
225a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad yongs smin byed/ /glu 'di rab tu len byed cing / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na/ /lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang / /lha min klur
225a7(rgyud): bcas thams cad 'grub/ /rdo rje'i glu ni 'dren pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur te/ /dpa' chen bsam pas kun chags
225b1(rgyud): pas| |dpa' bos lnga po brten par bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas pa brkyang pa pha rol mnan/ /g.yon pa brkyang pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /seng ge bzhin du
225b2(rgyud): bsgyings par bya/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te/ /rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni/ /tshangs pa la sogs bsdu bar bya/ /rdo rje'i glu ni
225b3(rgyud): len byed cing / /sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa/ /nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam med pa/ /chos dang rgyal mchog rnams kyi
225b4(rgyud): gtso| |sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud/ /so yis mchu ni rab mnan cing / /kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin/ /rked par rdo rje brten nas su/ /phyogs bcu
225b5(rgyud): kun tu blta bar bya/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rab bsgrags pas/ /lta 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing / /bsreg pa'i bskal pa
225b6(rgyud): gzhan lta bu/ /grub 'gyur rdo rje me 'bar ba/ /'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas/ /bgegs rnams la ni sbyor bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog /
225b7(rgyud): nyes pa chen po ma yin la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar mi bya/ /thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni/ /tha ma'i tshe na sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs gyur kyang / /hUM brjod
226a1(rgyud): pas ni thal bar rlog / 'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' bas/ /rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje'i ye
226a2(rgyud): shes legs bslabs pas/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis/ /bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam byas te/ /sems dmyal yi dwags dud 'gro dang / /gang gzhan
226a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams/ /lag pas drang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba kun gyis bstabs par bya/ /bza' btung la sogs char pa dang / /gos dang rin
226a4(rgyud): chen rgyan gyi char/ /de dag rnams la kun tu dbab/ /ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na/ /snying rje spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin/ /kun tu yongs su rgyas par
226a5(rgyud): bya| |sems can kun gyi bla med bde/ /thob par shog cig bsam par bya/ /snying rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje ye shes legs
226a6(rgyud): bslabs pas/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing / /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /bteg dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nas myur du smad par bya/ /rdo rje bgad
226a7(rgyud): chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du dgod/ /bgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas lag g.yas bteg byas te/ /g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag
226b1(rgyud): g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /de nas thal mo yang sbyar te/ /'jigs rung sgra ni grag byed cing / /thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya/ /'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i
226b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te/ /lag pa gnyis ni rgyab rol du/ /khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya/ /bgegs kun 'dar bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mgul
226b3(rgyud): pa nges par smad bya zhing / /sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na/ /phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas
226b4(rgyud): nas su/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /lag pa gnyis ka lto bar gzhag /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /ha
226b5(rgyud): ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya che ste/ /ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na/ /sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te/ /sngags pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /mthun
226b6(rgyud): pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin so yis mchu mnan cing / /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs
226b7(rgyud): sbyar bas/ /bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sgra chen te/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas/ /
227a1(rgyud): thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag gnyis brang la sbyar ba las/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng
227a2(rgyud): byas te/ /rkang pa g.yon brkyang legs sbyar bas/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid yin na'ang bsnun/ /rdo rje tho bas bsnun pas na/ /de yi mod la phye mar
227a3(rgyud): 'gyur| |tho ba'i stang stabs so/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang / /lag pa mchan khung gzhug par bya/ /nyi ma 'bar 'dra'i lta 'dra bas/ /hUM brjod bsnyems
227a4(rgyud): pas thur du blta/ /lag na rdo rje nyid bsgyur te/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sgra byung la/ /rgya mtsho man dA ra bcas pa yis/ /sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya/ /so
227a5(rgyud): yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing / /rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar byas/ /de dag thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /g.yas brkyang rkang
227a6(rgyud): stabs byas nas su/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis/ /g.yon pa brang la sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /mdzub mo myur du bsgreng
227a7(rgyud): byas shing / /rdo rje'i sgra ni dbyung byas na/ /gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang / /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad yin na/ /
227b1(rgyud): sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos/ /phyag rgya 'dis ni bskyod pas na/ /de dag thams cad dul bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas pa gyen du
227b2(rgyud): bsgred byas la/ /lag pa thal mo brkyang bar bya/ /g.yon pa brang du sbyar bar bya/ /lag pas myur du bsnun stabs kyis/ /hUM dang bcas pas sa la bsnun/ /nam
227b3(rgyud): mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings byas la/ /bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad yin no/ /mthun pa'i rkang
227b4(rgyud): stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa 'og tu btang nas ni/ /rkang pa'i dbus nas gzung byas la/ /de ni gyen du bteg par bya/ /rdo rje hUM brjod sgra dang ni/ /khros shing khro gnyer
227b5(rgyud): bcas pa yis/ /rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la/ /der ni bgegs ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun byas na/ /ri rab rnams kyang phye mar rlog /rdo rje rkang
227b6(rgyud): pa'i stad stabs so/ /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/ /lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du brkyang / /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /kun tu 'khor lo
227b7(rgyud): 'phang bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur/ /zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas/ /rgyal ba dam pa rnams
228a1(rgyud): kyang 'byon/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang gzhan dbang ni thob 'gyur rnams/ /blong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa/ /lag na rdo rje'i
228a2(rgyud): gan du dong / /srog zad na ni mi rung gi /bu gcig nged kyis ci zhig bya/ /khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /nged kyis myur du sgrub po zhes/ /rdo rje sems
228a3(rgyud): dpa' blo ldan pas/ /lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad/ /bskal pa'i me ltar gyur pa yis/ /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /'bar ba'i
228a4(rgyud): phyag rgya legs sbyar bas/ /sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya/ /sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas/ /sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tshe ba/ /
228a5(rgyud): gegs byed ma rungs chen po pa/ /srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go /phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas/ /de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i
228a6(rgyud): rkang stabs byas nas su/ /de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la/ /sngags pas gyen du 'phang bar bya/ /de tshe so yis mchu mnan la/ /myur du gom pa
228a7(rgyud): gcig bor te/ /nges par bsnun pas bsnun de tshe/ /srin po sdang ba gegs byed pa/ /de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur/ /rdo rje nges bsnun phyag rgya
228b1(rgyud): yis/ /de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ /dbang chen gnas la gnas nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni bsgreng byas la/ /lhun po'i rgyal bo blangs nas su//
228b2(rgyud): lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas/ /sngags pa la ni bgegs byed pa/ /sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun/ /bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing / /
228b3(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la/ /gang tshe bgegs shig bgegs byed pa/ /de tshe sngags pa stobs chen gyis/ /
228b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di la sbyar ba na/ /mthong nas de dag 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje ye shes legs
228b5(rgyud): bslabs pas/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/ /cod pan stabs kyis thabs bshad do/ /sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa mtshog
228b6(rgyud): mar bzhag / g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar
228b7(rgyud): bya| |g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis kyang / /ngang pa'i rtsal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lag pa g.yas pa gdengs byas na/ /rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par

229a3(rgyud): man dA ra dang ti sa dang / /gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams kyang / /ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis/ /bsnun pa de dag slar mi 'chags/ /g.yas dang
229a4(rgyud): g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang / /lag pa gnyis ni mchan khung bzhag /hUM brjod bsnyems pas mar bltas te/ /so yis mchu ni mnan byas la/ /rdo rje'i
229a5(rgyud): cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi tshe na g.yon bteg ste/ /khros
229a6(rgyud): dang bcas pas rkang bzhag pas/ /sa gsum thams cad drang bar bya/ /drang ba'i cod pan phyag rgya'o/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /
229a7(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing / /'khor lo bzhin du phyogs su bskor/ /phyag rgya 'di la legs
229b1(rgyud): sbyar bas/ /de dag 'ching dang gzir bar 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sel byed pa/ /rdo rje can ni nyid kyis bshad/ /bgegs rnams skrag par
229b2(rgyud): byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas ni/ /lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/ /rkang pa gcig

229b6(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ skrag pa zhes bya ba'i stang stabs yod de/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bskal pa dpag tu med par

230a6(rgyud): mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste/ /sngon gyi rgyal

230b3(rgyud): chad bgegs mi byed/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te/ /g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la/ /gnyi ga gcig tu sbyar bar bya/ /

230b5(rgyud): bcings byas na/ /gnod par gyur pas kun tu yang / /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing / /sems ni blong zhes gyur pa yis/ /blo ldan lag na rdo rje la/ /lung ni yongs
230b6(rgyud): su nod par byed/ /phyin chad bgegs ni ma byed ces/ /lag na rdo rjes lung bsgo'o/ /rdo rjes gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /de nas
230b7(rgyud): snying rje yang bskyed de/ /sngags pas mnyam par gzhag pa la/ /me tog thal mo sbyar nas su/ /de yi tshe na de dag la/ /gang tshe sngags pas mnyam gzhag
231a1(rgyud): tshe| |khyed cag bgegs ni ma byed par/ /gnas su dengs shig brjod par bya/ /g.yas brkyang stang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gyen
231a2(rgyud): du bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis kyang / /khu tshur mchan khung gnyis su gzhag /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa/ /sngags pa drag po'i las

231a6(rgyud): bzhin du/ /gal te lung ni nod byed na/ /de lta na ni thar bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du na ni nam yang min/ /shin tu mi zad gzir bas na/ /khyod ni ci bzhed
231a7(rgyud): de bzhin du/ /bgyid kyi bka' lung stsol cig ces/ /de tshe de dag de skad smra/ /mtshog mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas/ /de nas de dag dam tshig sbyin/ /sa la
231b1(rgyud): bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/ /g.yas pa brkyang bas gnas nas su/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya/ /btub par
231b2(rgyud): byas pas de dag kun/ /de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i sems kyis su/ /de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya/ /snying rje'i sems kyis de dag la//

231b4(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod de/ gang ngas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i

232a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /rdo rje can ni nyid gyur kyang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom 'gyur na/ /mthong ba tsam gyis bgegs rnams kun/ /phung bar gyur pa smos ci dgos//
232a4(rgyud): sngags pas shar phyogs bltas 'dug la/ /lag pa g.yas pa dkur brten te/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs byas la/ /g.yon pas thams cad dgug par bya//

232a6(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ nga'i slob ma rnams ma gtogs par khyod kyis su
232a7(rgyud): la yang bsnyad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma dad pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing / de dag 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis
232b1(rgyud): gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur bas de dag gi rna lam du yang bsgrags par mi bya na phyag rgya lta ci smos/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ de la slob dpon gyis slob
232b2(rgyud): ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par bya yi/ gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
232b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang slob dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa de rang gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

232b6(rgyud): so| |de lta bas na rnam kun du/ /de la nam yang brnyas mi bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ slob dpon la slob mas ji lta bar bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
232b7(rgyud): 'das rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /de yi sems ni de lta na/ /rtag tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'jig rten thams cad la/ /phan par byed pa'i

233a3(rgyud): pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug cing / bcom ldan 'das
233a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad du bdag byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing / /sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes
233a5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas

233b4(rgyud): na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ /sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed ma/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ /

234a7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ gzungs 'di ni mthu chen po ni yin na/ sgrub
234b1(rgyud): pa bo gang la la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de'i mthu ji lta bur rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems
234b2(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gzungs sngags 'di'i mthu 'am/ nus mthu 'am/ mthu bsgyings
234b3(rgyud): pa ci 'dra ba ni/ 'jam dpal/ shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin

234b5(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog la 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' de
234b6(rgyud): l a byin ma thag tu de'i mod la gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams 'byung zhing zhugs te mtha' rtogs par
234b7(rgyud): mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa
235a1(rgyud): gang dag gis kyang 'di ci 'dra ba yin zhes bstan par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
235a2(rgyud): til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chen po de la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur
235a3(rgyud): nas sku de nyid du zhugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthus so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems
235a4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang por dbang
235a5(rgyud): bskur ba yin na/ khyod kyis kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig /de skad
