235a7(rgyud): p ar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gang dag gzungs sngags kyi tshul du gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin
235b1(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa dag nyon cig / de dag gang zhe na/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ a ma ri a ma ri/ Ta ta/ b+hany+dza/ dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsiM mi tsi/ s+pho Ta s+phoT/ ma ta ma ta
235b2(rgyud): du rdAn+ta da ma ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ he he/ ka Ni Ti ka ni ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta ba na ke /bo da ni da de/ tra Ta Ta tra Ta Ta/ hUM phaT hUM phaT/ gardza
235b3(rgyud): gardza/ pa ra ma ti/ bi hUM ri ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ b+ha ga ba te/ pra dz+nyA par mi tA A/ sarba pA pak+Sha yaM ka ri/ dz+nyA na a pa s+pha ra Ni/
235b4(rgyud): b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ A na ya A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba b+ha te dza na tri ye swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha
235b5(rgyud): ma tha/ hA ma hA ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dun+du b+hi swa ra nir g+ho She/ ha na ha na/ bi d+h+wA na sa ya bi d+h+wA na sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi pu la ni rma la nir dzA te/ A ha ra
235b6(rgyud): A ha ra/ A gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha sa rU pa pi te mA bi lam+ba swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ gzungs chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings
235b7(rgyud): dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ byang chub kyi snying po ston par byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o//
236a1(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mig mi 'dzums par/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
236a2(rgyud): kyi bu/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma mthong ba rnams
236a3(rgyud): dang / dam tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs
236a4(rgyud): sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dbang chen po bskur ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa ye shes bye ba phrag
236a5(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgu las nges par byung ba'i ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs par gyur to/ /ye shes chen po'i rdo rje de rtogs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
236a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur ro/ /kye ma'o ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas/ 'jam dpal 'di dbang bskur to/ /zhes stong
236a7(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra 'ur zhes grag go / de'i mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
236b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag ut+pal chen po'i nang du zhugs par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma thag tu de nas chos kyi
236b2(rgyud): sku rtogs pa'i mthus de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spu'i khung bu'i mtshams rnams dang / cod pan dang / rgyan dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad
236b3(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad thob pa de
236b4(rgyud): dag gis kyang spu'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/ de nas 'jam
236b5(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yid la byed pa de btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzum par ring du bltas nas/ zhing rnams 'di dag yongs su sbyang
236b6(rgyud): bar bya/ /rgyal sras kun gyi smon lam mthun rdzogs bya/ /sems can phan dang snying brtses nad med cing / /zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye shes bstan/ /ye shes dam pa
236b7(rgyud): gces pa 'di thob nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag /grangs med khyod kyis brjod pa dgrol bar bya/ /khyod kyi ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya/ /zhes
237a1(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
237a2(rgyud): dpal khyod kyis tshig smras pa ni shin tu gtsigs te khyod yang legs so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams yid la
237a3(rgyud): byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag ye shes chen po 'di lta bu dag yid la byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
237a4(rgyud): bsgrub pa dang / glegs bam du byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba de dag ni/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ de ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
237a5(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i phra rab kye rdul snyed sbyin pa mthong bar
237a6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
237a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir
237b1(rgyud): m ngon par brtson par byed pa dag go 'phang de thob par gyur pa ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba de
237b2(rgyud): sems can chen po shod cig de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gang
237b3(rgyud): du zhugs pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga po dag yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang / don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / dpal thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
237b4(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dgod pa de nyon cig /'jam dpal/
237b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa/ slob dpon rnams kyi gsang chen mchog gsang ba bas kyang ches
237b6(rgyud): gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ming du gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la/ /tshad
237b7(rgyud): ni khru brgyad tham pa ste/ /slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor der/ /cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya/ /blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du/ /der ni sgo khyud rnams
238a1(rgyud): bya ste| |der ni sgo yang bzhi gtod do/ /gru bzhi lham pa kha khyer bcas/ /sngon gyi bzhir du cha gsum la/ /cha ni rnam pa brgyad bya/ mkhas
238a2(rgyud): pas cha brgyad nas su/ /dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/ /thang cig thang cig bsam byas la/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa/ /
238a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya/ /sngags pas de yi dbus su ni/ /pad+ma mchog tu mdzes pa bri/ /kun kyang margad 'dra ba ste/ /'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa yin/ /de yi steng
238a4(rgyud): du bum pa ste/ /bum pa'i steng du ut+pal lo/ /ut+pal steng du dung bri ste/ /me lce phreng ba 'khrigs pas mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin de ni/ /ye shes chen por dbang bskur
238a5(rgyud): ldan| |cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang / /dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste/ /gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang / /cho ga'i rim bzhin mthun par bya/ /de la shar phyogs su ni bcom
238a6(rgyud): ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya ste/ mtha' rnams su ut+pa la bkra zhing me lce
238a7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/
238b1(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA rA oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga te dza ni ke/ su rA ya pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta Ta Ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hUM hUM dza hi dza hi swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bcom
238b2(rgyud): ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham pa me lce zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa bri/ /de yi steng du 'khor lo ste/ /me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs
238b3(rgyud): pa mdzes/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA hUM hrIH/ sarba pad ma/ ta hrIHb+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ dam ma ni da ma ma ni/
238b4(rgyud): gar+g+ha ri gar+g+ha ri hrIHswAhA/ me'i phyogs su brten nas bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yi/ /phyag rgya
238b5(rgyud): gzugs bzang bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ste/ /me lce'i nang du shin tu mdzes/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA tra
238b6(rgyud): Ta tra Ta/ mu hU mu hU/ sarba pA paM sho d+ha ne swAhA/ lho phyogs su ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ me dang rlung dang ldan pa yis/ /ut+pal ni der bri'o/ /de yi
238b7(rgyud): steng du rin po che/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs skong ba/ /me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba/ /pad+ma rnams kyi yongs su bskor/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba
239a1(rgyud): ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA /d+ha ka d+ha ka /mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na nir dzA te swAhA/ bden bral phyogs su ni bdud
239a2(rgyud): thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yin/ /de yi steng du sngags pa yis/ /lcags kyu
239a3(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa bris/ /phan tshun 'brel pa'i rdo rje dag /blo dang ldan pas der dgod do/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/
239a4(rgyud): sarba thA ha ha/ mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi ci/ durdAn+ta da ma ni swAhA/ byang gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa zhes
239a5(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yin/ /de yi steng du pad+ma ste/ /'od ni dus mtha'i me lta bu/ /de yi steng du ral gri
239a6(rgyud): ste| |'od zer rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs ldan pa'i/ /ut+pal rnams kyis kun khebs bya/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maH
239a7(rgyud): sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swAhA/ rlung gi phyogs su ni dkon mchog 'byung
239b1(rgyud): gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /cha gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas/ /lcags kyus thams cad dgab par bya/ /me lce 'bar ba'i phreng
239b2(rgyud): bar ldan/ /nub phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma bri bar bya ste/ de la dbang chen dkyil 'khor te/ /de la rdo rje legs par gnas/ /de yi steng du pad+ma che/ /pad+ma'i
239b3(rgyud): steng du bgrang nor phreng / /de dag me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs/ /steng du pad+ma rnams kyis dgab/ /de nas cha gsum pa la ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags pas
239b4(rgyud): ci rigs bri bar bya/ /brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin/ /de la shar du rnal 'byor pas/ /'jig rten dbang po 'od chen bri/ /pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa ni/ /de yi phyag rgyar brjod
239b5(rgyud): pa yin/ /me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur
239b6(rgyud): gyur pa'i phyag rgya ut+pal bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje dri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o/ /rlung
239b7(rgyud): gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs
240a1(rgyud): su ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpal lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
240a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ye shes chen po dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen
240a3(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang legs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ye
240a4(rgyud): shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / dgra dang bral bar 'gyur/ gal te
240a5(rgyud): chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par
240a6(rgyud): 'gyur| chom rkun gyis 'joms par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtses par mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / rtag tu dpal dang
240a7(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin
240b1(rgyud): mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang 'dzin pa
240b2(rgyud): dang | klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byang par 'gyur ro/ /des ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcad par 'gyur
240b3(rgyud): ro| |des ngan song dang / ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsring bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas su/ /lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /srin pa nyam ngar gang byas pa'i/ /
240b4(rgyud): sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tham/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
240b5(rgyud): chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sus dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris
240b6(rgyud): nas der zhugs par gyur na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bstan par
240b7(rgyud): mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de de snyed du rig par bya'o/ /'jam
241a1(rgyud): dpal| ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can sdig can gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod de/ 'jam dpal/ the tshom med pa dang / rnam par rtog
241a2(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tu zin pa dang / pha lam gus pa dang / ma la ma gus pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma la smod pa
241a3(rgyud): dang | bla ma'i skyon 'bru ba'i sems can de dag la ni ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu yang 'chang du mi gzhug go / rna lam
241a4(rgyud): du yang grag par mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o/ /glegs bam du bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar yang mi bya ste/ sems can
241a5(rgyud): sdig pa can de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang / ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa
241a6(rgyud): ma yin no/ /zhes zer te de dag ni bdag kyang phung la/ gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do/ /de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngags gyi dngos grub med do
241a7(rgyud): zhes kho bos smra na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/ de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur na nges par 'byin
241b1(rgyud): pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan med do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
241b2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shin tu bka' ba byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis ji skad smras
241b3(rgyud): pa bzhin te/ de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa yin te/ de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam
241b4(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs
241b5(rgyud): sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'jin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/
241b6(rgyud): 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang de tsam du
241b7(rgyud): rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/ tshul 'di ma rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes so/ /
242a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang / cho
242a2(rgyud): 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags
242a3(rgyud): 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang bdud pham par byed pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
242a4(rgyud): de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /'jam dpal/ su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig thams
242a5(rgyud): cad la zhugs pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam/ gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du
242a6(rgyud): gnas pa'i phyir te/ de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ma gtogs pa de las gzhan med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin
242a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /su 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yin no/ /'jam dpal/ phyogs gang du
242b1(rgyud): ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am/ gang gi lag na 'chang ba'am/ gang gi phyir 'dri ba 'am/ gang zhig nyin gcig tu nang par
242b2(rgyud): langs nas lan re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /'chi khar yang de la
242b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par mdzad do/ /'jam dpal/ ltos dang / sa la gnas pa'i shing dang / nags tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do/ /'jam
242b4(rgyud): dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang / gzungs sngags 'di dag la gnas te/ 'di dag
242b5(rgyud): gi byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang rnyed do/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
242b6(rgyud): 'tshang rgya 'o/ /de nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byad de/ 'di ltar thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na khyod
242b7(rgyud): kyis kyang chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ yid la gyis shig/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur
243a1(rgyud): ro| |'jam dpal/ sa phyogs gang na ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten
243a2(rgyud): lta bur 'gyur ro/ /gang gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sngags pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
243a3(rgyud): cad rtag tu byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /sngags pa des kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rin po che za ma tog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir
243a4(rgyud): zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam gus pa'i rang bzhin can dang / slob dpon gyi skyon 'dru ba dag yod pa'i phyir
243a5(rgyud): te| 'jam dpal/ de dag la ni chung ngu na gtam du yang bzlas par mi bya/ glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya na dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / klog tu gzhug pa dang
243a6(rgyud): bltar gzhug pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta bu dag bltar gzhug pa dang / tshig tu dbyung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin te/ 'jam dpal/ byang
243a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o/ /de ni 'khrul pa chen po dang / shin tu kha na ma tho ba chen po yin no/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
243b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po la bslu ba ni sla yi/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba de ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon te/ dper na/ u dum wa
243b2(rgyud): ra'i me tog bzhin no/ /de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'di 'dra ba dag ston pa ni dkon no/ /de bas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa ni dkon no/ /de bas kyang 'di gang gi lag na 'chang ba
243b3(rgyud): dang | gang dag 'di nyan pa dang / gang dag 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon te/ sems can de dag gi bsod
243b4(rgyud): nams kyi phung po'i mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/ gang dag nang par langs nas lan gcig klog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams
243b5(rgyud): yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang
243b6(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la nad thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang la las dben pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ me tog phul
243b7(rgyud): nas tshes grangs dang / zhag phyed pa dang / yud tsam dang / dus bzang po la gro ga la bris sam/ yang na yar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ ches bco lnga la spos dang / me tog dang /
244a1(rgyud): bdug pa dang / lha bshos phul la mar gyi mar me brgyad dang / gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas gro ga la bris te mgul pa'am/ dpung pa 'am/
244a2(rgyud): lag ngar ram/ rked par btags la 'thab mo 'gyed pa'i nang du 'gro ba'am/ lam du 'gro ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na/ de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar
244a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di ni sems can rnams bsrung ba'i mchog yin te/ khyim mam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang gang na gzungs sngags 'di dag
244a4(rgyud): 'dug pa'i gnas der bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gang gis gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung bas bsrung bar byas pa la 'gal bar byed
244a5(rgyud): ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/ de'i mgo bo lag na rdo rje ngas kun tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pas 'gems
244a6(rgyud): so/ /'jam dpal/ char mi 'bab na yang gzungs sngags 'di bklag par bya'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong na yang bklag par bya'o/ /mi nad kyi gnod pa 'byung ba
244a7(rgyud): la yang bklags na 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'
244b1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgya che ba 'di dang / shin tu zab pa 'di dang / gting
244b2(rgyud): dpag dka' ba dang / gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ sems can sdig can rnams la bstan du mi rung ba 'di ni lag na rdo rje khyod kyis shin tu dkon pa zhig smras te/ 'di ni
244b3(rgyud): sngon ma thos na 'di sems can ji lta bu dag la bshad par bya/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang dag byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la zhugs pa dang / gang gi tshe de
244b4(rgyud): dag gi byang chub kyi sems grub par gyur pa de'i tshe/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ye shes
244b5(rgyud): chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir gzhug par bya yi/ gang dag gis byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par ma gyur pa de dag ni gzhug par mi bya ste/
244b6(rgyud): de dag gis dkyil 'khor yang ltar mi gzhug go /de dag la ni phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyang bstan par mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil
244b7(rgyud): 'khor 'di byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po bcings pa tsam gyis thams cad byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba bshad kyi nyon cig / lag pa gnyis sbyar la
245a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i gung mo bkug pa ni gzungs sngags thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/
245a2(rgyud): sarba thA A gats+tsha pu nit+tI/ pa ri pU ra Ni/ sa mi sa mi/ maM ga li maM ga li hUM phaT/ de nyid kyi gung mo snga ma bzhin du bzhag na/ dkyil 'khor du gzungs sngags rnams kyi byin
245a3(rgyud): gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug na thams cad drangs par 'gyur ro/ /
245a4(rgyud): de'i gsang sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi satwa ma d+ha ri/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sa ni da d+haM/ ku ru ku ru/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas
245a5(rgyud): mchod pa mchog 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ lag pa gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkyed pa ni mchod pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis mchod pa'i cho ga byin
245a6(rgyud): gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ ma hA pU dza/ pra brta ni hUM phaT/ pra brta ya pra brta ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta
245a7(rgyud): sam ye swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ de nas slob dpon gyis cho ga snga ma bzhin du slob ma yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems sgom pa 'grub pa la dkyil 'khor
245b1(rgyud): 'di dang / phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/ /de ma yin pa gzhan pa la ni glegs bam yang bltar gzhug par mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang
245b2(rgyud): sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig mi shes pa'i sems can la dkyil 'khor bstan tam/ phyag rgya bstan na des sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
245b3(rgyud): dpa' rnams bslus par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga yang byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni sla yi/ dam tshig
245b4(rgyud): mi shes pa dang / lus yongs su ma sbyangs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sgom pa ma grub pa la ston pa ni de lta ma yin te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can de dag gi mdun du ni
245b5(rgyud): nam kyang tshig tu brjod par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can sdig can de dag ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la drin du mi gzo ba dang / dad pa
245b6(rgyud): pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can de la ya mtshan du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo
245b7(rgyud): snyam nas cang mi zer bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
246a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs sngags 'di dag nyan pa dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / dran par byed pa dang / chung ngu ni rna lam du
246a2(rgyud): grag pa tsam du gyur pa de yang shin tu dkon pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ 'jam dpal/ gang dag gzungs
246a3(rgyud): sngags 'di dag la mchod pa byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon par rig par bya'o/ /su gro ga'am/ gzhan la bris nas yan lag dang /
246a4(rgyud): nyid lag gang yang rung ba la 'chang na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing / sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyin gcig bzhin du
246a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas stong las bsags par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ phyogs gang na gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa 'di gnas pa 'am/ gang gi lag na yod
246a6(rgyud): pa'i sa phyogs de ni mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems
246a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po/ gzungs sngags 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa gang yin pa de la ni kho bos mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de'i phyi bzhin
246b1(rgyud): du yang rtag tu 'brang bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe na yang kho bos de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen byas te/ rtag tu byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston par bya'o/ /'jam
246b2(rgyud): dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /tshig 'di ni legs par smras so/ /'jam dpal/ kho bos kyang de la mchod pa bya'o/ /rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar bya'o/ /rtag tu
246b3(rgyud): bsrung bar yang bya'o/ /'chi ba'i tshe na yang de la lung bstan par bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
246b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ gang bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin
246b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs sngags gang bsgrubs na sngags pas tshe 'di nyid la yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur pa'i gzungs
246b6(rgyud): sngags 'di dag gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba rgyas par shod cig / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
246b7(rgyud): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gzungs sngags 'di dag gi sgrub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji skad gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig /tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar
247a1(rgyud): dang yang sbyar mi dgos/ smyung ba yang bya mi dgos/ bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ gzungs sngags bsgrub pa'i tshe yang rtag tu sangs
247a2(rgyud): rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ thog mar re zhig gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'byung
247a3(rgyud): ste| kha thabs bzhin du ras nyos la skra la sogs pa med par bya'o/ /de nas ba las byung ba'i sna lngas bkrus la spos chus bkru'o/ /de nas tshes grangs dang / zhag
247a4(rgyud): phyed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po la ri mo bris te/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pa 'drir gzhug go/ ri mo mkhan de yang 'khor los bsgyur bas bsrung bar
247a5(rgyud): bya'o| |nyin gcig bzhin du lha bshos dang / mchod pa yang dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas ri mo mkhan gyis dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
247a6(rgyud): phyin pa bri bar bya ste/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la thor tshugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i g.yon rol du so sor
247a7(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo bri bar bya ste/ ut+pa la'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug cing / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la lcang lo 'phyang bar bya'o/ /g.yas logs su rdo
247b1(rgyud): rje mi pham pa'i me pad+ma dkar po la 'dug cing rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan la lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo thogs pa/ g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal
247b2(rgyud): par bya'o/ /steng gi phyogs su yang rig sngags 'chang gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri'o/ /'og logs su sgrub pa bo lag na bog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das ma la
247b3(rgyud): blta zhing / yal ga me tog can thogs pa skyil mo krung gis 'dud par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa
247b4(rgyud): phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ dben pa 'am/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gang yid dang 'thad pa der 'dug la slong mo'i zas za zhing / nang gi gtsang
247b5(rgyud): spra spyod pas ri mo'i sku gzugs de'i mdun du gzungs sngags gang yang rung ba cig bzung ste bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ tha mar zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod pa
247b6(rgyud): byas te mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram/ nyi ma 'char kar mtshan ma 'byung ste/ sngags pa'i lus la 'od snang ba 'byung zhing / sku gzugs la me tog gi
247b7(rgyud): char 'bab par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams ca co'i sgra 'don par 'gyur/ 'brug sgra grag par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ma yang / bu| nga grub zin gyis longs
248a1(rgyud): zhes tshig brjod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon phul nas bcom ldan 'das ma la/ 'di skad du/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs
248a2(rgyud): par mdzod cig ces smros shig / 'on tang bcom ldan 'das mas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
248a3(rgyud): 'khor du 'jog ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sgrub par byed cing / sems
248a4(rgyud): can gyi khams thams cad skad cig re re la dga' bar byed do/ /rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
248a5(rgyud): 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i mdo 'di ni don thams cad sgrub pa/ sdig pa thams
248a6(rgyud): cad rab tu sel ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ gang ri mo'i sku
248a7(rgyud): gzugs 'di mthong ba dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / su'i lag na 'dug pa dang / su yi ger 'dri ba de la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam ston par
248b1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams las skyes par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar
248b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ bdud sdig can rnams kyis gtse bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang
248b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang ri mo'i sku gzugs 'di mthong ba dang / ri mor 'dri ba dang / gang gi lag na 'dug pa de ni yon tan
248b4(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing / ngan song ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ de bzhin
248b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs su yang rtag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems
248b6(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la gsol ba btab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs sngags 'di dag gi sbyi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par dbye ba gang gis byang chub
248b7(rgyud): kyi spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyis tshegs chung dus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par bya bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
249a1(rgyud): 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sems can thams cad sdug
249a2(rgyud): bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed par 'gyur ba khyod kyis shod cig / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon
249a3(rgyud): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di dag gi spyi'i sgrub pa'i rnam par phya
249a4(rgyud): ba bshad kyis nyon cig / 'jam dpal/ de la byang chub kyi spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang du yang rung ste/ ri mo'i sku gzugs
249a5(rgyud): bzhag la bcom ldan 'das ma gzugs sam/ kha dog gam/ dbyibs sam/ yi ger yid la bsams te/ zla ba drug gi bar du bsgoms na las thams cad nus par
249a6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ dug ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa ni bsdigs pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan ci yang rung bas zin pa yang
249a7(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol na gnas pa yang las thams cad byed do/ /'jigs pa thams cad la ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
249b1(rgyud): brjod byas pa'i skud pas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad la ni chus srung ba byed do/ /sgrub po rnams sam/ ro langs grub pa rnams la gzungs sngags 'di
249b2(rgyud): dag las gang yang rung ba gcig gis bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad par bya'o/ /de nas lus mi snang
249b3(rgyud): bar byed 'dod na skar ma rgyal la ldong ros kha thabs bzhin du nyos te/ rang gi khrag gis bsgos la de nas phyung ste/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du gzhag go /de nas
249b4(rgyud): zas su 'o ma dang / phye'i 'di gu za zhing zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la kha zas mi za bar lag
249b5(rgyud): pa g.yon par bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ thig le byas pas lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs
249b6(rgyud): can lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das ma mthong bar 'dod na zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing ri'i rtse mor song ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas
249b7(rgyud): brjod bya'o/ /de nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ zla ba nya la byang chub kyi shing drung du ci 'byor pas lha bshos dbul zhing mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das ma la bzlas
250a1(rgyud): brjod bya'o/ /de nas nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das ma nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la me tog dkar po dag gis mchod yon dbul lo/ /de nas bcom
250a2(rgyud): ldan 'das mas sgrub pa po'i spyi bor byugs nas/ bu legs so/ khyod la mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya zhes de nyid zer ba dang / ci 'dod pa de ba slang bar bya ste/ 'dod
250a3(rgyud): na zho 'am/ rigs sngags 'chang nyid dam/ lus mi snang ba'am/ sa'i 'og tu 'gro ba 'am/ gzhan yang / yid la gang 'dod pa ci yang rung ba de thams cad bslang
250a4(rgyud): par bya'o/ /ci ste ngang pa bsgrub par 'dod na li khri las ngang pa'i gzugs byas te/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du gzhag la kunada'i me tog gis mchod pa rgyas par
250a5(rgyud): byas nas/ mtshan rangs bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na nang bar ram/ nyi ma 'char kar 'grub par 'gyur te de la zhon nas nam mkha' la 'phags pa

257b1(rgyud): thams cad dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /a shwat+tha I lo ma sbrang rtsi la smyugs te/ brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad sngags pa de la nyin gcig bzhin du

257b3(rgyud): rA dza ba sho b+ha ba ti/ pri yang ku'i yam sreg shing gis ni/ ma hA rA dza gra ma hi shi ba sho b+ha ba ti/ a ga ru'i yam sreg shing gi me bus la til 'bru khri sbyin sreg byas na
257b4(rgyud): yul dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shing 'o ma can gyi me bus la til 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do/ /shing ma da kas me bus la
257b5(rgyud): n a le sham gyi 'bru brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na 'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te 'byung po'i bdag po re re la yang nyin gcig bzhin du g.yog brgya'i gos zas sbyin
257b6(rgyud): par byed do/ /gar 'gro 'dod pa der phrag pa la bskyon te 'gro'o/ /mon sran gre'u 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'byung mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ de dag sngags pa
257b7(rgyud): de'i yo byad thams cad sgrub bo/ /'jam dpal/ 'di dag la sogs pa gzungs 'di rnams kyi bsgrub pa dag ni gang du sbyor ba de'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /'dod pa
258a1(rgyud): dang | sbyor ba tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung bas kyang sgrub par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / gzungs sngags 'di
258a2(rgyud): dag 'dzin pa dang / sgrub pa rnams la ni bgegs rnams kyi skabs med do/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi
258a3(rgyud): dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ / //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan

258a5(rgyud): ma| bod skad du/ rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug po/ /shA ka thub
258a6(rgyud): kyis ni rigs khro bo/ /phyis kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed/ /rtog pa'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad/ /lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis/ /rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam/ /
258a7(rgyud): rtog pa med pa'i rig pa yis/ /khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes/ /dang po phyag 'tshal de 'og tu/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas//

258b2(rgyud): bzhi pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin/ /yang ni me yi sa bon dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa yi/ /'og tu me yi sa bon no/ /lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang
258b3(rgyud): yang | |gsum pa'i sde pa lnga pa la/ /dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang / /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la/ /

258b6(rgyud): byung dang bzlog pa yi/ /sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ phaT hUM Ni pA dzra ba ra d+ha ra ba lAM nI oM/ rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlas
258b7(rgyud): pa dang / /yi ge re la 'bum phrag dang / /de las lhag pa'i spyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang / /bskrad dang dbye rengs bsad
259a1(rgyud): pa dang / /las ni gang gang 'dod pa des/ /snying gar sbyor ba rim bzhin bsgrub/ /lus gtsang snying rjer ldan pa yis/ /rang lus lha dang bla ma la/ /
259a2(rgyud): phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas/ /rig pa'i khro bo bsgom par bya/ /dang po stong nyid rnam bsams la/ /lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru/ /rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig ni/ /
259a3(rgyud): dang po las byung zla ba la/ /hUM yig sngon po rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi 'dus 'dra'i 'od 'phros nas/ /sems can dri ma rnam bsal te/ /skur gyur snying po bsdu bar bya/ /

259a5(rgyud): g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /brgyad gnyis lon pa'i nyams tshul can/ /drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan/ /brang 'gro brgyad pos sku la brgyan/ /zhal gcig
259a6(rgyud): pa la phyag gnyis pa/ rang gis rdo rje bsnams pa ni/ /bsnun pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang / /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can/ /na bza' sngon po sham thabs 'dzin/ /

259b1(rgyud): 'jigs par byed/ /log 'dren la sogs 'joms mdzad pa/ /de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la/ /de nas bdag nyid snyoms 'jug pa/ /de yi snying gar nyi ma la/ /rang gi
259b2(rgyud): chos kyi yi ge las/ /khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing / /de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis/ /de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing / /rdo rje hUM

259b7(rgyud): gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du/ /klu yi sdig pa zhi bar bya/ /shin tu gnag pa'i rigs de la/ /mngar gsum chu yis gso bar bya/ /gang zhig sdig
260a1(rgyud): can zhi mi 'dul/ /gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyun gcod bya/ /khrag dang dug sogs rdzas dag la/ /rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas ni/ /shin tu khros
260a2(rgyud): pa'i khro bo yis/ /dgug dang gzhug dang myos bsad dang / /cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la/ /bsreg pa la sogs las bya'o/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe/ /skya
260a3(rgyud): rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha/ /nyin mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /skra bkrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu ni/ /byol song gnas su khrag skyug go /lus dbus me 'bar bsgrub
260a4(rgyud): bya de| |khro bo'i spu yi bu ga las/ /spros pa'i khro bo khros pa dang / /mngag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas/ /rtog pas rtog pa bza' bar bya/ /sngar ni rdo rjes 'og las//
260a5(rgyud): gdug pa 'dir ni bza' bar bya/ /mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos/ /ma bcos pa yi sems can la/ /snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems/ /til sogs rdzas dang sngags
260a6(rgyud): sbyor gyis/ /sdig pa zhi byed sbyin sreg bya/ /rig pa'i blo can kun bzang gis/ /zho la bsreg bya rgyas pa'o/ /mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul bya la/ /'dod chags yid can ba de
260a7(rgyud): chen gyis/ /bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir/ /ut+pal dmar sogs kyis sgrub pa'o/ /'dir ni ma rungs sdig ba byed/ /gtsor ni sbyangs phyir khro sems kyis/ /
260b1(rgyud): mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun las/ /bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya'o/ /rig sngags snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro/ las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin/ /las ngan dag pa'i rang

260b4(rgyud): sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang / /bdag nyid gcig pu bsgom pa'ang gsungs/ /nam mkha'i khams su 'byung bzhi bsam/ /ri rab lhun po hrI yig las/ /pad+ma 'dab grangs
260b5(rgyud): lte ba la/ /bla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o/ /hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhin bza' sngo/ /rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu 'gengs/ /sbrul dang mi sdug mgos
260b6(rgyud): brgyan cing / /stag lpags smed dkris 'jigs sel ba/ /khro bo rnam rgyal bsgom par bya/ /thugs ka'i hUM gi sbyor ba yis/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams su/ /
260b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang / /'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang / /'jig rten gsum 'ching pad+ma dang / /'jig rten gsum 'jigs las nyid dag /g.yas rnams
261a1(rgyud): rang ming mtshan ma la/ /g.yon rnams gdug pa bsdigs pa'o/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug sngon dang / /mi g.yo ba dang rta mgrin khro/ /rdo rje dang

261a3(rgyud): pa nag sogs pho nya bzhi/ /sku mdog mtshan mas brgyan pa khros/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sel bsgom/ /gtso bcas

261a5(rgyud): rgyal gtso/ /khro bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas bshad/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can/

261a7(rgyud): pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang / rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po ser la khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul
261b1(rgyud): 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang / khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin

261b4(rgyud): rlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/ klu thams cad rlag par
261b5(rgyud): byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi
261b6(rgyud): pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha ri raM/ badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku lo ta sA da na/ b+ha biSh+ya ti/ tad+ya tha/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha /bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma hI prAp+ta ha
261b7(rgyud): ra ha ra nA ga nAM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha nA ga marmA Ni/ bi ShiR+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+phoT/ nA ga na ya naM nI hUM hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/
262a1(rgyud): nA gota sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI laM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a bra ti ha ta ba la par kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tan+tA ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn+ta rU bA ya phaT/ ro Sha nA ya hUM
262a2(rgyud): phaT| trA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kuM b+hAN+Da uta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ phre ta bi shA ce bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra
262a3(rgyud): ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de'i chog
262a4(rgyud): la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab te gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/ /klu bzlog par 'dod na smyug shad kyi lcug ma 'am/ bal po se'u 'i lcug mas

262a6(rgyud): zhag gcig smyung bar gnas te bog gis bdug na rmi lam du dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la gser gyi dong tse bdun stong ster bar 'gyur
262a7(rgyud): ro| |rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o/ /sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar rnying pa'am
262b1(rgyud): thal ba'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas ta mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur
262b2(rgyud): ro| |byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o/ /dug la ni rtsa ku shas
262b3(rgyud): bya ba par bya'o/ /bdag bsrung ba la ni yid kyis sam/ chus bya'o/ /gzhan bsrung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum
262b4(rgyud): mam| bdun nam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las/ rtog pa gsum
262b5(rgyud): pa'o|| ||rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa/ /lag na rdo rje khros pa las/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya/ /
262b6(rgyud): oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ /'di ni bka' tsam nges bsgrag cing / /bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod/ /snying ga'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing / /gu gul dud pas brod
262b7(rgyud): byas la/ /gser sna chen po seng+ge la zhon pa dang / rmugs 'dzin dang / gang ba bzang dang / nor bu bzang dang / ku be ra dang / yang dag shes dang / 'brog gnas dang / lngas
263a1(rgyud): rtsen dang / pi tsiM kuN+Da li rnams la mkho ba sbyin par bya'o/ /'di rnams rta la chibs pa la/ /'od dang ldan zhing me long can/ /ras dkar gtsang
263a2(rgyud): mas gsal byas la/ /gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya/ /yang na kun kyang sprul nag chibs/ /'jigs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams(rgyud): bskul ba dag par dbang byas
263a3(rgyud): na| |mngon spyod las kun byed par 'gyur/ /drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad/ /sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni/ /sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed/ /dus tshod
263a4(rgyud): dus la mchod pa byed/ /de nas dbul bas 'jigs pa la/ /rmugs 'dzin bsgrub pa yid 'ong bshad/ /kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la/ /rin chen 'bar bas
263a5(rgyud): khyim 'gengs pa/ /skyor gang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur/ /pad+ma zla dang gter chen la/ /dzaM las byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu/ bkug la rang rang gsang sngags kyis//
263a6(rgyud): chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin 'bul/ /'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so/ /oM bai shra ba NA ya swAhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/ oM pUr+Na b+ha dra ya swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha
263a7(rgyud): drA ya swAhA/ oM ku be rA ya swAhA/ oM saM pra dz+nyA nA ya swAhA/ oM gu h+ya s+thA nA ya swAhA/ oM pAny+tsi kA ya swAhA/ oM bi tsi kuN+Da lI ye swAhA/ de nas yang dag spyod pa'i
263b1(rgyud): mchog / lha yi brtul zhugs dag pa bshad/ /dus rnams kun tu dar ras gtsang ma'i gos sngon byin gyis brlab bya zhing / /bram ze'i rigs ltar dri can zas dang 'gro
263b2(rgyud): mgyogs sha las ring du 'dug / smyung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum gtsang ma'i zas za zhing / /ngag gi rlung bsngams dad dang snying rjes yid brlan rtag tu
263b3(rgyud): brtson par 'jug / bsam gtan khang pa mdog ni sngo bsgyur ba lci dri zhim chu yis byugs/ /dkar dang sngo ba'i me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la/ /cho rigs
263b4(rgyud): btsun pa'i sgrub pa pos ni gos dkar bgos la ku sha'i stan la 'dug/ snying rjes khros pa'i rig sngags dam pa dag cing mdzes par bzlas pa bya/ /ru rak+sha yi bgrang
263b5(rgyud): phreng brgya phyed byin gyis brlags la lag g.yas gzung / /phreng ba'i ril bu re dang lha re sngags re bcas nas snying gar bzung / /rnal 'byor 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la
263b6(rgyud): 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir rtog pa bshad pa byas pa yin/ /rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las/ rtog pa bzhi pa'o// //dbyar kha
263b7(rgyud): skyes pa'i rtswa dang nags tshal las byung me mched ltar/ /rlung gis grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin/ /bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i
264a1(rgyud): rtog pa'i dri ma'i rma rnams la/ /bsrung ba dad dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas sems dam me yis bsreg/ nyi ma'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling gi
264a2(rgyud): dbus su rigs bzung ste/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med dbang po skyon med tshul khrims can/ /skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla ma'i lung thob pa/ /dad dang snying rje'i
264a3(rgyud): sems can gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa des/ /rig pa'i khro bo bsgom dang de rjes de ni bzlas 'bad na/ /bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g.yog lha min gsang ba brnyas
264a4(rgyud): med cing / /chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo dag dang gtor ma la brtson zhing / /sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na/ /ring por mi thogs sgrub pa po
264a5(rgyud): des rtags dang phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur/ /'dir ni mang du smra mi dgos/ /sngar ni rdo rje sa 'og tu/ /bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur/ /zangs lcags bla ma'i
264a6(rgyud): gnang bya'o/ /lus sogs rig pa'i dbang bskur nas/ /me dang rlung sogs 'byung ba dang / /nad dang gdon dang byad rnams dang / /bdud kyis klags ni rnyed mi 'gyur//
264a7(rgyud): me lce phreng ba'i rtog pa las/ /bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na/ /ser sna 'di ni pha rol 'phang / /smon lam lam sna la brten nas/ /'di 'og byang chub sems
264b1(rgyud): dpa' ni/ /'gro ba smin pa'i bla mar 'gyur/ /yang na srid pa bar ma dor/ /sngags kyi rnam shes gzi bskyed nas/ /'gro phan rig pa 'dzin gyur nas/ /de yi 'og tu sems
264b2(rgyud): dpa' 'o/ /tha ma'ang lam la brten nas ni/ /rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas/ /snga ma lam sel de 'og tu/ /dngos grub la ni rnam par gnas/ /lha dang sngags sogs
264b3(rgyud): rtogs pa des/ /rtog pa dman pa mnan pa yin/ /nam mkha' lta bur rtog med la/ /'jig rten ngor ni rtog pas sprul/ /gdul bya sdang sogs sems 'khrugs la/ /nga
264b4(rgyud): ni snying rjes sdang bar mdzad/ /khro sogs bsal du med gyur na/ /khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur/ /dang po rnal 'byor 'tshe ba bcom/ /de phyir rig sngags sbyor ba rnams//
264b5(rgyud): rgyud kun du ni gsungs pa yin/ /'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni/ /sems dag pa ni bde ba yin/ /gdug pa'i sbyor ba phrogs pas na/ /bde bar byang chub lam brten la/ /rdo

265a6(rgyud): btsan gyi bka' khrims su/ dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra badzra dang / ra byid lo ts+tsha bas bsgyur ba'o// //

265b1(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can/ sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/

265b3(rgyud): brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba'i rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar

268b7(rgyud): thA| bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma hi prAp+ta/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA naM/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmA Ni/ bi shiR+yan+tu nA ga sha rI raM Ni/

270b7(rgyud): gul nag po'i spos kyis ni/ /de yi sna nas bdug par bya/ /sngags rgyal nA ga por nas ni/ /mA ra dzi ha gzhug par bya/ /de ni rigs ngan thod par gzhug /mchod rten

271a2(rgyud): pa lnga pa la/ /sha chen la sogs lnga po dag /hUM traM hriHA a/ ra rog kha ru gzhug par bya/ /rim pa bzhi pa dag la ni/ /'khor lo gzhug par bya ba de/ /yaM las rlung dang raM
271a3(rgyud): las me/ /de steng 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri/ /de steng nyi ma zla ba ste/ /'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la/ /dgra bo'i mgo bo thur bstan bri/ /de yi snying gar ming bri'o/ /'khor lo
271a4(rgyud): yi ni rtsibs brgyad de/ /rtsibs la sngags kyis bskor ba bya/ /ming las bsgrub bya hUM las ston/ /'og gi las ni gnyis kyang bri/ /khra dang spyang gi la sogs pa'i/ /thod
271a5(rgyud): par gzugs brnyan bcug nas ni/ /yungs kar dag gis brab byas la/ /rang gi 'og tu gnan par bya/ /gu gul nag po'i spos dag gis/ /de yi sna nas bdug par
271a6(rgyud): bya| |seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa/ /gdab pa'i sngags kyis lce la gdab/ /rdo rje rgya gram dag gis ni/ /de yi bug pa dgab par bya/ /nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /phur
271a7(rgyud): bu bskul zhing yungs kar brdeg / de nas rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o ston pa khyad par 'phags/ /e ma'o thabs
271b1(rgyud): kyang khyad par 'phags/ /e ma'o 'khor yang khyad par 'phags/ /khyad par 'phags pa ngo mtshar che/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las/ sa bla 'dul ba'i le'u ste gsum

271b3(rgyud): pa las kyi 'khor lo 'di/ /sa steng 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje slob
271b4(rgyud): dpon smod pa dang / /theg pa chen po spong ba ni/ /bsdu ba'i dngos por bsdu bar bya/ /de yang dbang du ma gyur na/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas
271b5(rgyud): skur ni bsams nas su/ /de yis gsad bsgom nyes pa bsgrag /zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje 'dzin/ /snying ga nas ni spros byas la/ /de yis bsrung dang 'jig rten lha/ /zhags
271b6(rgyud): pa dag gis drangs nas ni/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM be sha dzaH/ /mtshon cha dag gis bcad la sogs/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ klu yi bzlas pa 'bum
271b7(rgyud): byas te/ /nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan byas la/ /rdzas dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya/ /bzhi mdo lha khang dus nam phyed/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas
272a1(rgyud): byas te/ /de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /steng 'khor 'og 'khor dug shing gis/ /dga' dang legs pa'i sems kyis bri/ /ras ma nyams la kur bum
272a2(rgyud): mchog / dbus su phyag na rdo rje la/ /dpral ba snying ga lkog ma ru/ /yi ge gsum bkod sku gsum ste/ /rgyan dang cha lugs tshang bar bri/ /'khor yug thams cad duSh+TaM bri/ /
272a3(rgyud): zhabs dang spyi bo g.yas dang g.yon/ /zla ba nyi ma dbus su ni/ /rgyal po bzhi yi mtshan ma bri/ /mtshams bzhir rdo rje'i gdan la hUM/ /'khor yug la ni shes rab thabs/ /
272a4(rgyud): hUM las dam tshig sems dpa' la/ /ye shes spyan drangs mchod de zhu/ /'og 'khor sbal nag yan lag lnga/ /snying dang drug tu ming rus gzhug/ phyogs bzhir rtsibs la
272a5(rgyud): mtshams bzhir thod/ /rtsibs dang thod par ming rus te/ /khor yug gnyis la bstod pas bskor/ /sbal khar hri las 'od byung ba/ sa bdag klu chen bkug ste
272a6(rgyud): mchod/ /mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs/ /de nas bsgral bya dgug bya ste/ /sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa/ /ming dang rus la bstim ste bzhag /thod pa las
272a7(rgyud): srin hUM las bskyed/ /de la sbyor ba legs par bya/ /klu la dam bdar mchod pa bya/ /phur pas phyogs mtshams gcad par bya/ /'og mas phyogs su drangs na
272b1(rgyud): 'grub/ /de nas gsol ba 'debs pa rnams/ /ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa/ rmad byung chen po chos rnams la/ /rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la/
272b2(rgyud): kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar| /de nas thog mar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /mtho 'tshams nas
272b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gnod byed thams cad zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ oM badzra pA Ni hr-i da ya gsungs pas gzhan nas byon pa'i
272b4(rgyud): ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs bskul nas/ tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nA got+sa da nA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pa ra kra mA ya phaT/
272b5(rgyud): kri tAn+tA ya phaT/ p-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ tra sa nA ya phaT/ kuM b+haN+Ta ut+sA da nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/
272b6(rgyud): ha sa ha sa/ dA ra dA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi na sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti
272b7(rgyud): swAhA/ gsungs pa tsam gyis dang po'i 'khor rnams skrag par gyur te ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o ston pa byin rlabs che/ /e ma sngags kyi nus pa che/ /e ma che ba'i nyon
273a1(rgyud): mongs che/ /'khor rnams mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las/ sa steng 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //

273a6(rgyud): skad du/ tri sa ma ya byU ha rA dza nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs

273b1(rgyud): lo| |dbus dang mtha' med yon tan ri bo dpag med dang / /mchod rten mtha' med mchod pa'i mchog tu 'khrungs/ /mchod chen 'phags pa'i 'phags pa chen po'i bdag /dus gsum
273b2(rgyud): 'khrungs pa'i bde gshegs tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rdo rje chen po'i nye 'khor/ rdo rje
273b3(rgyud): 'chang chen po nye bar 'du ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par dgyes pas rnam par rol pa/ dbus dang / mtha' med pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo mthon po'i rin po che'i rgyal po

273b5(rgyud): so| |de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rdzu 'phrul chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rgya chen por byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
273b6(rgyud): po| thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa gsungs te/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba trA pra ti ha ta bAp+ti/ d+harma tA ba lI nAM/ aM a/ sa ma sa ma sa man+ta to/ /a nan+tA bA b+hi/
273b7(rgyud): shA sa ni ha ra ha ra/ sma ra sma ra Ni/ bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba la/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ ga ga na mahA ba ra Na lak+Sha Ne dz+wA la dz+wA la na/ sA ga re swAhA/ de
274a1(rgyud): la rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs
274a2(rgyud): dang shes rab dang ldan pa/ sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di las gang zhig byed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin gshegs
274a3(rgyud): pas bstan par mi spyod kyi/ gzhan du mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no/ /'dis skyes bu dam pa de ni sgo mtha' yas pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing /

274a5(rgyud): 'dul ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba/ las thams cad rjes su dran pa'i cho ga yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzungs thob par
274a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / sems can gyi khams dang / mos pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

274b1(rgyud): na gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor bsdus na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

274b4(rgyud): dag par skyed par byed do/ /dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sems can mos pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i yul can gyi sems
274b5(rgyud): can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /byin gyis rlab par byed/ yongs su 'gengs par byed/ /yongs su smin par byed/ rnam par 'dul bar byed/ nges par sbyong bar

274b7(rgyud): myur du lhag par 'dzeg pa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag kyang ston par byed/ mdor na/ mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol zhing so sor 'god par byed/ dge ba
275a1(rgyud): sgrub pa la gnas pa skyed par byed/ sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed/ rnam par 'joms par byed/ rnam par sel bar byed/ 'dren

275a6(rgyud): kyi bu mos snga dro dang po la/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba

275b2(rgyud): sdig pa so sor bshags par bya ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las skyes pa'i sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
275b3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa des bshags par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa
275b4(rgyud): ltar des kyang ji tsam du bshags par nus pa de tsam du bshags par bya'o/ /de nas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/ gang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
275b5(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar
275b6(rgyud): byed pa/ sems can gyi khams yongs su srung bar byed pa/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pas rjes su yi rang
275b7(rgyud): bar bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpas mkhyen pa ltar des kyang ji ltar rjes su yi rang bar nus pa de ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i
276a1(rgyud): bya ba bya ste/ sems can gyi khams na gang nga yir med cing yongs su gzung ba med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga de thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
276a2(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang /

276a4(rgyud): m chog tu rgya che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog rgya chen po'i gong ma las bla mar mngon par bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rab tu 'bab par
276a5(rgyud): 'gyur par bsam pa 'am/ brjod pa mchod pa chen por mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi

276b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa thams cad la yon tan du bsngags pa dang / grags pa sna tshogs kyi glu'i sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byams tshig tu brjod pa 'am bsams la/ 'di lta bu'i bstod pa dpe
276b2(rgyud): med pa nges par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sarba tra sa ku su mi ta a b+hi dz+nyA rA shi ni na mo stu te swAhA/

276b4(rgyud): bya'o| |de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin sems can thams cad la dmigs pa las byung ba'i sems can gyi
276b5(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba thams cad myur du stsol cig pa 'am/ yang na sems can thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i
276b6(rgyud): dge ba 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yang dag par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces de lta bu la sogs pa
276b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa yid la byed pa 'am/ ngag tu brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyu dang / sems
277a1(rgyud): can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po
277a2(rgyud): 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ na mo stu te mahA badzra sarba satwA hi taM ka ra/ tiSh+Tha sarba tra/ sarbe ShAM d+harmA NAM/ a d+hiSh+ThA ya swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal
277a3(rgyud): po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis de dag gi sprul pa'i sprin rgya che ba mos pas mngon
277a4(rgyud): par bsgrubs nas/ mdor na/ sems can gyi khams su sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa yang byed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
277a5(rgyud): dpa'i theg pa can gyi de dag la yang drag par dad par bya'o/ /de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' kho nas mkhyen to/ /de nas de dag thams cad bla
277a6(rgyud): na med pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar
277a7(rgyud): bya'o| |de'i 'og tu bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang /
277b1(rgyud): bdag la grub pa'i mchog stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / dmigs pa dang / bzlas pa
277b2(rgyud): dang | nan tan du bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa thams cad la rjes su
277b3(rgyud): yi rang ba dang / dmigs pa dag la goms pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i snying po 'di ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid bzlas pa bzla bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin
277b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bla na med pa byed pa dang / de bzhin
277b5(rgyud): gshegs pa kun tu bzang po'i sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas ldang bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems
277b6(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa rig pa rgya chen po'i tshul gyi mdo sde rnams mngon par mchod cing klog pa 'am/ tha na phyag byas nas zas
277b7(rgyud): bza' bar bya ste/ dang po zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas khams kyi dang po lha nyid la dbul zhing de'i 'og tu zas bza' bar bya'o/ /de la
278a1(rgyud): sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ba liM dA te dzo mA li ni swAhA/ kha zas kyi sa dub pa spangs nas kyang snga dro'i bya ba gang yin
278a2(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad phyi dro'i yang bya ba yin no/ /nyal na yang yan lag thams cad kyis dang por sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas
278a3(rgyud): nas bstod de mal stan la 'dug cing sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / bla na med pa'i dngos grub kyi
278a4(rgyud): mchog bdag la stsol cig / rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba yang gdab par bya'o/ /mtshan gyi dang po dang / tha ma la mi
278a5(rgyud): nyal ba'i sbyor bas dam pa'i chos 'don pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des de bzhin du nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas dang / byang
278a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la dang por phyag bya ba dang / nyin re zhing bdag 'bul ba dang / de bzhin du sdig pa so sor bshags pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
278a7(rgyud): da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba dang / sems can thams

278b6(rgyud): yin no/ /gal te rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces yid la byed na bzlas pa 'bum yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi'i nyin mtshan

279b1(rgyud): pa dang ldan zhing sems can yongs su bsrung ba'i blo can lus dang / srog la ltos pa med pa/ thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i yid la byed pas lcags dang / gser dngul dang /

281b1(rgyud): go| shing gcig gi drung du rjes su dran pas mchod rten byas shing 'bum bzlas la mdun du a shwad+tha las byas pa'i rtse gsum pa byas la nyin mtshan smyung bar 'dug ste/ nya la bris

281b6(rgyud): de srid bzlas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /yang de nyid lag pas blangs te bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bur 'gyur ro/ /zangs ma'i bum

285a1(rgyud): gam| du du ra ga'i me tog yungs kar gyi mar la sbags nas sbyin sreg byas na 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /mu tsu kun+d+ha'i phur bu ma mo'i

285a3(rgyud): phur bus btab na rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang / ma dad pa dang / gnod pa byed pa phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/ /a sho ka'i phur bus lam po che'i bzhi mdor brkos

285a5(rgyud): la bdugs na sel bar byed cing lhas bstan nas smra bar byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyin sreg gang yin pa des kyang klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa med par byed do/ /zla ba

285b1(rgyud): bo'i mchod rten gyi rtsar dkyil 'khor la me tog gtor ba byas shing ji srid grub pa gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas na 'bar bar gyur nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /
285b2(rgyud): ba bla la ji lta ba de bzhin du lig bu mig dang / ldong ros la sogs pa la zla ba'am/ nyi ma gzas zin pa na bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

293a2(rgyud): dang | chu gri dang / gri dang / kha T+wAM ga la sogs pa'i rdzas su byas pa 'am/ lhag mas kyang bsgrub par bya'o/ /yid la gang 'dod pa 'am/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags
293a3(rgyud): dang | rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan la yang sbyar ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs

293a5(rgyud): thad nas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga'o/ /ji skad bstan pa'i phyogs gcig du mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/ gang yang rung
293a6(rgyud): ba'i mdun du me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la/ ci 'byor pa'i dri dang / me tog dang / phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas kyang rung / ma byas kyang
293a7(rgyud): rung | ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas lag pa 'am/ gzhan du yang rung / ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas bzung nas/ lo ma'i bar ram/ gos kyi bar du 'am/
293b1(rgyud): lcags dang / dngul dang / gser gyi snod du bzhag la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de bzhin du bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
293b2(rgyud): gyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i cho ga yin no/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis dben zhing stong pa'i ri dang / chu klung dang /
293b3(rgyud): mtshe'u dang / tshal nyams dga' ba 'am/ shing gcig gam/ gtsug lag gi gnas sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsa 'am/ sku gzugs bzhugs pa 'am/
293b4(rgyud): gzhan yang / gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dben par bsgrub par bya ste/ 'du 'dzi dang bral ba 'am/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms par byas la/ sems
293b5(rgyud): can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ ser sna med pas som nyi dang bral ba'i sems kyis lus dang / srog la yang
293b6(rgyud): ltos pa med par bya'o/ /gzhan yang / thams cad kyi thun mong gi cho ga ni ri dang / chu 'gram dang / 'bab chu'i ngos la sogs pa'i gnas dben zhing stong pa rnams su dam
293b7(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dang / gnyis su gnas la dus gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/
294a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gsol ba 'debs pas ci srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /

294a4(rgyud): pa sgrub par byed pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin gyis grub pa bklags pas 'grub pa yin pas bzlas pa tsam gyis
294a5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad byed pa yin no/ /don yod pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba 'am/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/ /yang na ras ris bsgrub par
294a6(rgyud): 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje kun nas 'bar
294a7(rgyud): bas bskor ba/ bcom ldan 'das cod ban las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su rig pa'i
294b1(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal mo gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba/ 'od
294b2(rgyud): kyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor ral gri dang / zhags pa lag na thogs pa/ mdog sngo bsangs khros shing 'khrugs pa
294b3(rgyud): gos dmar ser zung bgos pa/ khro gnyer bsdus pa/ bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa/ mngag gzhug pa rin po che'i brag la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa phyag na

295b4(rgyud): ris kyi khyad par ni rin po che'i brag las skyes pa'i rin po che'i pad+ma chen po la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gis mchog stsol ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yen

296a1(rgyud): na thogs pa bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo gcig pu gnas pa phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du mtha' med lag na ral
296a2(rgyud): gri dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ khro bo gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ khro gnyer g.yo ba dang bcas pa'o/ /'dir yang cho ga ni snga ma nyid kyis bya'o/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pas

297b1(rgyud): pa bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris 'di la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa dang sbyar nas de bzhin du las thams cad nyis 'gyur du bya'o/ /rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i

298b3(rgyud): mahA ba la sa ra bI rA dzA te/ sa ma sa ma/ khu ru khu ru/ bi Sha mo d+ha ri d+ha ri/ sI ri sA ri/ ba re swAhA/ dpa' bo mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi

298b7(rgyud): ga ga ne/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a sa he/ hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la swAhA/ bdud rtsi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no/ /shin tu rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

299a2(rgyud): liSh+Ti Ni/ ti ri ti ri/ hA sa hA sa/ A rI Ni ban+d+ha ya/ mahA b+ho gi ni/ ta hA ta mahA badzra gu Nong+ga te badzra le swAhA/ kun tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no/ /byang chub sems
299a3(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yi ge brgyad pa 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi

299a6(rgyud): ra da ya gi ti ti ti ti/ a mU a mU/ khaM khaM NA a sa ma gu NA/ a kA ra ti ti ti ti/ a gra bA lo a d+ha ye taM swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo kun nas rdo rje zhes bya ba mchog gi
299a7(rgyud): yul la rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ a ti a ti/ sa ma sa ma/
299b1(rgyud): kI li ki la/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ma ye ha sa ha sa/ a sa te/ tra yi tra yi/ ga ga ne/ ku ru ku ru/ a dzi te swAhA/ rab mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems
299b2(rgyud): dpa' byin gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ye shes kyi sgo phyogs bcur spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'jig
299b3(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho rnams su ngo mtshar chen po dam pa rgya che ba du ma sna tshogs kyi ltas rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa

299b6(rgyud): la swAhA/ spyan gsum zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rtse mo bla na med pa'i yul can no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga pa'i rig pa'i
299b7(rgyud): mchog phyung ngo / /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ mahA pA la hUM/ de nas rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ nyid kyi rig pa'i mchog
300a1(rgyud): gsungs pa/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM badzra ne tra/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ ku ru ba ra ku ru ba ra/ bi ra bi ra/ mahA ba la/ a hi ho/ mahA sa ma ya te dza la na hUM/ de nas
300a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje de nyid byin gyis brlabs pa/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ mahA tsan+ta hUM/ gsang ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog go/ /'phags pa rdo rje sdes rang
300a3(rgyud): gi rig pa'i mchog smras pa/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a badzra hUM/ yi ge bzhi pa rig pa'i mchog zhal bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o/ /khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang gzi
300a4(rgyud): brjid stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a gra te dzo ba la hUM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ da ma da ma/ dzA
300a5(rgyud): la na ma hA/ ha ra ha ra/ bi Sha Na/ ta ra ta ra/ na ra na ra/ ka ra ka ra/ haM haM/ a mo g+ha/ a pra ti ha ta/ a mr-i ta pa la/ dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/ gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig
300a6(rgyud): pa'i mchog yin te/ gtum po/ srung ba po/ 'chang ba po/ gsod par byed pa/ sgrub par byed pa/ thogs pa med pa/ don yod pa ste/ las mtha' yas pa sngar bstan pa'i
300a7(rgyud): cho ga 'dis sgrub par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga sum 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o/ /rig pa mchog 'di dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul las byung ba/
300b1(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha' yas pa/ mtha' med pa/ sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sngar bstan pa'i cho ga'i rim pa 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /skye ba 'di nyid la tshe dpag
300b2(rgyud): tu med pa thob par 'dod pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i bde ba la longs spyod par 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'jug bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
300b3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams la mchod par 'dod pa dang / mthong bar 'dod pas som nyi spangs nas dad cid rtog pa dang ldan pas 'phrogs pa med pa don yod pa 'dis 'grub par 'gyur
300b4(rgyud): ro| |'di ni ras ris med kyang rung / ma bsgrubs kyang rung / mchod pa med pas kyang rung / khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra kun spyod med kyang rung / sha dang / nya sha ma spangs kyang rung /
300b5(rgyud): bsod nams dang ldan yang rung / bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung / 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung / dman
300b6(rgyud): pa 'am/ dman pa ma yin pa yang rung / mkhas pa 'am/ mkhas pa ma yin pa yang rung / thabs dang ldan yang rung / thabs dang mi ldan yang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dad
300b7(rgyud): pa med pa dang / byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de nas rig pa mchog 'di'i cho ga yang sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa rnams kyi cho ga dang thun mong yin no/ /khyad par
301a1(rgyud): gyi cho ga phyogs tsam zhig bsdus nas brjod par bya'o/ /rig pa'i mchog rig pa chen po'i rgyal bo rtse mo 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/ bklags pas 'grub pa/
301a2(rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par byed pa 'di sems can gyi khams rnams rnam par sbyad par bya ba/ dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas bzlas pa
301a3(rgyud): byas na bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / dbab pa dang / rengs par bya ba dang / bskrad par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gdug pa tshar bcad pa
