369b3(rgyud): pa'i me tog dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten la sogs pa la nyin bdun yan chad ji tsam nus pa byas na/ nges par nad med pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang bcas pa
369b4(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro/ /gdon la ni til mar dang / rang skyur la bstegs pa'i rgyal po'i yungs kar sbyin sreg gis so/ /'byung po dang / sha za dang / srin po la sogs pa la thal ba la sogs
369b5(rgyud): pas bris pas 'bros par 'gyur zhing / brdeg pa dang / gcad pa dang / bcing ba yang med do/ /bdag bsrung ba la ni lan gsum brjod pas so/ /gzhan bsrung ba la ni lan lnga
369b6(rgyud): byas pas 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag la mdud pa bcings pa dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / sa dang / tshon dang / phyag rgyas sam/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang
369b7(rgyud): 'chi bar byed do/ /thal mo brdabs pa 'am/ mdud pa bcings pas sam/ 'dod pas kyang dbang du byed cing 'gugs so/ /phur bu dang / sngags mdud dang / chus kyang thams
370a1(rgyud): cad byed do/ /mdor na yid la bsams nas bzlas pa byas na thams cad don yod par byed do/ /rang bzhin du gnas pa la 'bebs par byed na/

370a4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i rims zhi bar byed do/ /til mar dang bsres pa'i kun du ru ka la sogs pa'i bdug spos thams cad kyis so/ /lcags las byas pa'i phur bus gdug
370a5(rgyud): pa can srin po dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa phur bus 'debs so/ /gnod sbyin la ni 'o ma can gyi phur bus so/ /klu la ni ni ma pa'i shing las byas pas so/ /rig pa
370a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa la ni shri khaN+Da las byas pas so/ /lha la tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i phur bus sam/ ji ltar 'dod pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bzlas la gzugs
370a7(rgyud): brnyan gyi gnas gang yin pa der gdab par bya'o/ /btab nas khros pas gnas de nyid du mtshan ma cung zhig byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya zhing / sred pa med pa'i
370b1(rgyud): drag tu khros pas pha rol kun phur bus gdab bo/ /bstan pa la sdang ba'i sems can dang / sems can rnams la sdang ba yang phur bus gdab bo/ /dpal phur bus rgyal po
370b2(rgyud): gdug pa can gyi dpung phur bus gdab par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po phur bus gdab pa la ni tsam pa'i shing las byas pas rgyal po phur bus gdab par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rus pa'i phur
370b3(rgyud): bus ni bgegs phur bus gdab bo/ /rus pa las byas pa dang / lcags las byas pa dang / seng ldeng las byas pa dang / 'od ma las byas pas gdug pa'i phur bus thams
370b4(rgyud): cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /tha na stong par gdab pa ltar byas pas kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/ /bcings pal ni rtswa'i 'dab ma la lan gsum
370b5(rgyud): brjod pas kyang / brgya byin yang 'ching bar byed do/ /bcad pas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rab tu sbyar na tshangs pa la sogs pa rang nyid kyang lag na rdo rje stobs po ches
370b6(rgyud): bcings bar bsams na bcings par 'gyur ro/ /grol bar gyur cig ces bsams na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta na yang 'dir sems la dbang ba yang 'grub par 'gyur
370b7(rgyud): zhing dam tshig la dbang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de la 'dir thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i 'ching ba'i sbyor ba ni yungs kar dang 'bras btags pa la tig ta dang / tshwa bsres
371a1(rgyud): la| lcags sgrog gam/ rdo rje 'am/ mdung ngam/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bam/ rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas nas dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na
371a2(rgyud): 'ching ba chen pos bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na nim pa'i lo ma dang / ni pi na lhan cig btags nas sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin du 'ching ngo / /mo na sran gre'u dang /

371a5(rgyud): pa las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur byas la/ de nas rus pa'i phye mar rang gi khrag dang bsgres pas sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma dgus nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na sha chen
371a6(rgyud): po mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na nya'i zhag dang bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na til mar las bstegs ba'i ba lang gi sha sa so/ /yang na ke sha
371a7(rgyud): li thal ba dang / rta'i khra ga dang ske tshes so/ /yang na khwa'i sgro la sogs pa til mar la ba stags pa'i sgro thams cad kyis so/ /yang na rang gi khrag dang bsres pa'i
371b1(rgyud): thal bas so/ /yang na arga'i 'bras bu mang la bstegs pas so/ /yang na dug dang / khrag gis so/ /yang na tshwa dang khrag gis so/ /yang na yungs kar dang / khrag gis so//
371b2(rgyud): yang na ba lang gi sha dang / tshwa dang / khrag gis bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg khro ba dang bcas pas nyi ma dgus byas pas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na dur khrod du zangs las
371b3(rgyud): byas pa 'am/ lcags las byas pa'i snod til mar gyis bkang nas bsgos pa la sngar gyi rdzas de dag nyid dang / rang skyur la bstegs pa 'am/ mar dang / til mar dang / 'gyur
371b4(rgyud): byed las bstegs pa btso bar bya zhing gang sngar gyi tshos pa rnams bsal la gzhan gtso bar bya ste/ brgya yan chad ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin sreg bya'o/ /khwa'i sgro dang / thal ba btsos

371b6(rgyud): pas kyang ngo / /gdug pa tshar gcad pa'i las 'di dag gis nges par gdug pa can 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yang klu gdug ba can zhi bar bya ba'i phyir klu'i gnas kyi rtsa bar de ltar
371b7(rgyud): byas na de nyid du zhugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang lha gdug ba can bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa 'am/ sems can mang po la gnod pa byed pa dang / rig 'dzin gdug pa can
372a1(rgyud): rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'am/ gang yang gnod sbyin gdug pa can dang / gang yang srin po gdug pa can nam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon chen po
372a2(rgyud): 'am| rgyal po'i skyes bu 'am/ khams kyi rgyal po 'am/ phan pa ma yin pa byed pa de rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khro bo dang bcas pas mngon spyod bya zhing / bstan pa la phan par bya
372a3(rgyud): ba'i don dang / sems can mang po'i don mthong na don yod par grub pa 'dis sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bstan pa'i sngags rnams kyis ni mngon spyod kyi las
372a4(rgyud): mi bya'o/ /don chung du la yang mi bya'o/ /mi ngas la ni zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bstegs pa'i sha chen dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nim pa'i shing btsos pa'i sbyin

372a6(rgyud): su steng nas phur bus gdab cing brgya bzlas par bya'o/ /yang na lam gyi bzhi mdor lcags kyi rdo rje bzang nas bzlas pa byas na mings rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab
372a7(rgyud): pa la ni klung gi rgyun 'bab pa la me tog gis byas na char 'bebs par byed do/ /drag bo'i las rdzogs so// //dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa chen po'i
372b1(rgyud): rgyal po gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di la ni khrus ma byas kyang skyon yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sha za ba yang dgag pa med do/ /la phug dang / la du la sogs pa la spyod

372b6(rgyud): pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs don yod pa 'di goms par yang bya'o/ /sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi med pas sgrub
372b7(rgyud): pa'i thabs la sbyar bar bya'o/ /lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spro bar byed pa 'di'i sbyor ba la goms par bya'o/ /'dir sangs rgyas
373a1(rgyud): dang | byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rten la gsol ba gdab pa dang / mkhyen par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams

373b6(rgyud): ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bar du gcod par 'gyur ba yin te/ le lo dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / mngon par mi sbyor ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang / phan

374a4(rgyud): dang | lus dang / srog la chags pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams rtogs par bya'o/ /'di la ser sna yang mi bya'o/ /gzhan

374b7(rgyud): g.yo bar byed/ /phur bus 'debs par byed do/ /de nas ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag na rnga yab dang / rdo rje thogs pa'o/ /g.yon
375a1(rgyud): logs su ni lha mo dang bcas pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ rdo rje gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs so/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og tu ni sgrub pa po lha mo la mngon du phyogs
375a2(rgyud): pa'o| |lha mo'i 'og tu ni gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris gnyis pa ni gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs/ lag na ral gri thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i lus can zhes bya ba rdo rje gzhon nu ma
375a3(rgyud): bri bar bya'o/ /de nas yang 'phags pa rdo rje sdes sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM sau mya bar badzra ya na ma swAhA/ de bzhin du 'phags pa lag bzang
375a4(rgyud): gis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM badzra gar+b+ha phaT bi ri ni swAhA/ 'phags pa mthor 'phags kyis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA/ tA thA ga tA nAM/ badzra
375a5(rgyud): ba la ye swAhA/ log 'dren la sogs pa 'ching bar byed do/ /'phags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog gis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a na la sam+b+ha be swAhA/ de
375a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM sarba sa ut+ta ma ban+d+ha badzra shi kha re/ ka
375a7(rgyud): ma lA ka ma lA/ ma pa lA a d+hiSh+Tha na badzra badzra shi khi shi khi/ na mo a ma lA nA/ sA ra sA rA/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ bi ma le swAhA/ shin tu gnod mdzes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin
375b1(rgyud): gyis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ d+hu ba re d+hu ba re/ dz+wA la dz+wA la dz+wA la/ badzra sA ga re swAhA/ rnam par sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/
375b2(rgyud): na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM tsa ra ba na tsa ra ba na/ ha ra ha ra bi skam+b+ha ya/ sA ra u sA ra u/ go pa go pa/ bA bA twa ra twa ra/ kha hi kru ra badzri Ni swAhA/ mnyam pa rdo rje zhes
375b3(rgyud): bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ kA ru Na kA ru Na/ sa ra sa ra/ bi d+ha ma na/ hr-i da ya/ sa twAM bi d+ha ut+ta ma/ dz+wa la na twA swAhA/ 'phags pa rdo rje
375b4(rgyud): zug rngus sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA naM/ ta thA ga tA naM/ oM kro d+ha dz+wa la u ta ha si ni swAhA/ mtha' yas rdo rjes sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM
375b5(rgyud): asmA ga ga ne swAhA/ oM a nam la sa m+b+hAn+tu ta ri Ni/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ a sa man+tu gu Na ut+ta ma d+he hi bi raM/ ga ga na a nan+tA ga ti/ dz+wA la ta dza la ta/ sa ma ta sa
375b6(rgyud): ma ta/ b+hi bI ta hr-i dA ye/ sha lha lA ba le be/ s+pha ra he s+pha ra he/ d+h+ru ba d+h+ru ba swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ mahA ba ri tsi tA/ a gra shi
375b7(rgyud): kha re swAhA/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wa kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM b+hu d+ha ke b+hu d+ha ba lA ti ba lA ni swAhA/ gtsug tor dang / rma bya chen mo'i yin no/ /na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a
376a1(rgyud): na ma la saM b+hAn+du ta ri Ni/ oM ba ra ban+d+hu d+hu swAhA/ rdo rje me dang / rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i ste/ nye bar 'tshe ba yang dag par zlog par byed do/ /oM badzra pa la an+tu sha
376a2(rgyud): tri sho sarba dA be gi na han+tu na tAM/ oM a sa dr-i she swAhA/ dpe med rdo rje'i rigs dang / mi g.yo ba nyid kyi yin no/ /oM a sa mas ma/ a nan+ta a nan+tu ya swAhA/ rdo rje 'dod
376a3(rgyud): pa ma'i'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ ta thA ga ta mahA be ga saM b+ha be saM b+ha ge/ na mo stu te saM g+ha ni la san ti sa ra b+hu be swAhA/ rdo rje sngo bsangs rtse mo zhes bya ba'o//
376a4(rgyud): oM shi khi shi khi swAhA/ shi khe re swAhA/ spyi gtsug rnam gsum gyi'o/ /oM hUM ban+d+ha badzra maN+Da la swAhA/ oM d+ha ri d+ha ri/ d+ha re d+ha re d+ha re Na du ye na ma a pra ti ha ta uSh+NI Sha ya
376a5(rgyud): swAhA| d+ha ri d+ha ri d+ha na ti ye swAhA/ gtsug tor so so so so la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin
376a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad du so sor brjod par bya'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tsaN+Da la
376a7(rgyud): sarba de ba nA ga yak+ShA Na A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ hUM s+phA Ta ya ma ru d+hi ra/ aM ga/ hUM tsaN+Da lA mA d+hi pa ta ye hUM phaT phaT/ badzras mad+ha na hA ra ga
376b1(rgyud): tA| sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha tA ya/ a le hi maM dz+wa le hUM ha na ha na/ TA ta a kaR+Sha de ba a ti nAM/ tA ra sa ru d+hi ra aHger mahA tsaN+Da tsa la/ oM d+ha sha dur d+ha ma/ dz+wA la dz+wA la na maHswa sti swAhA/ rdo
376b2(rgyud): rje 'bigs pa'o/ /oM b+hu ra dz+wA la a gra ye swAhA/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi 'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a la kan ti ti dza ni swAhA/ sngags thams cad la 'di bzhin du re re zhing
376b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba brjod par bya'o/ /sngags 'di thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba
376b4(rgyud): la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo mchog byang chub
376b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sngags kyi sgor spyod pa nyid kyis nges par don yod par grub par rig 'dzin rim par phye ba smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ taM taM taM/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi ka nAM/
376b6(rgyud): ta thA ga tA nAM/ haM haM haM/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ baM baM baM/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAn/ tsaM tsaM tsaM/ dang pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams g.yo bar byed do/ /gnyis
376b7(rgyud): pas ni gzugs rnams so/ /gsum pas ni 'ching bar byed do/ /bzhi pas ni thar pa dang / gzi brjid sgrub par byed do/ /lnga pas gcod par byed do/ /drug pas ni rengs par
377a1(rgyud): byed do/ /'di dag ni phyag 'tshal ba re re'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nI/ sa ma be ga be e lA a d+hiSh+Tha nAM/ ut+ta ra ga ga nas ma ni sus+thi tA/ shrI ka ra
377a2(rgyud): shA pa na to khe la nA to shA nA rA ga ni shi shan tu/ a nan+tA tAM/ sA ra sA ra/ ka mA la ka mA la/ pa ra sha ra Na/ na mo stu/ sarba tra shar NA/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA
377a3(rgyud): nA| a nan+ta ya swAhA/ rdo rje gdan gyi'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba badzra d+ha ra NAM/ badzre ni le ni le g+ha hUM s+pha Ta hUM/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gzi
377a4(rgyud): b rjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i chos
377a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'di smras so/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ a ma lA be ga saM b+ha ba a d+hiSh+Tha na/ badzra ba la bi ga sa man+ta ga mi/ b+h+ra mi b+h+ra maM/ b+hi d+ha ra Na bi d+ha ra Na/ na mo stu ta dz+wA lA na lA
377a6(rgyud): pi ma la lo tsa na/ sarba ta pra sa ra Na bi sa ra Na ba ra pra ba la dru bar sha ra Na hUM swAhA/ da la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung bar byed pa rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /de
377a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi cho gas rdo rje sgrub na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bkrags pa tsam gyis lag pa'i rdo rje mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ri la 'dug nas sngar bstan pa'i
377b1(rgyud): cho gas ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
377b2(rgyud): thams cad g.yos par gyur nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad nam mkha'i spyan gyi chogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
377b3(rgyud): la rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab cing zhus pa ste/ rig pa'i mchog gi rgyal po 'di ni mthu mtshungs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin
377b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa sgrub pa nges pa med pa'o/ /sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa rig pa
377b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'di lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yang dag par ston par byed pa/ mthong ba'i chos
377b6(rgyud): 'di nyid la rmad du byung ba'i mthu mthong bar 'dod pas sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bzung nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /'di la ras ris med kyang rung / ma sgrubs kyang
377b7(rgyud): rung | mchod pa med kyang rung / khrus med kyang rung / sha la sogs pa ma spangs kyang rung ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa 'dir sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
378a1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la rab tu dang ba bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bzung ba de'i nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dir 'di'i dam tshig ni
378a2(rgyud): 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mchod rten gyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas
378a3(rgyud): pas 'dug la/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o/ /yan lag thams cad
378a4(rgyud): sa la phab la/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag yongs su gzung du gsol/ bdag
378a5(rgyud): la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes bya ba'i ngag kyang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ga ga ne ga ga ne sngags dang / phyag
378a6(rgyud): rgya 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig 'di dag gang yang rung ba ma nyams par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur
378a7(rgyud): zhing cho ga 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba ste/ sems can 'dul bar byed pa la gnod par byed pa dang / skyon thogs
378b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i las byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba la mngon spyod kyi las
378b2(rgyud): byed ba dang / mi smra ba'i sbyor bas phyag rgya sbyor bar byed pa dang / gzhan bsod nams ma yin pa la sbyar bar mi bya bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir
378b3(rgyud): 'di dag dam tshig yang dag par bsrungs bar 'gyur zhing da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang / sngags kyi sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
378b4(rgyud): sgor 'jug pa don yod par grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam 'dren par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i snying por 'gyur ba'o/ /dad
378b5(rgyud): pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la khyad par thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems da ba'i sku thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems
378b6(rgyud): dpa'i sku nges par bsgrub par 'dod pas dben zhing stong pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sngags gang yang rung ba bzlas
378b7(rgyud): pa bya'o/ /dben par dam pa'i chos gdon pa dang / sems pa yang rung / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin phyag 'tshal ba yang byas la mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du ri dang / chu klung dang /
379a1(rgyud): mtsho dang / gling dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / nye ba'i tshal la sogs pa rnams su 'am/ gtsug lag khang gi gnas dang / sku gdung dang bcas pa'i sa'am/ lam gyi mdo
379a2(rgyud): 'am| tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang du'ang rung / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du 'am/ sangs rgyas la dmigs pas 'du 'dzi spangs la snyoms las dang bral bas dam
379a3(rgyud): pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas bsgrub pa byas na mtshan gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bco lnga pa la skyil mo krung ma bshig par mngon par bsngags shing legs so zhes bya
379a4(rgyud): ba yang gsol bar mdzad do/ /kha cig gis ni mthong ba yang gsol bar mdzad do/ /kha cig gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa 'phel bar byed cing 'bebs par yang byed do/ /byin
379a5(rgyud): gyis rlob par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par mdzad par 'gyur/ tshad med pa'i yon tan nyid la yang rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
379a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi mtha' yas shing mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams kyis yon tan rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen po yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar 'di ni de'i
379a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi chos kyi tha ma yin no zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na yang sngags kyi spyod pa mtha' dang / dbus med par rab 'byams rgya che ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med cing tshad
379b1(rgyud): med pas mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po chog pa med pa dam tshig chen po gsum gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gsum rdo rje'i sgo nyid kyi
379b2(rgyud): snying po bsdus pa rtog pa chen po zhes bya ba gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang yin pas rdo rje 'chang las gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gzung ba nyid ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
379b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkor gyi snying po 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir te/ 'di gnyis ni sngags dang / phyag rgya la spyod pa
379b4(rgyud): rnams la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtsho'i mchod pa'i mchog bka' bzhin byed
379b5(rgyud): pa zhes gsungs so/ /sngags dang / phyag rgya spyod pa zhes kyang gsungs so/ /g.yo ba med pa'i nor bu zhes kyang gsungs so/ /yon tan mtha' yas pas zhes kyang gsungs so/ /dam tshig
379b6(rgyud): srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam 'dzin pa po zhes kyang gsungs so/ /bstan pa srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so/ /stobs chen po zhes kyang gsungs so/ /don
379b7(rgyud): yod pa 'di la som nyi dang bral pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la dad pas nan tan du bya'o/ /'dir de lta bu'i bstod pa rmad du byung ba gang bdag gis sngon dbyangs su
380a1(rgyud): blangs pa de dbyangs su brjod pas de dang mthun pa'i dngos grub rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ mahA kr-i pe b+h+yaHa sa ma a tsa lA/ sa ma tA sA ra/ d+harma
380a2(rgyud): kA ru Na at+ma ga dza gA tI duHkha hA ri NA/ a si man+d+ha/ sarba gu NA sid+d+hi d+ha yi no/ sa ma lA a tsa lA/ sa ma ba ra a gra/ d+harma Ni ga ga na sa mo pa ma ga ta na biR+ya te/ gu Na la sha re Na tu ka ta ke bya/ shi me
380a3(rgyud): sA d+ha sarba d+hA tu ba ra/ sid+d+hi da ya Sh+Ti bi ga to/ u pA me Shu/ a sa man+ta/ sid+d+hi shu sa ta tA/ a ma lA kA ru Na be ga to at+Thi Ni pra Ni d+ha nA sid+d+hi ra ni ro d+ha d+harma tA/ dza ga to ar+thA sA d+ha na pa ra/ a sa man+tI ni/
380a4(rgyud): shata tAM bi ro tsi ta mahA kr-I pa At+ma naM/ na ni ro d+ha twAM ka ru NA tsA ra kA/ a tsa la pra dza te tri lo ki/ d+ha ra sid+d+hi d+ha yi ka /a mI ta a mI te Shu su sa ma pA ti tAM/ ga ti shwa bi/ a ho su d+harma tA/ tri sa
380a5(rgyud): ma ye a gra/ sid+d+hi ba ra d+ha na te/ me ba ra d+ha/ na ta a gra ti ti ti ti taM/ sA d+ha sa ka lA tri lo ki bar d+ha a gra/ sa d+ha nA nA ar+thA/ s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA tI kA/ A nA bri tA/ nA maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ a
380a6(rgyud): mo g+ha e hi/ a pra ti hA ta/ e hi a tsa lA/ tse TA a nan tA kA Na tiSh+Tha/ tsa ru tsa ru/ ta Ti ta Ti/ tA Ta tA Ta/ big+h+Na g+ha ta ya/ mA ra ya khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sha tA tAM tse me/ a nu ban+d+ha A dz+nyA ku
380a7(rgyud): ru| a sa had+ha na a gra/ ka TA ka TA/ he haM/ a ti bA lA/ e ho mahA gu Na bi Sha NA/ na TA na TA/ A bi sha I bi sha/ a tsa la tse Ta sarba tra a nuta tA ra e ka tsa tA Ta tA Ta/ da mA da mA/
380b1(rgyud): phaT phaT swAhA/ khol po mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o/ /dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so// //dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog/
380b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
380b3(rgyud): pa'o|| / /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sap+ta ta thA ga ta pUrba pra Ni d+ha na bi she Sha bistA ra nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon
380b4(rgyud): lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
380b5(rgyud): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byon te/ yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge
380b6(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems
380b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtseg
381a1(rgyud): dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang / byang
381a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam
381a3(rgyud): par sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub
381a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
381a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
381a6(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ thog
381a7(rgyud): mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po'i chos ston cing / chos kyi gtam gyis sems can rnams tshim par mdzad/ yang dag par
381b1(rgyud): dga' bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
381b2(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
381b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang /
381b4(rgyud): khyim bdag dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa mang po dag chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis lags na de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ thos na
381b5(rgyud): ci nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing
381b6(rgyud): yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas
381b7(rgyud): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i gnas rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ rnam par mi

382a2(rgyud): pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
382a3(rgyud): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan par spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs
382a4(rgyud): brnyan chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam

382a6(rgyud): pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so/ /legs so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sems

382b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang

403b2(rgyud): dang | rtsig pa dang / ra ba dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi dra ba dang / ba gam ni bai DUR+ya'i rang bzhin can/ sa gzhi ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
403b3(rgyud): bde ba can ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+yar snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems

410a7(rgyud): kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing bkres pa dang / skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni skabs/ 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ mdza'
410b1(rgyud): bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams du ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong / gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam
410b2(rgyud): par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des ni des dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa de dag thams cad

411b1(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pa 'am/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa 'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char gyi gnod

417a1(rgyud): ger 'drir stsol ba dang / rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa de ni ngan song gsum du ma mchi bar rig par bgyi ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
417a2(rgyud): chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/

417a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don du bdag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams rab tu stsal bar bgyi yi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag
417a5(rgyud): la dgongs su gsol/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so//

431b1(rgyud): dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na tshe yongs su zad nas yang mngon par skye/ byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun

445a4(rgyud): 'das thams cad bskul cing snang bar mdzad de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang bar mdzad/ lha'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i gnas
445a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams su yang bskul zhing snang bar mdzad de/ slar log nas bcom

445a7(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad nas/ tshad med pa'i gang
445b1(rgyud): gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul
445b2(rgyud): nas khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dag byung ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang / khang pa

445b4(rgyud): dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
445b5(rgyud): p o nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
445b6(rgyud): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu gda'/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang /
445b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/ rig sngags
446a1(rgyud): 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas/ 'di lta ste/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags/ bcom ldan

446a3(rgyud): pa'i dus ni 'di lags so/ /tshod ni 'di lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
446a4(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/

446a7(rgyud): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di
446b1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang pa 'di sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu

446b3(rgyud): pa| gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyi sa phyogs su rdo rjes sa la bsnun cig /de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
446b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te/ sa la bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gas so/ /stong
446b5(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma/ gru bzhi pa/ ka ba
446b6(rgyud): bzhi zug pu/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ chas mdzes par byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/
446b7(rgyud): 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod pa/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo / /khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang / rin po
447a1(rgyud): che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/
447a2(rgyud): dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhig byung ngo / /mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs

448a2(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang / nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / rig sngags dang /

449a1(rgyud): cad bde ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe/ dzam+bu'i gling na sangs rgyas med do/ /de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin po che ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig gnas

449b6(rgyud): na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dge ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /

451b4(rgyud): par de lta bu 'byung ngo zhes smra ba mthong ngo / /de nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying la reg cing spro ba thob nas/ mar gsar gyi gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas zhu
451b5(rgyud): ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo/ /de nas sa gzhi de las smyug ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can/ rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ lo ma gser las byas pa/ rtse
451b6(rgyud): mo mu tig las byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ dri zhim pa/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum skyes so/ /smyug
451b7(rgyud): ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang gas te/ de rnams kyi dbus nas khye'u gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ mchog dang
452a1(rgyud): ldan pa gsum byung ngo / /de nas khye'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te bsgom zhing 'khod do/ /ji tsam du zhag bdun
452a2(rgyud): lon pa'i nyin mo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gser gyi kha dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad
452a3(rgyud): cus spras pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas spras par gyur to/ /smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa brtsegs mar gyur to/ /nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang
452a4(rgyud): shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang nam mkha' la gser gyi yi ger snang ngo / /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang steng na gdugs 'dzin cing me tog gis
452a5(rgyud): gtor te/ 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten du sangs rgyas byung ngo zhes dbyangs su sgrog cing / 'di lta ste/ klu'i bdag po rgyal po chen po gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang / grul
452a6(rgyud): bum gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / brang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rgyal po
452a7(rgyud): chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed do/ /sa phyogs de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi
452b1(rgyud): rang bzhin du gyur to/ /me tog gi shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshe/ drang srong smyug ma'i mde'u rnams las
452b2(rgyud): byung ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje/ de dag ni khang
452b3(rgyud): pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag yin no/ /sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'di yin no/ /smyug ma'i mde'u'i khang pa
452b4(rgyud): brtsegs ma yang 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa yang 'di yin no/ /de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di thos pa tsam mam/ snying po sems la
452b5(rgyud): bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi lus spangs nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /lag na rdo rje/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas
452b6(rgyud): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par bsngags pa smra ba gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe
452b7(rgyud): de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis drang srong de rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
453a1(rgyud): de rnams la bkur sti dang / rim gro byas pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
453a2(rgyud): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i rim gro bar gyur
453a3(rgyud): pa na| de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
453a4(rgyud): thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin to/ /shAkya thub pa/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon gyi sbyor ba gsungs
453a5(rgyud): shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs
453a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi yum/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs
453a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying por gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin
453b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsang ba/ de
453b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang
453b3(rgyud): ba| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba/
453b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i gsang ba/ de bzhin
453b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byang
453b6(rgyud): chub kyi sems kyi rgyan gyi gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
453b7(rgyud): cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsungs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas de
454a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/
454a2(rgyud): 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
454a3(rgyud): dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi mdog dag bkye ste/ de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dong nas sangs rgyas
454a4(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
454a5(rgyud): dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu bzhugs so/ /'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs chen pos bkang nas/ rig sngags
454a6(rgyud): chen po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dIp+ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ ma Ni ma Ni mahA ma Ni ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA/ bcom ldan
454a7(rgyud): 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu ri dang / tshal dang / nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
454b1(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa/ khyod kyis mchog tu gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bcom ldan
454b2(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dza m+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i sprin chen po nam mkha'i dkyil du chags so/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab
454b3(rgyud): bo| |tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang bab bo/ /u dum bA ra'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ gzhan yang /
454b4(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri ngad ldang ba dang / man dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes pa dang / mdog mdzes pa
454b5(rgyud): chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / yid 'ong ba dang / pa ri Sha ka dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab po/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu 'bar
454b6(rgyud): bar gyur te bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad skrag cing sngangs par gyur to/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhi ma par gyur nas phyogs
454b7(rgyud): bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsams so/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
455a1(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams bcom ldan 'das
455a2(rgyud): la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phul lo/ /de nas nor bu rab snang sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs thogs nas
455a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su mchod pa byed do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ras bcos bu'i gos
455a4(rgyud): brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma me tog sna tshogs dang / bdug pa dang / dri
455a5(rgyud): dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /tshangs pa la
455a6(rgyud): sogs te tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson
455a7(rgyud): par byed do/ /de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod
455b1(rgyud): pa byed do/ /lha'i bu nyi ma dang / zla ba yang nam mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /dpal lha mo chen mo dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen
455b2(rgyud): mo dung can ma dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang 'khor brgya stong dang / lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dang / me tog so dang / lha mo chen mo pho nya mo dag kyang rang
455b3(rgyud): rang gi gzhal med khang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom ldan 'das la mchod
455b4(rgyud): pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar byed do/ /klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus pa/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / chu lha
455b5(rgyud): dang / shin tu rab gnas dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam pa kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skar 'od sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
455b6(rgyud): pa byed do/ /'khor chen po yang 'dus par gyur to/ /'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal po chen po de yang blon po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor
455b7(rgyud): dang bcas shing / bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas so/ /sa de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas 'khor chen po de nyid kyi dbus bcom
456a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la brtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i 'khor
456a2(rgyud): lo rtsibs stong pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ lhag pa'i 'od 'phro ba nyi ma bzhin du gsal bzhig byung ngo / /de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
456a3(rgyud): gyi khams snang bar byas nas/ 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i nang nas sgra byung ba/ shAkya thub pa/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs kyi gsang ba rnams gsungs pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /chos kyi

456a7(rgyud): cing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsungs pa'i dus ni 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni

459a1(rgyud): 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ste/ /mig nad ma yin/ /sna nad ma yin/ lce nad ma yin/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ so nad ma yin/

459a5(rgyud): grub par byed pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid grub par byed pa yin te/ gzungs 'di ni bklag
459a6(rgyud): pas grub pa ste las thams cad byed do/ /ri khar 'dzegs te bzlas brjod byas na mig gis gang du bltas pa der sems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad 'jig par
459a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lha khang du zhugs te bzlas brjod byas
459b1(rgyud): na lha thams cad des ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas su zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma la kha bltas te bzlas brjod byas
459b2(rgyud): na nyi ma mngon sum du babs nas mdun na 'dug cing mchog ci smra ba de sbyin par byed do/ /lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na mchog thams cad ster cing mthong bar

466b1(rgyud): du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos zab mo la bzod pa 'thob cing rjes su rtogs par
466b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par rnams 'thob ste/ ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
466b3(rgyud): chub kyi lam ma rdzogs kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u ste/ cho ga gsum pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya'i mtshan
466b4(rgyud): nyid bshad par bya'o/ /snying po chen po bzhi'i phyag rgya la sbyar ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi la sbyar ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i snying po bzhi'i phyag rgya btus pa
466b5(rgyud): rnams dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gdan gyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya gzhan yang brtsam par bya'o/ /'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya la sbyar ba'i cho ga dang / phyi rol
466b6(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/ /thams cad du phyag rgya gzhan rnams ji ltar bde bar brjod do/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sbyar ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya
466b7(rgyud): ma Ni dz+wa la ni A be shA ya hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra b+ha ba ra gra ma ni hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//
467a1(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ya bI saM b+ho d+ha na badzra hUM hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na ma Ni ma Ni
467a2(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra ba ra ma Ni ru tsi ru tsi hUM hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i seng+ge'i khri'i phyag
467a3(rgyud): rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi pu la saM b+ha be hUM hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma Ni badzra hUM hUM/ chos kyi 'khor
467a4(rgyud): lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dza ya a pa rA dzi ta badzra hUM hUM/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu mahA ma Ni shi kha re ha ra ha ra hUM hUM/ de
467a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra ha ya ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes gzung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM du ru
467a6(rgyud): du ru ma Ni ma Ni mahA bi du ta ma Ni swAhA/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste 'phags pa nor bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM lo kA pA li te dza ya dza ya hUM hUM/ rgyal po chen po
467a7(rgyud): bzhi rnams kyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/ /oM bi pu la gra pa ti saM b+ha ra hUM/ dpal lha mo'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/ /oM daM Sh+Ti ni saM hUM/ dung can ma'i bsdigs pa'i phyag
467b1(rgyud): rgya'o/ /oM A ga ma ya dri ra mu ts+tsha da tA hA sti ni hUM/ pho nya mo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /oM a nan+ta a ka ri bi pU ra Ni ta ka ta ka hUM hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad kyi
467b2(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/ /oM sa ra sa ra bi sa ra hUM hUM/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya rgyas pa'i le'u ste/ cho ga bzhi pa'o// //de nas don kun
467b3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ ras kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skra med pa/ khru gang pa'am/ khru do gru bzhi lham pa la ri mo mkhan smyung ba byas pas/ snod gsar
467b4(rgyud): par tshon spyin med pas bcom ldan 'das rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i steng na chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa/ khang pa brtsegs mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o//
467b5(rgyud): g.yas su lag na rdo rje lag pa bcu gnyis pa/ ston ka'i 'dam bu mda' rgyu lta bu'i mdog can/ lag pa na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa gdong bzhi pa bya ste/ gdong dang po ni
467b6(rgyud): zhi ba'o/ /gnyis pa ni khro bo'o/ /gsum pa ni mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /bzhi pa ni gdong khro gnyer can gyen du blta ba ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhag pa/ rgyan thams cad
467b7(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i steng na skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje zhes bya ba gdong bzhi pa/ lag pa bcu drug pa
468a1(rgyud): bya ste/ lag pa g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul ba/ lag pa g.yon na pad+ma thogs pa/ lag pa gcig
468a2(rgyud): gis dbugs 'byin pa/ lag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /lag pa gzhan ni mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa bya ste/ rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / ral
468a3(rgyud): gri dang / me tog gi phur ma dang / bgrang phreng dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / ral gri dang / glegs bam dang / mchod rten dang / ri rab po/ gdong dang po ni zhi ba'o/ /gdong g.yas
468a4(rgyud): pa ni nag po chen po dang 'dra ba'o/ /gdong g.yon pa ni mi'i seng+ge'i dbyibs/ shing pA la sha'i kha dog lta bu'o/ /gdong gong ma ni bzhin bsgyur ba pad+ma'i gdan la skyil
468a5(rgyud): mo krung phyed kyis 'dug par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dung can ma bri ste/ lag pa brgyad pa pus mo btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson
468a6(rgyud): par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu dpal lha mo chen mo pus mo btsugs nas nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul bar

468b2(rgyud): kha dog can gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ sdong bu ni bai DUR+ya/ snying po ni gser las byas pa bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi 'khor lo shin tu rnam par phye ba lte ba
468b3(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ kun nas 'bar ba/ shin tu rnam par bkra ba bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma de'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi ya lad dang / go cha dang / tshem tshem bgos pa/ rgyan thams
468b4(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma de'i drung du rdzing bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /rdzing bu de'i 'gram du rig pa 'dzin pa lag pa na pog phor dang / me tog gi
468b5(rgyud): mgo lcogs thogs la/ lag pa cig shos na ba grang phreng thogs te pus mo btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la gyen du lta bar bya'o/ /khang pa brtsegs ma'i gan du tshangs
468b6(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nam mkha'i dkyil na bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /de la sogs pa sku
468b7(rgyud): gzugs kyi cho ga rnams bya'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas gos dkar po bgos te/ zas dkar gsum za bas tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga nya'i bar du sku gzugs kyi mdun

469b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu gsal bar lung bstan pa yin no/ /phyin chad ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang / gang du 'gro ba de dang / der pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar

472b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gting dpag dka' ste/ lag na rdo rje/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgyad stong gi
472b4(rgyud): bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams la/ bskal pa brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang / bza'
472b5(rgyud): ba dang / bca' ba dang / zhal zas dang / btung ba dang / bcibs pa dang / pho brang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyi ma re re 'bul zhing / de bzhin du me tog

473a1(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ lag na rdo rje/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di lan gcig bzlas brjod byas

473a7(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma'o/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mtshungs par mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag
473b1(rgyud): lags so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su gshegs

480b3(rgyud): pa'i 'khor mang po dang bcas rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rol pa'i stobs kyis bar snang la 'phags te lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

480b5(rgyud): ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs kyis mchod pas yongs su bskor ba zhin par nam mkha'i lam nas yud tsam gcig la pa tha ri'i
480b6(rgyud): grong khyer chen por phebs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su pad+ma'i snying po seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /'khor thams cad kyang rang rang
480b7(rgyud): gi sprul pa'i pad+ma'i khyim gyi theg pa dang bcas 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas/ rang rang gi legs par
481a1(rgyud): bshams pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / lha klu sde brgyad
481a2(rgyud): kyi tshogs thams cad la mchod pa byed do/ /gdugs tshod kyi dus la babs pa na/ kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs 'bul zhing brim ste/ ci bde bar tshim par
481a3(rgyud): byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas gdugs tshod legs par bzhes nas bkru bshal mdzad de/ spyod lam dag par mdzad la 'khor rnams kyis bcom
481a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gral stan la go rim 'tsham par 'khod do/ /de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo de dag thams cad slar yang bcom ldan
481a5(rgyud): 'das la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas don gyi rgyu las brtsams te/ sba ma'i gnas tshul 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsan du gsol/ grong khyer 'di'i
481a6(rgyud): shar sgo'i phyi rol na a su ri zhes bya ba'i skyed tshal zhig yod do/ /grong khyer de'i nang na srin po'i bu mo lha min mdzes ma zhes bya ba/ rang bzhin ngan pa/ gdug rtsub che ba/ khro
481a7(rgyud): zhing gtum pa gcig gnas te/ rgyun par khye'u bu mo rnams kyi mdangs dang / gzi brjid 'phrog cing srog kyang 'phrog par byed pas bdag cag rnams nyin mtshan med par
481b1(rgyud): 'jigs pas nyen te sdug bsngal zhing bde ba'i go skabs cung zad kyang mi thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen pos dgongs la sdug bsngal 'di bsal ba'i
481b2(rgyud): thabs bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /de ltar gsol ba btab pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal
481b3(rgyud): mtshan des skye bo'i tshogs de dag la brtse ba'i dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes te cang mi gsung bar gnang nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad pas zhal gyi
481b4(rgyud): sgo nas 'od zer kha dog brgya stong du 'phros/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su khebs pas sems can thams cad dbugs phyung bar
481b5(rgyud): mdzad cing khyad par a su ri'i skyed mos tshal de rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer me'i phung pos bsreg/ kun tu rab tu sreg go /der gnas pa'i srin po'i bu mo 'khor khri khrag mang po
481b6(rgyud): dang bcas tshom bu tshom bur phral nas phyogs bzhir 'thor zhing rgyug go / skad chen pos du zhing cho de 'debs/ kye ma kyi hud bdag cag rnams su la skyabs su 'gro/ su zhig
481b7(rgyud): gis sdug bsngal 'di las skyob nus zer zhing 'o dod 'bod de du bar gyur to/ /de nas par snang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod rnams/ de
482a1(rgyud): b zhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung du song la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su song na sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar gyur te bde
482a2(rgyud): pa dang / yid bde ba 'tho ba par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas lha min mdzes ma 'khor khri phrag mang po dang bcas rings pa rings par pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi sprul pa'i dkyil
482a3(rgyud): 'khor ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams bskyab tu
482a4(rgyud): gsol/ /'jig rten mgon po/ bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bskyab tu gsol/ deng phyin chad bdag cag gis sems can la gnod pa mi bgyid do/ /sems
482a5(rgyud): can la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes nas/ byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum rnam par
482a6(rgyud): rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de las langs te byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs so/ /de'i tshe
482a7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / gzungs sngags kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lham me lham
482b1(rgyud): mer mngon sum du snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'khor rnams la chos ston pa yang lhang lhang thos par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
482b2(rgyud): t hams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas so so'i zhing na bzhugs
482b3(rgyud): bzhin mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi
482b4(rgyud): gzungs gsungs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par gsungs so zhes gsungs so/ /de nas srin mo lha min mdzes ma 'khor dang bcas pa btul zhing dge ba bcu'i lam la 'god/
482b5(rgyud): skye bo'i tshogs grangs med pa mang po yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god do/ /de nas grong khyer de nyid rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi char yang babs
482b6(rgyud): so| |dzam+bu gling gi skye rgu thams cad kyang sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod par gyur to/ /bram ze chen po/ nga de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lo bdun lon
482b7(rgyud): pa zhig ste/ gzungs sngags 'di thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i bstan pa la rnam par dag pa'i dad pa thob cing da lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa
483a1(rgyud): yin no/ /bram ze chen po/ khyod kyis the tshom dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig /bram ze chen po/ khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo lha min mdzes ma zhes
483a2(rgyud): bya bar gyur to/ /de'i dus dge ba'i sems ma bzung zhing sems can mang po la gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu bskal pa grangs med du mar ngan song myul sdug bsngal
483a3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa myongs so/ /mthar de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa bzung bas da lta bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes shing shes rab che la
483a4(rgyud): longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur/ 'on kyang las kyi lhag mas bu tsha med par gyur pa'o/ /bram ze chen po/ de'i dus kyi pa tha ri'i grong khyer na gnas pa
483a5(rgyud): skye bo de dag ni/ da lta nga'i 'khor du byung ba'i lha klu gnod sbyin dri za lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i tshoms chen po 'di dag go /bram ze chen
483a6(rgyud): po| khyod de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po de dag da lta gzhan su dag yin nam snyam pa'i yid gnyis dang / nem nur skyed na/ bram ze
483a7(rgyud): chen po/ de ltar ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po ni/ da lta nga'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i nang du byung ba'i
483b1(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rig byed smra ba rnams dang / gcer bu pa dang / rtog ge pa gzhan dag sgyu rtsal shes rigs dang / dur khrod na gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can dang /
483b2(rgyud): tshem bu pa dang / glang ru'i brtul zhugs can dang / ri su lan gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can 'di dag go /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams
483b3(rgyud): de ltar bshad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa chen po de dag gis sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu rkyen de lta bu thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur te dga'
483b4(rgyud): zhing mgu nas/ bdug spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / phye ma phur ma dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i
483b5(rgyud): bye brag sna tshogs bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing g.yas skor du bskor ba lan gsum byas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
483b6(rgyud): zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig gcig gis mthun par gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/
483b7(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bshad du gsol/ rig
484a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po de ni sems can thams cad kyi dmigs bu dang / sgron mer gyur pa ste/ khyad par du yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la babs
484a2(rgyud): pa'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas/
484a3(rgyud): zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'phros/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
484a4(rgyud): thams cad gsal bar byas te/ de dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du lham me lham mer snang bar gyur to/ /de dag gi chos bshad pa yang
484a5(rgyud): lhang nge lhang nger thos par gyur to/ /gnas de nyid rin po che'i ljon shing rtsa ba sdong po yal ga lo 'dab me tog 'bras bu rnams rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yid du
484a6(rgyud): 'ong ba'i lha'i shing sha stag gi tshal chen pos phyogs mtshams brgyan par gyur to/ /dzam+bu gling gi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba la longs spyod par gyur pa la
484a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa'i byin rlabs kyi snang ba 'jig rten 'di na mngon sum du gyur to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
484b1(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas tshul de dag mthong nas dga' bas 'dzum pa mdzad cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis te phyag 'tshal zhing lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
484b2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba rgya chen po rgyun mi
484b3(rgyud): 'chad pa 'byung ba'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol zhes gsol
484b4(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes nas sangs rgyas thams cad la nye bar blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
484b5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams ma lus par mngon sum du snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba
484b6(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa thams cad mda' 'ben gcig gis tsam du nye bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig
484b7(rgyud): gis 'di skad du/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsung bar brtsams pa shin tu legs so//

485a3(rgyud): d pal gzhon nur gyur pas lhung bzed gcig bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad der bsdus te bcom ldan 'das la
485a4(rgyud): phul to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas phyag tu bzhes la mdun gyi nam mkhar bor to/ /de nas lhung bzed des nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khyon
485a5(rgyud): gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag thams cad
485a6(rgyud): kyang mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ legs so/ /legs so zhes gsungs shing / de dag thams cad re re'i spyan sngar bcom
485a7(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / shAkya thub pa so so'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhung bzed 'bul bzhin pa re re
485b1(rgyud): snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam

485b3(rgyud): gang / ci'i phyir 'od zer 'gyed la rnam par 'phrul pa 'di bstan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci phyag na rdo rje khyed kyis 'od kyi snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu rkyen mi shes

485b7(rgyud): mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu zhig ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ re zhig sgug cig /skad cig yud tsam na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
486a1(rgyud): ma thag rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i mchod rten dpangs su dpag tshad bdun stong dang / rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig sa brtol te byung bar
486a2(rgyud): gyur to/ /mchod rten de ni lha'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi dar dpyangs 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che mu tig gi dra bas khebs
486a3(rgyud): shing rin po che'i phyang 'phrul dang / gser gyi dril bu dang / dril bu'i g.yer kha las snyan pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs byung ba'o/ /de'i tshe bar snang nas lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya
486a4(rgyud): stong du mas lag na mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs thogs pa babs te/ rin po che'i mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / phyag dang / skor ba byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
486a5(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod rten de'i sgo phyed par bsgos so/ /sgo phyed par bsgos pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje sku las ye shes kyi
486a6(rgyud): me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lag na rdo rje gsor zhing zhal khro gnyer bsdus pa'i nyams can/ 'jigs su rung ba'i dpa'
486a7(rgyud): byad dang ldan pa des rin po che'i mchod rten de'i drung du song nas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste mchod rten de'i sgo 'phar rab tu phye'o/ /phyes pa dang de'i nang na dzam+bu chu bo'i
486b1(rgyud): gser las grub pa'i seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyis spa ba lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs kyi khengs dang ldan pa'i stan la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
486b2(rgyud): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog ces bya ba bsam gtan la snyoms par
486b3(rgyud): zhugs bzhin pa snang bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog des 'di skad ces bsngags pa mdzad
486b4(rgyud): do| |bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar che ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan cing de bzhin
486b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa dang / spros par mdzad cing / don dam par chos thams cad 'du 'bral yong ye mi mnga' bzhin 'jig rten 'di na rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar
486b6(rgyud): 'di lta bu bstan pa 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yang ma byung ngo / /da lta bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan
486b7(rgyud): 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rjes su brtse bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
487a1(rgyud): cad kyi sku mngon sum du snang ba'i rnam par rol ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pa dang / nga'i mchod rten sa steng du byung ba'i rgyu rkyen 'di nyid kyang byang chub
487a2(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi mthu dang / byin rlabs las byung ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'chad pa'i dus la
487a3(rgyud): bab bo/ /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi
487a4(rgyud): tog gis bskul ba dang du bzhes nas/ rtog pa'i rgyal bo byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu la bad na kAny+tsa no ta k+Shi p+ta/
487a5(rgyud): pra b+hA sa ke tu mUr+d+ha ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo b+ha ga bA te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+hi ni bo d+hi ni/ sarba
487a6(rgyud): ta thA ga ta go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+ha re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ Sha Ta ra smi sa ny+tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shik+te/ gu Ne gu Na ba te/ sarba bud+d+ha
487a7(rgyud): gu NA ba d+hA se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ na b+ha sta le/ sha me sha me/ pra sha me pra sha me/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma Na/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha
487b1(rgyud): ne| hu lu hu lu/ mahA bo d+hi mA na saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po byang chub snying
487b2(rgyud): po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par gsungs so zhes sngags
487b3(rgyud): pa mdzad do/ /sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa
487b4(rgyud): dang / bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs pa legs so/ /legs par gsungs so zhes mthun par bsngags pa mdzad ma thag tus chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
487b5(rgyud): so| |lhas me tog sna tshogs kyi char phabs so/ /de bzhin du byug pa dang / phye ma phur ma dang / na bza' dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub
487b6(rgyud): dang / do shal dang / ska rags la sogs pa bsnams nas mchod cing snyan cing 'jebs pa'i glu len/ rol mo sna tshogs dkrol/ me tog gi char de yang / 'di lta ste/ ut+pa la
