510a1(rgyud): byung ngo / /dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin
510a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
510a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
510a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel
510a5(rgyud): gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
510a6(rgyud): pa til gyi gang bu snyad dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs
510a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin
510b1(rgyud): po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sprel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis pa dang /
510b2(rgyud): char kab kyi gzugs dang / dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam
510b3(rgyud): grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can
510b4(rgyud): gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang / bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
510b5(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar par
510b6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang na mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i
510b7(rgyud): sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang / ser bas
511a1(rgyud): kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags mi srun pa'am/ gdug pas kyang mi chugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis kyang
511a2(rgyud): mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / byi ba dang / sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa
511a3(rgyud): dang / mchu rings dang / rta bla'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad
511a4(rgyud): 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / 'dre dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang
511a5(rgyud): mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras
511a6(rgyud): dang | phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yon pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong
511a7(rgyud): btsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad
511b1(rgyud): dang | skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu me'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi
511b2(rgyud): 'gyur| dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing / me dang / chus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes
511b3(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu
511b4(rgyud): rgyun mi chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
511b5(rgyud): srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug ring chen po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par
511b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad
511b7(rgyud): kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /yul du gnas pa thams
512a1(rgyud): cad kyang mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /bstod par byed/ skor ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang
512a2(rgyud): po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum
512a3(rgyud): du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so/ /
512a4(rgyud): mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi'am/ dngul gyi'am/ gser gyi'am/ zangs kyis byed pa dang / chos
512a5(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/ de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs bar 'gyur ro/ /'phang
512a6(rgyud): dang | them skas dang / kha ran dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
512a7(rgyud): thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
512b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su
512b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs dang / mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su ba skyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
512b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par
512b4(rgyud): 'di lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi
512b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje/ des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis
512b6(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag
512b7(rgyud): na rdo rje nyon cig / de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
513a1(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul
513a2(rgyud): pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// //na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA
513a3(rgyud): nAn/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM b+hu bi b+ha bA na ba ra ba tsa Tau/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ d+hA tu d+ha re/ pad+ma gar+b+he/ dza ya ba re/ a tsu le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+harma
513a4(rgyud): tsakra / pra brta na/ badzra bo d+hi maN+Da a laM kA ra/ a laM kr-i te/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ni b+ho d+ha ni/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ya/ tsa la
513a5(rgyud): tsa la/ tsa lan+tu sarba A pa ra NA ni/ sarba pA paM bi ga te/ hu ru hu ru/ sarba sho ka bi ga te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ badzri Ni/ saM b+ha ba saM b+ha ba/ sarba ta thA ga te guh+ye/ d+hA
513a6(rgyud): ra Ni mu dre/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA/ sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha te swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ d+hA tu mu dre swAhA/ su pra tiSh+Thi ta stu
513a7(rgyud): pe ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ hUM hUM swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+Ni Sha d+ha tu mu drA Ni sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu bi b+hu Shi ta a d+hiSh+Thi ta hu ru hu ru/ hUM hUM swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
513b1(rgyud): kyis ring bsrel za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khri ga
513b2(rgyud): til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la/ shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi
513b3(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /'di ni
513b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten
513b5(rgyud): gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rjes su 'brang
513b6(rgyud): zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam
513b7(rgyud): na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang dang / legs par rnam par
514a1(rgyud): 'byes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal
514a2(rgyud): nas| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
514a3(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de
514a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //
514a5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra pra b+ha wa dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de gtsang de wen+d+ra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
